[03] ^b^na vimānamajjhagā^eb^ti navabhedaṃ tividhamānaṃ na upagato. nivāsaṭṭhena vā mātukucchi ``vimāna''nti vuccati, taṃ āyatiṃ paṭisandhivasena na upagacchītipi attho. anāgatatthe atītavacanaṃ. ^b^acchecchī^eb^ti chindi. ^b^chinnagantha^eb^nti cattāro ganthe chinditvā ṭhitaṃ. ^b^anīgha^eb^nti niddukkhaṃ. ^b^nirāsa^eb^nti nittaṇhaṃ. ^b^pariyesamānā^eb^ti olokayamānā. ^b^nājjhagamu^eb^nti na adhigacchanti na vindanti na passanti. vattamānatthe atītavacanaṃ. ^b^idha vā huraṃ vā^eb^ti idhaloke vā paraloke vā. ^b^sabbanivesanesū^eb^ti tayo bhavā, catasso yoniyo, pañca gatiyo, satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo, nava sattāvāsā, iti imesupi sabbesu sattanivesanesu evarūpaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ kāyassa bhedā uppajjamānaṃ vā uppannaṃ ^a^P1.0047^ea^ vā na passantīti attho. imāya gāthāya sandiṭṭhikaṃ lokuttaradhammameva kathesi.

[03] imañca gāthaṃ sutvā sāpi devatā atthaṃ sallakkhesi, teneva kāraṇena ^b^imassa khvāhaṃ, bhante^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^pāpaṃ na kayirā^eb^ti gāthāya dasakusalakammapathavasenapi kathetuṃ vaṭṭati aṭṭhaṅgikamaggavasenapi. dasakusalakammapathavasena tāva ^b^vacasā^eb^ti catubbidhaṃ vacīsucaritaṃ gahitaṃ. ^b^manasā^eb^ti tividhaṃ manosucaritaṃ gahitaṃ. ^b^kāyena vā kiñcana sabbaloke^eb^ti tividhaṃ kāyasucaritaṃ gahitaṃ. ime tāva dasakusalakammapathadhammā honti. ^b^kāme pahāyā^eb^ti iminā pana kāmasukhallikānuyogo ^a^V1.0044^ea^ paṭikkhitto. ^b^satimā sampajāno^eb^ti iminā dasakusalakammapathakāraṇaṃ satisampajaññaṃ gahitaṃ. ^b^dukkhaṃ na sevetha anatthasaṃhita^eb^nti iminā attakilamathānuyogo paṭisiddho. iti devatā ``ubho ante vivajjetvā ^a^M1.0046^ea^ kāraṇehi satisampajaññehi saddhiṃ dasakusalakammapathadhamme tumhehi kathite ājānāmi bhagavā''ti vadati.

[03] aṭṭhaṅgikamaggavasena pana ayaṃ nayo -- tasmiṃ kira ṭhāne mahatī dhammadesanā ahosi. desanāpariyosāne devatā yathāṭhāne ṭhitāva desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya attanā adhigataṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ dassentī evamāha. tattha ^b^vacasā^eb^ti sammāvācā gahitā, mano pana aṅgaṃ na hotīti ^b^manasā^eb^ti maggasampayuttakaṃ cittaṃ gahitaṃ. ^b^kāyena vā kiñcana sabbaloke^eb^ti sammākammanto gahito, ājīvo pana vācākammantapakkhikattā gahitova hoti. ^b^satimā^eb^ti iminā vāyāmasatisamādhayo gahitā. ^b^sampajāno^eb^tipadena sammādiṭṭhisammāsaṅkappā. ^b^kāme pahāya, dukkhaṃ na sevethā^eb^tipadadvayena antadvayavajjanaṃ. iti ime dve ante anupagamma majjhimaṃ paṭipadaṃ tumhehi kathitaṃ, ājānāmi bhagavāti vatvā tathāgataṃ gandhamālādīhi pūjetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmīti.
[06] samiddhisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] nandanavaggo dutiyo.

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ sattivaggassa paṭhame ^a^P1.0048^ea^ ^b^sattiyā^eb^ti desanāsīsametaṃ. ekatokhārādinā satthenāti attho. ^b^omaṭṭho^eb^ti pahato. cattāro hi pahārā omaṭṭho ummaṭṭho maṭṭho vimaṭṭhoti. tattha upari ṭhatvā adhomukhaṃ dinnapahāro omaṭṭho nāma; heṭṭhā ṭhatvā uddhaṃmukhaṃ dinno ummaṭṭho nāma; aggaḷasūci viya vinivijjhitvā gato maṭṭho nāma; seso sabbopi vimaṭṭho nāma. imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne omaṭṭho gahito. so hi sabbadāruṇo duruddharasallo duttikiccho antodoso antopubbalohitova hoti ^a^V1.0045^ea^, pubbalohitaṃ anikkhamitvā vaṇamukhaṃ pariyonandhitvā tiṭṭhati. pubbalohitaṃ ^a^M1.0047^ea^ niharitukāmehi mañcena saddhiṃ bandhitvā adhosiro kātabbo hoti, maraṇaṃ vā maraṇamattaṃ vā dukkhaṃ pāpuṇāti. ^b^paribbaje^eb^ti vihareyya.

[01] imāya gāthāya kiṃ katheti? yathā sattiyā omaṭṭho puriso sallubbahana-vaṇatikicchanānaṃ atthāya vīriyaṃ ārabhati, payogaṃ karoti parakkamati. yathā ca ḍayhamāno matthake ādittasīso tassa nibbāpanatthāya vīriyaṃ ārabhati, payogaṃ karoti parakkamati, evameva bhikkhu kāmarāgaṃ pahānāya sato appamatto hutvā vihareyya bhagavāti kathesi.

[03] atha bhagavā cintesi -- imāya devatāya upamā tāva daḷhaṃ katvā ānītā, atthaṃ pana parittakaṃ gahetvā ṭhitā, punappunaṃ kathentīpi hesā kāmarāgassa vikkhambhanapahānameva katheyya. yāva ca kāmarāgo maggena na samugghāṭiyati, tāva anubaddhova hoti. iti tameva opammaṃ gahetvā paṭhamamaggavasena desanaṃ vinivaṭṭetvā desento dutiyaṃ gāthamāha. tassattho purimānusāreneva veditabboti. paṭhamaṃ.

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^nāphusantaṃ phusatī^eb^ti kammaṃ aphusantaṃ vipāko na phusati, kammameva vā aphusantaṃ kammaṃ na phusati. kammañhi nākaroto kariyati. ^b^phusantañca tato^eb^ ^a^P1.0049^ea^ ^b^phuse^eb^ti kammaṃ phusantaṃ vipāko phusati, kammameva vā phusati. kammañhi karoto kariyati. ^b^tasmā phusantaṃ phusati, appaduṭṭhapadosina^eb^nti yasmā na aphusantaṃ phusati, phusantañca phusati, ayaṃ kammavipākānaṃ dhammatā, tasmā yo ``appaduṭṭhassa narassa dussati, suddhassa posassa anaṅgaṇassā''ti evaṃ vutto appaduṭṭhapadosī puggalo, taṃ puggalaṃ kammaṃ phusantameva kammaṃ phusati, vipāko vā phusati. so hi parassa upaghātaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti vā mā vā, attā panānena catūsu apāyesu ṭhapito nāma hoti. tenāha bhagavā -- ``tameva bālaṃ pacceti pāpaṃ, sukhumo rajo paṭivātaṃva khitto''ti. dutiyaṃ.

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^a^V1.0046^ea^ ^a^M1.0048^ea^ ^b^antojaṭā^eb^ti gāthāyaṃ ^b^jaṭā^eb^ti taṇhāya jāliniyā adhivacanaṃ. sā hi rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu heṭṭhupariyavasena punappunaṃ uppajjanato saṃsibbanaṭṭhena veḷugumbādīnaṃ sākhājālasaṅkhātā jaṭā viyāti jaṭā. sā panesā sakaparikkhāraparaparikkhāresu sakāttabhāva-parāttabhāvesu ajjhattikāyatana-bāhirāyatanesu ca uppajjanato ^b^antojaṭā bahijaṭā^eb^ti vuccati. tāya evaṃ uppajjamānāya ^b^jaṭāya jaṭitā pajā^eb^. yathā nāma veḷujaṭādīhi veḷuādayo, evaṃ tāya taṇhājaṭāya sabbāpi ayaṃ sattanikāyasaṅkhātā pajā jaṭitā vinaddhā, saṃsibbitāti attho. yasmā ca evaṃ jaṭitā, ^b^taṃ taṃ gotama pucchāmī^eb^ti tasmā taṃ pucchāmi. ^b^gotamā^eb^ti bhagavantaṃ gottena ālapati. ^b^ko imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭa^eb^nti imaṃ evaṃ tedhātukaṃ jaṭetvā ṭhitaṃ jaṭaṃ ko vijaṭeyya, vijaṭetuṃ ko samatthoti pucchati.

[01] athassa bhagavā tamatthaṃ vissajjento ^b^sīle patiṭṭhāyā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^sīle patiṭṭhāyā^eb^ti catupārisuddhisīle ṭhatvā. ettha ca bhagavā jaṭāvijaṭanaṃ pucchito sīlaṃ ārabhanto na ``aññaṃ puṭṭho aññaṃ kathetī''ti veditabbo. jaṭāvijaṭakassa hi patiṭṭhādassanatthamettha sīlaṃ kathitaṃ.

[03] ^b^naro^eb^ti ^a^P1.0050^ea^ satto. ^b^sapañño^eb^ti kammajatihetukapaṭisandhipaññāya paññavā. ^b^cittaṃ paññañca bhāvaya^eb^nti samādhiñceva vipassanañca bhāvayamāno. cittasīsena hettha aṭṭha samāpattiyo kathitā, paññānāmena vipassanā. ^b^ātāpī^eb^ti vīriyavā. vīriyañhi kilesānaṃ ātāpanaparitāpanaṭṭhena ``ātāpo''ti vuccati, tadassa atthīti ātāpī. ^b^nipako^eb^ti nepakkaṃ vuccati paññā, tāya samannāgatoti attho. iminā padena pārihāriyapaññaṃ dasseti. ^b^pārihāriyapaññā^eb^ nāma ``ayaṃ kālo uddesassa, ayaṃ kālo paripucchāyā''tiādinā nayena sabbattha kārāpitā pariharitabbapaññā. imasmiñhi pañhābyākaraṇe tikkhattuṃ paññā āgatā. tattha paṭhamā jātipaññā, dutiyā vipassanāpaññā, tatiyā sabbakiccapariṇāyikā pārihāriyapaññā.

[03] ^b^so^eb^ ^a^M1.0049^ea^ ^b^imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭa^eb^nti so imehi sīlādīhi samannāgato bhikkhu. yathā nāma puriso pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya sunisitaṃ satthaṃ ukkhipitvā mahantaṃ veḷugumbaṃ vijaṭeyya, evamevaṃ sīle ^a^V1.0047^ea^ patiṭṭhāya samādhisilāyaṃ sunisitaṃ vipassanāpaññāsatthaṃ vīriyabalapaggahitena pārihāriyapaññāhatthena ukkhipitvā sabbampi taṃ attano santāne patitaṃ taṇhājaṭaṃ vijaṭeyya sañchindeyya sampadāleyyāti.

[03] ettāvatā sekhabhūmiṃ kathetvā idāni jaṭaṃ vijaṭetvā ṭhitaṃ mahākhīṇāsavaṃ dassento ^b^yesa^eb^ntiādimāha. evaṃ jaṭaṃ vijaṭetvā ṭhitaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ dassetvā puna jaṭāya vijaṭanokāsaṃ dassento ^b^yattha nāmañcā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^nāma^eb^nti cattāro arūpino khandhā. ^b^paṭighaṃ rūpasaññā cā^eb^ti ettha paṭighasaññāvasena kāmabhavo gahito, rūpasaññāvasena rūpabhavo. tesu dvīsu gahitesu arūpabhavo gahitova hoti bhavasaṅkhepenāti. ^b^etthesā chijjate jaṭā^eb^ti ettha tebhūmakavaṭṭassa pariyādiyanaṭṭhāne esā jaṭā chijjati, nibbānaṃ āgamma chijjati nirujjhatīti ayaṃ attho dassito hoti. tatiyaṃ.

[03] 24^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^yato yato^eb^ti pāpato vā kalyāṇato vā. ayaṃ kira devatā ``yaṃkiñci kusalādibhedaṃ lokiyaṃ vā lokuttaraṃ vā mano, taṃ nivāretabbameva, na uppādetabba''nti evaṃladdhikā ^a^P1.0051^ea^. ^b^sa sabbato^eb^ti so sabbato. atha bhagavā -- ``ayaṃ devatā aniyyānikakathaṃ katheti, mano nāma nivāretabbampi atthi bhāvetabbampi, vibhajitvā namassā dassessāmī''ti cintetvā dutiyagāthaṃ āha. tattha ^b^na mano saṃyatattamāgata^eb^nti, yaṃ vuttaṃ ``na sabbato mano nivāraye''ti, kataraṃ taṃ mano, yaṃ taṃ sabbato na nivāretabbanti ce. mano saṃyatattaṃ āgataṃ, yaṃ mano yattha saṃyatabhāvaṃ āgataṃ, ``dānaṃ dassāmi, sīlaṃ rakkhissāmī''tiādinā nayena uppannaṃ, etaṃ mano na nivāretabbaṃ, aññadatthu brūhetabbaṃ vaḍḍhetabbaṃ. ^b^yato yato ca pāpaka^eb^nti yato yato akusalaṃ uppajjati, tato tato ca taṃ nivāretabbanti. catutthaṃ.

[03] 25^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^a^M1.0050^ea^ ^b^katāvī^eb^ti catūhi maggehi katakicco. ^b^ahaṃ vadāmī^eb^ti ayaṃ devatā vanasaṇḍavāsinī, sā āraññakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ``ahaṃ bhuñjāmi, ahaṃ nisīdāmi, mama patto, mama ^a^V1.0048^ea^ cīvara''ntiādikathāvohāraṃ sutvā cintesi -- ``ahaṃ ime bhikkhū `khīṇāsavā'ti maññāmi, khīṇāsavānañca nāma evarūpā attupaladdhinissitakathā hoti, na hoti nu kho''ti jānanatthaṃ evaṃ pucchati.

[03] ^b^sāmañña^eb^nti lokaniruttiṃ lokavohāraṃ. ^b^kusalo^eb^ti khandhādīsu kusalo. ^b^vohāramattenā^eb^ti upaladdhinissitakathaṃ hitvā vohārabhedaṃ akaronto ``ahaṃ, mamā''ti vadeyya. ``khandhā bhuñjanti, khandhā nisīdanti, khandhānaṃ patto, khandhānaṃ cīvara''nti hi vutte vohārabhedo hoti, na koci jānāti. tasmā evaṃ avatvā lokavohārena voharatīti.

[03] atha devatā -- ``yadi diṭṭhiyā vasena na vadati, mānavasena nu kho vadatī''ti cintetvā puna ^b^yo hotī^eb^ti pucchi. tattha ^b^mānaṃ nu kho^eb^ti so bhikkhu mānaṃ upagantvā mānavasena vadeyya nu khoti. atha bhagavā -- ``ayaṃ devatā khīṇāsavaṃ samānaṃ viya karotī''ti cintetvā, ``khīṇāsavassa navavidhopi māno pahīno''ti dassento paṭigāthaṃ āha. tattha ^b^vidhūpitā^eb^ti vidhamitā. ^b^mānaganthassā^eb^ti mānā ca ^a^P1.0052^ea^ ganthā ca assa. ^b^maññata^eb^nti maññanaṃ. tividhampi taṇhā-diṭṭhi-māna-maññanaṃ so vītivatto, atikkantoti attho. sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti. pañcamaṃ.

[03] 26^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^puṭṭhu^eb^nti pucchituṃ. ^b^kathaṃ jānemū^eb^ti kathaṃ jāneyyāma. ^b^divāratti^eb^nti divā ca rattiñca. ^b^tattha tatthā^eb^ti yattha yattheva pajjalito hoti, tattha tattha. ^b^esā ābhā^eb^ti esā buddhābhā. katamā pana sāti? ñāṇāloko vā hotu pītiāloko vā pasādāloko vā dhammakathāāloko vā, sabbopi buddhānaṃ pātubhāvā uppanno āloko ^b^buddhābhā^eb^ nāma. ayaṃ anuttarā sabbaseṭṭhā asadisāti. chaṭṭhaṃ.

[03] 27^b^.^eb^ sattame ^a^M1.0051^ea^ ^b^kuto sarā nivattantī^eb^ti ime saṃsārasarā kuto nivattanti, kiṃ āgamma nappavattantīti ^a^V1.0049^ea^ attho. ^b^na gādhatī^eb^ti na patiṭṭhāti. ^b^ato^eb^ti ato nibbānato. sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti. sattamaṃ.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame nidhānagataṃ muttasārādi mahantaṃ dhanametesanti ^b^mahaddhanā^eb^. suvaṇṇarajatabhājanādi mahābhogo etesanti ^b^mahābhogā. aññamaññābhigijjhantī^eb^ti aññamaññaṃ abhigijjhanti patthenti pihenti. ^b^analaṅkatā^eb^ti atittā apariyattajātā. ^b^ussukkajātesū^eb^ti nānākiccajātesu anuppannānaṃ rūpādīnaṃ uppādanatthāya uppannānaṃ anubhavanatthāya ussukkesu. ^b^bhavasotānusārīsū^eb^ti vaṭṭasotaṃ anusarantesu. ^b^anussukā^eb^ti avāvaṭā. ^b^agāra^eb^nti mātugāmena saddhiṃ gehaṃ. ^b^virājiyā^eb^ti virājetvā. sesaṃ uttānamevāti. aṭṭhamaṃ.

[03] 29^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^P1.0053^ea^ ^b^catucakka^eb^nti catuiriyāpathaṃ. iriyāpatho hi idha cakkanti adhippeto. ^b^navadvāra^eb^nti navahi vaṇamukhehi navadvāraṃ. ^b^puṇṇa^eb^nti asucipūraṃ. ^b^lobhena saṃyuta^eb^nti taṇhāya saṃyuttaṃ. ^b^kathaṃ yātrā bhavissatī^eb^ti etassa evarūpassa sarīrassa kathaṃ niggamanaṃ bhavissati, kathaṃ mutti parimutti samatikkamo bhavissatīti pucchati. ^b^naddhi^eb^nti upanāhaṃ, pubbakāle kodho, aparakāle upanāhoti evaṃ pavattaṃ balavakodhanti attho. ^b^varatta^eb^nti ``chetvā naddhi varattañca, sandānaṃ sahanukkama''nti gāthāya (dha0 pa0 398; su0 ni0 627) taṇhā ^b^varattā,^eb^ diṭṭhi ^b^sandānaṃ^eb^ nāma jātaṃ. idha pana pāḷiniddiṭṭhe kilese ṭhapetvā avasesā ``varattā''ti veditabbā, iti kilesavarattañca chetvāti attho. ^b^icchā lobha^eb^nti ekoyeva dhammo icchanaṭṭhena icchā, lubbhanaṭṭhena lobhoti vutto. paṭhamuppattikā vā dubbalā icchā, aparāparuppattiko balavā lobho. aladdhapatthanā vā icchā, paṭiladdhavatthumhi lobho. ^b^samūlaṃ taṇha^eb^nti avijjāmūlena samūlakaṃ taṇhaṃ. ^b^abbuyhā^eb^ti aggamaggena uppāṭetvā. sesaṃ uttānamevāti. navamaṃ.

[03] 30^b^.^eb^ dasame ^a^V1.0050^ea^ ^a^M1.0052^ea^ ^b^eṇijaṅgha^eb^nti eṇimigassa viya suvaṭṭitajaṅghaṃ. ^b^kisa^eb^nti athūlaṃ samasarīraṃ. atha vā ātapena milātaṃ mālāgandhavilepanehi anupabrūhitasarīrantipi attho. ^b^vīra^eb^nti vīriyavantaṃ. ^b^appāhāra^eb^nti bhojane mattaññutāya mitāhāraṃ, vikālabhojanapaṭikkhepavasena vā parittāhāraṃ. ^b^alolupa^eb^nti ^a^P1.0054^ea^ catūsu paccayesu loluppavirahitaṃ. rasataṇhāpaṭikkhepo vā esa. ^b^sīhaṃvekacaraṃ nāga^eb^nti ekacaraṃ sīhaṃ viya, ekacaraṃ nāgaṃ viya. gaṇavāsino hi pamattā honti, ekacarā appamattā, tasmā ekacarāva gahitāti. ^b^paveditā^eb^ti pakāsitā kathitā. ^b^etthā^eb^ti etasmiṃ nāmarūpe. pañcakāmaguṇavasena hi rūpaṃ gahitaṃ, manena nāmaṃ, ubhayehi pana avinibhuttadhamme gahetvā pañcakkhandhādivasenapettha bhummaṃ yojetabbanti. dasamaṃ.
[06] sattivaggo tatiyo.

[03] 31^b^.^eb^ satullapakāyikavaggassa paṭhame ^b^satullapakāyikā^eb^ti sataṃ dhammaṃ samādānavasena ullapetvā sagge nibbattāti satullapakāyikā. tatridaṃ vatthu -- sambahulā kira samuddavāṇijā nāvāya samuddaṃ pakkhandiṃsu. tesaṃ khittasaravegena gacchantiyā nāvāya sattame divase samuddamajjhe mahantaṃ uppātikaṃ pātubhūtaṃ, mahāūmiyo uṭṭhahitvā nāvaṃ udakassa pūrenti. nāvāya nimujjamānāya mahājano attano attano devatānaṃ nāmāni gahetvā āyācanādīni karonto paridevi. tesaṃ majjhe eko puriso -- ``atthi nu kho me evarūpe bhaye patiṭṭhā''ti āvajjento attano parisuddhāni saraṇāni ceva sīlāni ca disvā yogī viya pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisīdi. tamenaṃ itare sabhayakāraṇaṃ pucchiṃsu. so tesaṃ ^a^M1.0053^ea^ kathesi -- ``ambho ahaṃ nāvaṃ abhirūhanadivase bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ datvā saraṇāni ceva sīlāni ca aggahesiṃ, tena me bhayaṃ natthī''ti. kiṃ pana sāmi etāni aññesampi vattantīti? āma vattantīti ^a^P1.0055^ea^ tena hi ^a^V1.0051^ea^ amhākampi dethāti. so te manusse sataṃ sataṃ katvā satta koṭṭhāse akāsi, tato pañcasīlāni adāsi. tesu paṭhamaṃ jaṅghasataṃ gopphakamatte udake ṭhitaṃ aggahesi, dutiyaṃ jāṇumatte, tatiyaṃ kaṭimatte, catutthaṃ nābhimatte, pañcamaṃ thanamatte, chaṭṭhaṃ galappamāṇe, sattamaṃ mukhena loṇodake pavisante aggahesi. so tesaṃ sīlāni datvā -- ``aññaṃ tumhākaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ natthi, sīlameva āvajjethā''ti ugghosesi. tāni sattapi jaṅghasatāni tattha kālaṃ katvā āsannakāle gahitasīlaṃ nissāya tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbattiṃsu, tesaṃ ghaṭāvaseneva vimānāni nibbattiṃsu. sabbesaṃ majjhe ācariyassa yojanasatikaṃ suvaṇṇavimānaṃ nibbatti, avasenāni tassa parivārāni hutvā sabbaheṭṭhimaṃ dvādasayojanikaṃ ahosi. te nibbattakkhaṇeyeva kammaṃ āvajjentā ācariyaṃ nissāya sampattilābhaṃ ñatvā, ``gacchāma tāva, dasabalassa santike amhākaṃ ācariyassa vaṇṇaṃ katheyyāmā''ti majjhimayāmasamanantare bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamiṃsu, tā devatā ācariyassa vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ ekekaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsiṃsu.

[03] tattha ^b^sabbhirevā^eb^ti paṇḍitehi, sappurisehi eva. ra-kāro padasandhikaro. ^b^samāsethā^eb^ti saha nisīdeyya. desanāsīsameva cetaṃ, sabbairiyāpathe sabbhireva saha kubbeyyāti attho. ^b^kubbethā^eb^ti kareyya. ^b^santhava^eb^nti mittasanthavaṃ. taṇhāsanthavo pana na kenaci saddhiṃ kātabbo, mittasanthavo buddha-paccekabuddha-buddhasāvakehi saha kātabbo. idaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^sata^eb^nti buddhādīnaṃ sappurisānaṃ. ^b^saddhamma^eb^nti pañcasīladasasīlacatusatipaṭṭhānādibhedaṃ saddhammaṃ, idha pana pañcasīlaṃ adhippetaṃ. ^b^seyyo hotī^eb^ti vaḍḍhi hoti. ^b^na pāpiyo^eb^ti lāmakaṃ kiñci na hoti. ^b^nāññato^eb^ti vālikādīhi telādīni viya aññato andhabālato paññā nāma na labbhati, tilādīhi pana telādīni viya sataṃ dhammaṃ ñatvā paṇḍitameva sevanto bhajanto labhatīti. ^b^sokamajjhe^eb^ti ^a^P1.0056^ea^ sokavatthūnaṃ sokānugatānaṃ vā sattānaṃ majjhagato na socati bandhulamallasenāpatissa ^a^M1.0054^ea^ upāsikā viya, pañcannaṃ corasatānaṃ majjhe dhammasenāpatissa saddhivihāriko saṃkiccasāmaṇero viya ca.

[03] ^b^ñātimajjhe virocatī^eb^ti ñātigaṇamajjhe saṃkiccatherassa saddhivihāriko adhimuttakasāmaṇero viya sobhati. so kira therassa bhāgineyyo hoti, atha naṃ thero āha -- ``sāmaṇera, mahallakosi jāto, gaccha, vassāni pucchitvā ehi, upasampādessāmi ta''nti. so ``sādhū''ti theraṃ vanditvā pattacīvaramādāya corāṭaviyā orabhāge bhaginigāmaṃ gantvā piṇḍāya ^a^V1.0052^ea^ cari, taṃ bhaginī disvā vanditvā gehe nisīdāpetvā bhojesi. so katabhattakicco vassāni pucchi. sā ``ahaṃ na jānāmi, mātā me jānātī''ti āha. atha so ``tiṭṭhatha tumhe, ahaṃ mātusantikaṃ gamissāmī''ti aṭaviṃ otiṇṇo. tamenaṃ dūratova corapuriso disvā corānaṃ ārocesi. corā ``sāmaṇero kireko aṭaviṃ otiṇṇo, gacchatha naṃ ānethā''ti āṇāpetvā ekacce ``mārema na''nti āhaṃsu, ekacce vissajjemāti. sāmaṇero cintesi -- ``ahaṃ sekho sakaraṇīyo, imehi saddhiṃ mantetvā sotthimattānaṃ karissāmī''ti corajeṭṭhakaṃ āmantetvā, ``upamaṃ te, āvuso, karissāmī''ti imā gāthā abhāsi --
[21] ``ahu atītamaddhānaṃ, araññasmiṃ brahāvane.
[22] ceto kūṭāni oḍḍetvā, sasakaṃ avadhī tadā..
[21] ``sasakañca mataṃ disvā, ubbiggā migapakkhino.
[22] ekarattiṃ apakkāmuṃ, `akiccaṃ vattate idha'..
[21] ``tatheva samaṇaṃ hantvā, adhimuttaṃ akiñcanaṃ.
[22] addhikā nāgamissanti, dhanajāni bhavissatī''ti..
[21] ``saccaṃ kho samaṇo āha, adhimutto akiñcano.
[22] addhikā nāgamissanti, dhanajāni bhavissati..
[21] ``sace paṭipathe disvā, nārocessasi kassaci.
[22] tava saccamanurakkhanto, gaccha bhante yathāsukha''nti..

[03] so ^a^V1.0053^ea^ ^a^P1.0057^ea^ ^a^M1.0055^ea^ tehi corehi vissajjito gacchanto ñātayopi disvā tesampi na ārocesi. atha te anuppatte corā gahetvā viheṭhayiṃsu, uraṃ paharitvā paridevamānañcassa mātaraṃ corā etadavocuṃ --
[21] ``kiṃ te hoti adhimutto, udare vasiko asi.
[22] puṭṭhā me amma akkhāhi, kathaṃ jānemu taṃ maya''nti..
[21] ``adhimuttassa ahaṃ mātā, ayañca janako pitā.
[22] bhaginī bhātaro cāpi, sabbeva idha ñātayo..
[21] ``akiccakārī adhimutto, yaṃ disvā na nivāraye.
[22] etaṃ kho vattaṃ samaṇānaṃ, ariyānaṃ dhammajīvinaṃ..
[21] ``saccavādī adhimutto, yaṃ disvā na nivāraye.
[27] adhimuttassa suciṇṇena, saccavādissa bhikkhuno.
[22] sabbeva abhayaṃ pattā, sotthiṃ gacchantu ñātayo''ti..
[03] evaṃ te corehi vissajjitā gantvā adhimuttaṃ āhaṃsu --
[21] ``tava tāta suciṇṇena, saccavādissa bhikkhuno.
[22] sabbeva abhayaṃ pattā, sotthiṃ paccāgamamhase''ti..

[03] tepi pañcasatā corā pasādaṃ āpajjitvā adhimuttassa sāmaṇerassa santike pabbajiṃsu. so te ādāya upajjhāyassa santikaṃ gantvā paṭhamaṃ attanā upasampanno pacchā te pañcasate attano antevāsike katvā upasampādesi. te adhimuttatherassa ovāde ṭhitā sabbe aggaphalaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. imamatthaṃ gahetvā devatā ``sataṃ saddhammamaññāya ñātimajjhe virocatī''ti āha.

[03] ^b^sātata^eb^nti satataṃ sukhaṃ vā ciraṃ tiṭṭhantīti vadati. ^b^sabbāsaṃ vo^eb^ti sabbāsaṃ tumhākaṃ. ^b^pariyāyenā^eb^ti kāraṇena. ^b^sabbadukkhā pamuccatī^eb^ti, na kevalaṃ seyyova hoti, na ca kevalaṃ paññaṃ labhati, sokamajjhe na socati, ñātimajjhe virocati, sugatiyaṃ nibbattati, ciraṃ sukhaṃ tiṭṭhati, sakalasmā pana vaṭṭadukkhāpi muccatīti. paṭhamaṃ.

[03] 32^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^a^V1.0054^ea^ ^a^P1.0058^ea^ ^a^M1.0056^ea^ ^b^maccherā ca pamādā cā^eb^ti attasampattinigūhanalakkhaṇena maccherena ceva sativippavāsalakkhaṇena pamādena ca. ekacco hi `idaṃ me dentassa parikkhayaṃ gamissati, mayhaṃ vā gharamānusakānaṃ vā na bhavissatī''ti macchariyena dānaṃ na deti. ekacco khiḍḍādipasutattā `dānaṃ dātabba''nti cittampi na uppādeti. ^b^evaṃ dānaṃ na dīyatī^eb^ti evametaṃ yasadāyakaṃ sirīdāyakaṃ sampattidāyakaṃ sukhadāyakaṃ dānaṃ nāma na dīyatītiādinā kāraṇaṃ kathesi. ^b^puññaṃ ākaṅkhamānenā^eb^ti pubbacetanādibhedaṃ puññaṃ icchamānena. ^b^deyyaṃ hoti vijānatā^eb^ti atthi dānassa phalanti jānantena dātabbamevāti vadati.

[03] ^b^tameva bālaṃ phusatī^eb^ti taṃyeva bālaṃ idhalokaparalokesu jighacchā ca pipāsā ca phusati anubandhati na vijahati. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā tameva phusati, tasmā. ^b^vineyya macchera^eb^nti maccheramalaṃ vinetvā. ^b^dajjā dānaṃ malābhibhū^eb^ti malābhibhū hutvā taṃ maccheramalaṃ abhibhavitvā dānaṃ dadeyya.

[03] ^b^te matesu na mīyantī^eb^ti adānasīlatāya maraṇena matesu na mīyanti. yathā hi mato samparivāretvā ṭhapite bahumhipi annapānādimhi ``idaṃ imassa hotu, idaṃ imassā''ti uṭṭhahitvā saṃvibhāgaṃ na karoti, evaṃ adānasīlopīti matakassa ca adānasīlassa ca bhogā samasamā nāma honti. tena dānasīlā evarūpesu matesu na mīyantīti attho. ^b^panthānaṃva saha vajaṃ, appasmiṃ ye pavecchantī^eb^ti yathā addhānaṃ kantāramaggaṃ saha vajantā pathikā saha vajantānaṃ pathikānaṃ appasmiṃ pātheyye saṃvibhāgaṃ katvā pavecchanti dadantiyeva, evamevaṃ ye pana anamataggaṃ saṃsārakantāraṃ saha vajantā saha vajantānaṃ appasmimpi deyyadhamme saṃvibhāgaṃ katvā dadantiyeva, te matesu na mīyanti.

[03] ^b^esa dhammo sanantano^eb^ti esa porāṇako dhammo, sanantanānaṃ ^a^P1.0059^ea^ vā paṇḍitānaṃ esa dhammoti. ^b^appasmeke^eb^ti appasmiṃ deyyadhamme eke. ^b^pavecchantī^eb^ti ^a^M1.0057^ea^ dadanti. ^b^bahuneke na dicchare^eb^ti bahunāpi bhogena samannāgatā ekacce na dadanti. ^b^sahassena samaṃ mitā^eb^ti sahassena saddhiṃ mitā, sahassa dānasadisā hoti.

[03] ^b^duranvayo^eb^ti ^a^V1.0055^ea^ duranugamano, duppūroti attho. ^b^dhammaṃ care^eb^ti dasakusalakammapathadhammaṃ carati. ^b^yopi samuñjakañcare^eb^ti yo api khalamaṇḍalādisodhanapalālapoṭhanādivasena samuñjakañcarati. ^b^dārañca posa^eb^nti dārañca posanto. ^b^dadaṃ appakasmi^eb^nti appakasmiṃ paṇṇasākamattasmimpi saṃvibhāgaṃ katvā dadantova so dhammaṃ carati. ^b^sataṃ sahassāna^eb^nti sahassaṃ sahassaṃ katvā gaṇitānaṃ purisānaṃ sataṃ, satasahassanti attho. ^b^sahassayāgina^eb^nti bhikkhusahassassa vā yāgo kahāpaṇasahassena vā nibbattito yāgopi sahassayāgo. so etesaṃ atthīti sahassayāgino, tesaṃ sahassayāginaṃ. etena dasannaṃ vā bhikkhukoṭīnaṃ dasannaṃ vā kahāpaṇakoṭīnaṃ piṇḍapāto dassito hoti. ye ettakaṃ dadanti, te kalampi nagghanti tathāvidhassāti āha. yvāyaṃ samuñjakaṃ carantopi dhammaṃ carati, dāraṃ posentopi, appakasmiṃ dadantopi, tathāvidhassa ete sahassayāgino kalampi nagghanti. yaṃ tena daliddena ekapaṭivīsakamattampi salākabhattamattampi vā dinnaṃ, tassa dānassa sabbesampi tesaṃ dānaṃ kalaṃ nagghatīti. ^b^kalaṃ^eb^ nāma soḷasabhāgopi satabhāgopi sahassabhāgopi. idha satabhāgo gahito. yaṃ tena dānaṃ dinnaṃ, tasmiṃ satadhā vibhatte itaresaṃ dasakoṭisahassadānaṃ tato ekakoṭṭhāsampi nagghatīti āha.

[03] evaṃ tathāgate dānassa agghaṃ karonte samīpe ṭhitā devatā cintesi -- ``evaṃ bhagavā mahantaṃ dānaṃ pādena pavaṭṭetvā ratanasatike viya narake pakkhipanto idaṃ evaṃ parittakaṃ ^a^P1.0060^ea^ dānaṃ candamaṇḍale paharanto viya ukkhipati, kathaṃ nu kho etaṃ mahapphalatara''nti jānanatthaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi. tattha ^b^kenā^eb^ti kena kāraṇena. ^b^mahaggato^eb^ti mahattaṃ gato, vipulassetaṃ vevacanaṃ. ^b^samena dinnassā^eb^ti samena dinnassa dānassa. athassā bhagavā dānaṃ vibhajitvā dassento ^b^dadanti heke^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^visame niviṭṭhā^eb^ti visame kāyavacīmanokamme patiṭṭhitā hutvā. ^b^chetvā^eb^ti pothetvā. ^b^vadhitvā^eb^ti māretvā. ^b^socayitvā^eb^ti paraṃ ^a^M1.0058^ea^ sokasamappitaṃ katvā. ^b^assumukhā^eb^ti assumukhasammissā. paraṃ rodāpetvā dinnadānañhi assumukhadānanti vuccati. ^b^sadaṇḍā^eb^ti daṇḍena tajjetvā paharitvā dinnadakkhiṇā sadaṇḍāti vuccati. ^b^eva^eb^nti nāhaṃ sammāsambuddhatāya mahādānaṃ gahetvā appaphalaṃ nāma kātuṃ sakkomi parittakadānaṃ vā mahapphalaṃ nāma. idaṃ pana mahādānaṃ attano uppattiyā aparisuddhatāya evaṃ appaphalaṃ nāma hoti, itaraṃ parittadānaṃ attano uppattiyā parisuddhatāya evaṃ mahapphalaṃ nāmāti imamatthaṃ dassento ^b^eva^eb^ntiādimāhāti. dutiyaṃ.

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^a^V1.0056^ea^ ^b^udānaṃ udānesī^eb^ti udāhāraṃ udāhari. yathā hi yaṃ telaṃ mānaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti vissanditvā gacchati, taṃ avasesakoti vuccati. yañca jalaṃ taḷākaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti, ajjhottharitvā gacchati, taṃ oghoti vuccati, evamevaṃ yaṃ pītivacanaṃ hadayaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti, adhikaṃ hutvā anto asaṇṭhahitvā bahi nikkhamati, taṃ ^b^udāna^eb^nti vuccati. evarūpaṃ pītimayaṃ vacanaṃ nicchāresīti attho. ^b^saddhāyapi sāhu dāna^eb^nti kammañca kammaphalañca saddahitvāpi dinnadānaṃ sāhu laddhakaṃ bhaddakameva. ^b^āhū^eb^ti ^a^P1.0061^ea^ kathenti. kathaṃ panetaṃ ubhayaṃ samaṃ nāma hotīti? jīvitabhīruko hi yujjhituṃ na sakkoti, khayabhīruko dātuṃ na sakkoti. ``jīvitañca rakkhissāmi yujjhissāmi cā''ti hi vadanto na yujjhati. jīvite pana ālayaṃ vissajjetvā, ``chejjaṃ vā hotu maraṇaṃ vā, gaṇhissāmetaṃ issariya''nti ussahantova yujjhati. ``bhoge ca rakkhissāmi, dānañca dassāmī''ti vadanto na dadāti. bhogesu pana ālayaṃ vissajjetvā mahādānaṃ dassāmīti ussahantova deti. evaṃ dānañca yuddhañca samaṃ hoti. kiñca bhiyyo? ^b^appāpi santā bahuke jinantī^eb^ti yathā ca yuddhe appakāpi vīrapurisā bahuke bhīrupurise jinanti, evaṃ saddhādisampanno appakampi dānaṃ dadanto bahumaccheraṃ maddati, bahuñca dānavipākaṃ adhigacchati. evampi dānañca yuddhañca samānaṃ. tenevāha --
[21] ``appampi ce saddahāno dadāti,
[22] teneva so hoti sukhī paratthā''ti..
[03] imassa ^a^M1.0059^ea^ ca panatthassa pakāsanatthaṃ ekasāṭakabrāhmaṇavatthu ca aṅkuravatthu ca vitthāretabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^dhammaladdhassā^eb^ti dhammena samena laddhassa bhogassa dhammaladdhassa ca puggalassa. ettha puggalo laddhadhammo nāma adhigatadhammo ariyapuggalo. iti yaṃ dhammaladdhassa bhogassa dānaṃ dhammaladdhassa ariyapuggalassa dīyati, tampi sādhūti attho. ^b^yo dhammaladdhassā^eb^ti imasmimpi gāthāpade ayameva attho. ^b^uṭṭhānavīriyādhigatassā^eb^ti uṭṭhānena ca vīriyena ca adhigatassa bhogassa. ^b^vetaraṇi^eb^nti ^a^V1.0057^ea^ desanāsīsamattametaṃ. yamassa pana vetaraṇimpi sañjīvakāḷasuttādayopi ekatiṃsamahānirayepi sabbasova atikkamitvāti attho.

[03] ^b^viceyya dāna^eb^nti vicinitvā dinnadānaṃ. tattha dve vicinanā dakkhiṇāvicinanaṃ dakkhiṇeyyavicinanañca. tesu lāmakalāmake paccaye apanetvā paṇītapaṇīte vicinitvā tesaṃ dānaṃ dakkhiṇāvicinanaṃ nāma. vipannasīle ^a^P1.0062^ea^ ito bahiddhā pañcanavutipāsaṇḍabhede vā dakkhiṇeyye pahāya sīlādiguṇasampannānaṃ sāsane pabbajitānaṃ dānaṃ dakkhiṇeyyavicinanaṃ nāma. evaṃ dvīhākārehi viceyya dānaṃ. ^b^sugatappasattha^eb^nti sugatena vaṇṇitaṃ. tattha dakkhiṇeyyavicinanaṃ dassento ^b^ye dakkhiṇeyyā^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^bījāni vuttāni yathā^eb^ti iminā pana dakkhiṇāvicinanaṃ āha. avipannabījasadisā hi vicinitvā gahitā paṇītapaṇītā deyyadhammāti.

[03] ^b^pāṇesupi sādhu saṃyamo^eb^ti pāṇesu saṃyatabhāvopi bhaddako. ayaṃ devatā itarāhi kathitaṃ dānānisaṃsaṃ atikkamitvā sīlānisaṃsaṃ kathetumāraddhā. ^b^aheṭhayaṃ cara^eb^nti avihiṃsanto caramāno. ^b^parūpavādā^eb^ti parassa upavādabhayena. ^b^bhayā^eb^ti upavādabhayā. ^b^dānā ca kho dhammapadaṃva seyyo^eb^ti dānato nibbānasaṅkhātaṃ dhammapadameva seyyo. ^b^pubbe ca hi pubbatare ca santo^eb^ti pubbe ca kassapabuddhādikāle pubbatare ca koṇāgamanabuddhādikāle, sabbepi vā ete pubbe ca pubbatare ca santo nāmāti. tatiyaṃ.

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^a^M1.0060^ea^ ^b^kamanīyānī^eb^ti rūpādīni iṭṭhārammaṇāni. ^b^apunāgamanaṃ anāgantā puriso maccudheyyā^eb^ti tebhūmakavaṭṭasaṅkhātā maccudheyyā apunāgamanasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ anāgantā. nibbānañhi sattā na punāgacchanti, tasmā taṃ apunāgamananti vuccati. taṃ kāmesu baddho ca pamatto ca anāgantā nāma hoti, so taṃ pāpuṇituṃ na sakkoti, tasmā evamāha. ^b^chandaja^eb^nti taṇhāchandato jātaṃ. ^b^agha^eb^nti pañcakkhandhadukkhaṃ. dutiyapadaṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^chandavinayā aghavinayo^eb^ti taṇhāvinayena pañcakkhandhavinayo ^a^P1.0063^ea^. ^b^aghavinayā dukkhavinayo^eb^ti pañcakkhandhavinayena vaṭṭadukkhaṃ vinītameva hoti. ^b^citrānī^eb^ti ārammaṇacittāni. ^b^saṅkapparāgo^eb^ti saṅkappitarāgo. evamettha vatthukāmaṃ paṭikkhipitvā kilesakāmo kāmoti vutto. ayaṃ panattho ^b^pasūrasuttena^eb^ ^a^V1.0058^ea^ (su0 ni0 830 ādayo) vibhāvetabbo. pasūraparibbājako hi therena ``saṅkapparāgo purisassa kāmo''ti vutte --
[21] ``na te kāmā yāni citrāni loke,
[27] saṅkapparāgañca vadesi kāmaṃ.
[26] saṅkappayaṃ akusale vitakke,
[22] bhikkhūpi te hehinti kāmabhogī''ti.. --
[25] āha. atha naṃ thero avoca --
[21] ``te ce kāmā yāni citrāni loke,
[27] saṅkapparāgaṃ na vadesi kāmaṃ.
[26] passanto rūpāni manoramāni,
[22] satthāpi te hehiti kāmabhogī..
[21] suṇanto saddāni, ghāyanto gandhāni.
[27] sāyanto rasāni, phusanto phassāni manoramāni.
[22] satthāpi te hehiti kāmabhogī''ti..

[03] ^b^athettha dhīrā^eb^ti atha etesu ārammaṇesu paṇḍitā chandarāgaṃ vinayanti. ^b^saṃyojanaṃ sabba^eb^nti dasavidhampi saṃyojanaṃ. ^b^akiñcana^eb^nti rāgakiñcanādivirahitaṃ. ^b^nānupatanti dukkhā^eb^ti vaṭṭadukkhā pana tassa upari na patanti. ^b^iccāyasmā^eb^ ^a^M1.0061^ea^ ^b^mogharājā^eb^ti, ``pahāsi saṅkha''nti gāthaṃ sutvā tassaṃ ^a^P1.0064^ea^ parisati anusandhikusalo mogharājā nāma thero ``imissā gāthāya attho na yathānusandhiṃ gato''ti cintetvā yathānusandhiṃ ghaṭento evamāha. tattha ^b^idha vā huraṃ vā^eb^ti idhaloke vā paraloke vā. ^b^naruttamaṃ atthacaraṃ narāna^eb^nti kiñcāpi sabbe khīṇāsavā naruttamā ceva atthacarā ca narānaṃ, thero pana dasabalaṃ sandhāyevamāha. ^b^ye taṃ namassanti pasaṃsiyā te^eb^ti yadi tathāvimuttaṃ devamanussā namassanti, atha ye taṃ bhagavantaṃ kāyena vā vācāya vā anupaṭipattiyā vā namassanti, te kiṃ pasaṃsiyā, udāhu apasaṃsiyāti. ^b^bhikkhūti^eb^ mogharājattheraṃ ^a^V1.0059^ea^ ālapati. ^b^aññāya dhamma^eb^nti catusaccadhammaṃ jānitvā. ^b^saṅgātigā tepi bhavantī^eb^ti ye taṃ kāyena vā vācāya vā anupaṭipattiyā vā namassanti. te catusaccadhammaṃ aññāya vicikicchaṃ pahāya saṅgātigāpi honti, pasaṃsiyāpi hontīti. catutthaṃ.

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^ujjhānasaññikā^eb^ti ujjhānasaññī devaloko nāma pāṭiyekko natthi, imā pana devatā tathāgatassa catupaccayaparibhogaṃ nissāya ujjhāyamānā āgatā. tāsaṃ kira evaṃ ahosi -- ``samaṇo gotamo bhikkhūnaṃ paṃsukūlacīvara-piṇḍiyālopa-rukkhamūlasenāsanapūtimuttabhesajjehi santosasseva pariyantakāritaṃ vaṇṇeti, sayaṃ pana pattuṇṇadukūla khomādīni paṇītacīvarāni dhāreti, rājārahaṃ uttamaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjati, devavimānakappāya gandhakuṭiyā varasayane sayati, sappinavanītādīni bhesajjāni paṭisevati, divasaṃ mahājanassa dhammaṃ deseti, vacanamassa aññato gacchati, kiriyā aññato''ti ujjhāyamānā āgamiṃsu. tena tāsaṃ dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi ``ujjhānasaññikā''ti nāmaṃ gahitaṃ.

[03] ^b^aññathā santa^eb^nti aññenākārena bhūtaṃ. ^b^nikaccā^eb^ti nikatiyā vañcanāya, vañcetvāti attho. ^b^kitavassevā^eb^ti kitavo vuccati sākuṇiko. so ^a^M1.0062^ea^ hi agumbova samāno sākhapaṇṇādipaṭicchādanena gumbavaṇṇaṃ dassetvā upagate moratittirādayo ^a^P1.0065^ea^ sakuṇe māretvā dārabharaṇaṃ karoti. iti tassa kitavassa imāya vañcanāya evaṃ vañcetvā sakuṇamaṃsabhojanaṃ viya kuhakassāpi paṃsukūlena attānaṃ paṭicchādetvā kathāchekatāya mahājanaṃ vañcetvā khādamānassa vicarato. ^b^bhuttaṃ theyyena tassa ta^eb^nti sabbopi tassa catupaccayaparibhogo theyyena paribhutto nāma hotīti devatā bhagavantaṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^parijānanti paṇḍitā^eb^ti ayaṃ kārako vā akārako vāti paṇḍitā jānanti. iti tā devatā ``tathāgatāpi mayameva paṇḍitā''ti maññamānā evamāhaṃsu.

[03] atha bhagavā ^b^nayida^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^yāyaṃ paṭipadā daḷhā^eb^ti ayaṃ dhammānudhammapaṭipadā daḷhā thirā. yāya paṭipadāya dhīrā paṇḍitā ārammaṇūpanijjhānena lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena cāti dvīhi jhānehi jhāyino mārabandhanā pamuccanti, taṃ paṭipadaṃ bhāsitamattena vā savanamattena vā okkamituṃ ^a^V1.0060^ea^ paṭipajjituṃ na sakkāti attho. ^b^na ve dhīrā pakubbantī^eb^ti dhīrā paṇḍitā viditvā lokapariyāyaṃ saṅkhāralokassa udayabbayaṃ ñatvā catusaccadhammañca aññāya kilesanibbānena nibbutā loke visattikaṃ tiṇṇā evaṃ na kubbanti, mayaṃ evarūpāni na kathemāti attho.

[01] ^b^pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhahitvā^eb^ti ``ayuttaṃ amhehi kataṃ, akārakameva mayaṃ kārakavādena samudācarimhā''ti lajjamānā mahābrahmani viya bhagavati gāravaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā aggikkhandhaṃ viya bhagavantaṃ durāsadaṃ katvā passamānā ākāsato otaritvā bhūmiyaṃ ṭhatvāti attho. ^b^accayo^eb^ti aparādho. ^b^no, bhante, accāgamā^eb^ti amhe atikkamma abhibhavitvā pavatto. ^b^āsādetabba^eb^nti ghaṭṭayitabbaṃ. tā kira devatā bhagavantaṃ kāyena vācāyāti dvīhipi ghaṭṭayiṃsu. tathāgataṃ avanditvā ākāse patiṭṭhamānā kāyena ghaṭṭayiṃsu, kitavopamaṃ āharitvā nānappakārakaṃ asabbhivādaṃ vadamānā vācāya ghaṭṭayiṃsu. tasmā āsādetabbaṃ amaññimhāti āhaṃsu. ^b^paṭiggaṇhātū^eb^ti khamatu. ^b^āyatiṃ saṃvarāyā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0063^ea^ anāgate saṃvaraṇatthāya, puna evarūpassa aparādhassa dosassa akaraṇatthāya.

[03] ^b^sitaṃ^eb^ ^a^P1.0066^ea^ ^b^pātvākāsī^eb^ti aggadante dassento pahaṭṭhākāraṃ dassesi. kasmā? tā kira devatā na sabhāvena khamāpenti, lokiyamahājanañca sadevake loke aggapuggalaṃ tathāgatañca ekasadisaṃ karonti. atha bhagavā ``parato kathāya uppannāya buddhabalaṃ dīpetvā pacchā khamissāmī''ti sitaṃ pātvākāsi. ^b^bhiyyoso mattāyā^eb^ti atirekappamāṇena. ^b^imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsī^eb^ti kupito esa amhākanti maññamānā abhāsi.

[03] ^b^na paṭigaṇhatī^eb^ti na khamati nādhivāseti. ^b^kopantaro^eb^ti abbhantare uppannakopo. ^b^dosagarū^eb^ti dosaṃ garuṃ katvā ādāya viharanto. ^b^sa veraṃ paṭimuñcatī^eb^ti so evarūpo gaṇṭhikaṃ paṭimuñcanto viya taṃ veraṃ attani paṭimuñcati ṭhapeti, na paṭinissajjatīti attho. ^b^accayo ce na vijjethā^eb^ti sace accāyikakammaṃ na bhaveyya. ^b^no cidhāpagataṃ siyā^eb^ti yadi aparādho nāma na bhāveyya. ^b^kenīdha kusalo siyā^eb^ti yadi verāni na sammeyyuṃ, kena kāraṇena kusalo bhaveyya.

[03] ^b^kassaccayā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0061^ea^ gāthāya kassa atikkamo natthi? kassa aparādho natthi? ko sammohaṃ nāpajjati? ko niccameva paṇḍito nāmāti attho? imaṃ kira gāthaṃ bhaṇāpanatthaṃ bhagavato sitapātukammaṃ. tasmā idāni devatānaṃ buddhabalaṃ dīpetvā khamissāmīti ^b^tathāgatassa buddhassā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^tathāgatassā^eb^ti tathā āgatoti evamādīhi kāraṇehi tathāgatassa. ^b^buddhassā^eb^ti catunnaṃ saccānaṃ buddhattādīhi kāraṇehi vimokkhantikapaṇṇattivasena evaṃ laddhanāmassa. ^b^accayaṃ desayantīna^eb^nti yaṃ vuttaṃ tumhehi ``accayaṃ desayantīnaṃ...pe0... sa veraṃ paṭimuñcatī''ti, taṃ sādhu vuttaṃ, ahaṃ pana taṃ veraṃ nābhinandāmi na patthayāmīti attho. ^b^paṭiggaṇhāmi voccaya^eb^nti tumhākaṃ aparādhaṃ khamāmīti. pañcamaṃ.

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^a^M1.0064^ea^ ^b^saddhā dutiyā purisassa hotī^eb^ti purisassa devaloke manussaloke ceva nibbānañca gacchantassa saddhā dutiyā hoti, sahāyakiccaṃ sādheti. ^b^no ce assaddhiyaṃ avatiṭṭhatī^eb^ti yadi ^a^P1.0067^ea^ assaddhiyaṃ na tiṭṭhati. ^b^yaso^eb^ti parivāro. ^b^kittī^eb^ti vaṇṇabhaṇanaṃ. ^b^tatvassa hotī^eb^ti tato assa hoti. ^b^nānupatanti saṅgā^eb^ti rāgasaṅgādayo pañca saṅgā na anupatanti. ^b^pamādamanuyuñjantī^eb^ti ye pamādaṃ karonti nibbattenti, te taṃ anuyuñjanti nāma. ^b^dhanaṃ seṭṭhaṃva rakkhatī^eb^ti muttāmaṇisārādiuttamadhanaṃ viya rakkhati. ^b^jhāyanto^eb^ti lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena ca ārammaṇūpanijjhānena ca jhāyanto. tattha ^b^lakkhaṇūpanijjhānaṃ^eb^ nāma vipassanāmaggaphalāni. vipassanā hi tīṇi lakkhaṇāni upanijjhāyatīti lakkhaṇūpanijjhānaṃ. maggo vipassanāya āgatakiccaṃ sādhetīti lakkhaṇūpanijjhānaṃ. phalaṃ tathalakkhaṇaṃ nirodhasaccaṃ upanijjhāyatīti lakkhaṇūpanijjhānaṃ. aṭṭha samāpattiyo pana kasiṇārammaṇassa upanijjhāyanato ^b^ārammaṇūpanijjhāna^eb^nti veditabbā. ^b^paramaṃ^eb^ nāma arahattasukhaṃ adhippetanti. chaṭṭhaṃ.

[03] 37^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^sakkesū^eb^ti ``sakyā vata, bho kumārā''ti (dī0 ni0 1.267) udānaṃ paṭicca sakkāti laddhanāmānaṃ rājakumārānaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado rūḷhīsaddena sakkāti vuccati ^a^V1.0062^ea^. tasmiṃ sakkesu janapade. ^b^mahāvane^eb^ti sayaṃjāte aropime himavantena saddhiṃ ekābaddhe mahati vane. ^b^sabbeheva arahantehī^eb^ti imaṃ suttaṃ kathitadivaseyeva pattārahantehi.

[03] tatrāyaṃ anupubbikathā -- sākiyakoliyā hi kira kapilavatthunagarassa ca koliyanagarassa ca antare rohiṇiṃ nāma nadiṃ ekeneva āvaraṇena bandhāpetvā sassāni kārenti. atha jeṭṭhamūlamāse sassesu milāyantesu ubhayanagaravāsīnampi kammakārā sannipatiṃsu. tattha koliyanagaravāsino āhaṃsu -- ``idaṃ udakaṃ ubhayato āhariyamānaṃ na tumhākaṃ, na amhākaṃ pahossati ^a^P1.0068^ea^, amhākaṃ pana sassaṃ ekena udakeneva nipphajjissati, idaṃ udakaṃ amhākaṃ dethā''ti. kapilavatthuvāsino āhaṃsu -- ``tumhesu koṭṭhe pūretvā ṭhitesu mayaṃ rattasuvaṇṇanīlamaṇikāḷakahāpaṇe ^a^M1.0065^ea^ ca gahetvā pacchipasibbakādihatthā na sakkhissāma tumhākaṃ gharadvāre vicarituṃ, amhākampi sassaṃ ekeneva udakena nipphajjissati, idaṃ udakaṃ amhākaṃ dethā''ti. ``na mayaṃ dassāmā''ti. ``mayampi na dassāmā''ti. evaṃ kathaṃ vaḍḍhetvā eko uṭṭhāya ekassa pahāraṃ adāsi, sopi aññassāti evaṃ aññamaññaṃ paharitvā rājakulānaṃ jātiṃ ghaṭṭetvā kalahaṃ vaḍḍhayiṃsu.

[03] koliyakammakārā vadanti -- ``tumhe kapilavatthuvāsike gahetvā gajjatha, ye soṇasiṅgālādayo viya attano bhaginīhi saddhiṃ saṃvasiṃsu, etesaṃ hatthino ca assā ca phalakāvudhāni ca amhākaṃ kiṃ karissantī''ti? sākiyakammakārā vadanti -- ``tumhe dāni kuṭṭhino dārake gahetvā gajjatha, ye anāthā niggatikā tiracchānā viya kolarukkhe vasiṃsu, etesaṃ hatthino ca assā ca phalakāvudhāni ca amhākaṃ kiṃ karissantī''ti? te gantvā tasmiṃ kamme niyuttāmaccānaṃ kathesuṃ, amaccā rājakulānaṃ kathesuṃ. tato sākiyā -- ``bhaginīhi saddhiṃ saṃvasitakānaṃ thāmañca balañca dassessāmā''ti yuddhasajjā nikkhamiṃsu. koliyāpi -- ``kolarukkhavāsīnaṃ thāmañca balañca dassessāmā''ti yuddhasajjā nikkhamiṃsu.

[03] bhagavāpi rattiyā paccūsasamayeva mahākaruṇāsamāpattito uṭṭhāya lokaṃ volokento ime evaṃ yuddhasajje nikkhamante addasa. disvā -- ``mayi gate ayaṃ kalaho vūpasammissati nu kho udāhu no''ti upadhārento -- ``ahamettha gantvā kalahavūpasamanatthaṃ tīṇi jātakāni kathessāmi, tato kalaho vūpasammissati. atha sāmaggidīpanatthāya dve jātakāni kathetvā ^b^attadaṇḍasuttaṃ^eb^ ^a^V1.0063^ea^ desessāmi. desanaṃ sutvā ^a^P1.0069^ea^ ubhayanagaravāsinopi aḍḍhatiyāni aḍḍhatiyāni kumārasatāni dassanti, ahaṃ te pabbājessāmi, tadā mahāsamāgamo bhavissatī''ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ akāsi. tasmā imesu yuddhasajjesu nikkhamantesu kassaci anārocetvā sayameva pattacīvaramādāya gantvā dvinnaṃ senānaṃ antare ākāse pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo vissajjetvā nisīdi.

[03] kapilavatthuvāsino bhagavantaṃ disvāva, ``amhākaṃ ñātiseṭṭho satthā āgato. diṭṭho nu kho tena amhākaṃ kalahakaraṇabhāvo''ti cintetvā, ``na kho pana sakkā bhagavati āgate amhehi parassa sarīre satthaṃ ^a^M1.0066^ea^ pātetuṃ. koliyanagaravāsino amhe hanantu vā bajjhantu vā''ti. āvudhāni chaḍḍetvā, bhagavantaṃ vanditvā, nisīdiṃsu. koliyanagaravāsinopi tatheva cintetvā āvudhāni chaḍḍetvā, bhagavantaṃ vanditvā, nisīdiṃsu.

[03] bhagavā jānantova, ``kasmā āgatattha, mahārājā''ti pucchi? ``na, bhagavā, titthakīḷāya na pabbatakīḷāya, na nadīkīḷāya, na giridassanatthaṃ, imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne saṅgāmaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā āgatamhā''ti. ``kiṃ nissāya vo kalaho, mahārājāti? udakaṃ, bhanteti. udakaṃ kiṃ agghati, mahārājāti? appaṃ, bhanteti. pathavī nāma kiṃ agghati, mahārājāti? anagghā, bhanteti. khattiyā kiṃ agghantīti? khattiyā nāma anagghā, bhanteti. appamūlaṃ udakaṃ nissāya kimatthaṃ anagghe khattiye nāsetha, mahārāja, kalahe assādo nāma natthi, kalahavasena, mahārāja, aṭṭhāne veraṃ katvā ekāya rukkhadevatāya kāḷasīhena saddhiṃ baddhāghāto sakalampi imaṃ kappaṃ anuppattoyevāti vatvā ^b^phandanajātakaṃ^eb^ (jā0 1.13.14 ādayo) kathesi''. tato ``parapattiyena nāma, mahārāja, na bhavitabbaṃ. parapattiyā hutvā hi ekassa sasakassa kathāya tiyojanasahassavitthate himavante catuppadagaṇā mahāsamuddaṃ pakkhandino ^a^P1.0070^ea^ ahesuṃ. tasmā parapattiyena na bhavitabba''nti vatvā, ^b^pathavīundriyajātakaṃ^eb^ kathesi. tato ``kadāci, mahārāja, dubbalopi mahābalassa randhaṃ vivaraṃ passati, kadāci mahābalo dubbalassa. laṭukikāpi hi sakuṇikā hatthināgaṃ ghātesī''ti ^b^laṭukikajātakaṃ^eb^ (jā0 1.5.39 ādayo) kathesi. evaṃ kalahavūpasamanatthāya tīṇi jātakāni kathetvā sāmaggiparidīpanatthāya dve jātakāni kathesi. kathaṃ? ``samaggānañhi, mahārāja, koci otāraṃ nāma passituṃ na sakkotīti vatvā, ^b^rukkhadhammajātakaṃ^eb^ (jā0 1.1.74) kathesi ^a^V1.0064^ea^. tato ``samaggānaṃ, mahārāja, koci vivaraṃ dassituṃ na sakkhi. yadā pana aññamaññaṃ vivādamakaṃsu, atha te nesādaputto jīvitā voropetvā ādāya gatoti vivāde assādo nāma natthī''ti vatvā, ^b^vaṭṭakajātakaṃ^eb^ (jā0 1.1.118) kathesi. evaṃ imāni pañca jātakāni kathetvā avasāne ^b^attadaṇḍasuttaṃ^eb^ (su0 ni0 941 ādayo) kathesi.

[03] rājāno pasannā -- ``sace satthā nāgamissa, mayaṃ sahatthā aññamaññaṃ vadhitvā lohitanadiṃ pavattayissāma. amhākaṃ puttabhātaro ca gehadvāre ^a^M1.0067^ea^ na passeyyāma, sāsanapaṭisāsanampi no āharaṇako nābhavissa. satthāraṃ nissāya no jīvitaṃ laddhaṃ. sace pana satthā āgāraṃ ajjhāvasissa dīpasahassadvayaparivāraṃ catumahādīparajjamassa hatthagataṃ abhavissa, atirekasahassaṃ kho panassa puttā abhavissaṃsu, tato khattiyaparivāro avicarissa. taṃ kho panesa sampattiṃ pahāya nikkhamitvā sambodhiṃ patto. idānipi khattiyaparivāroyeva vicaratū''ti ubhayanagaravāsino aḍḍhatiyāni aḍḍhatiyāni kumārasatāni adaṃsu. bhagavāpi te pabbājetvā mahāvanaṃ agamāsi. tesaṃ garugāravena na attano ruciyā pabbajitānaṃ anabhirati uppajji. purāṇadutiyikāyopi tesaṃ -- ``ayyaputtā ukkaṇṭhantu, gharāvāso na saṇṭhātī''tiādīni vatvā sāsanaṃ pesenti. te ca atirekataraṃ ukkaṇṭhiṃsu.

[03] bhagavā āvajjento tesaṃ anabhiratibhāvaṃ ñatvā -- ``ime bhikkhū mādisena buddhena saddhiṃ ekato vasantā ukkaṇṭhanti, handa nesaṃ ^a^P1.0071^ea^ kuṇāladahassa vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā tattha netvā anabhiratiṃ vinodemī''ti kuṇāladahassa vaṇṇaṃ kathesi. te taṃ daṭṭhukāmā ahesuṃ. daṭṭhukāmattha, bhikkhave, kuṇāladahanti? āma bhagavāti. yadi evaṃ etha gacchāmāti. iddhimantānaṃ bhagavā gamanaṭṭhānaṃ mayaṃ kathaṃ gamissāmāti. tumhe gantukāmā hotha, ahaṃ mamānubhāvena gahetvā gamissāmīti. sādhu, bhanteti. bhagavā pañca bhikkhusatāni gahetvā ākāse uppatitvā kuṇāladahe patiṭṭhāya te bhikkhū āha -- ``bhikkhave, imasmiṃ kuṇāladahe yesaṃ macchānaṃ nāmaṃ na jānātha mamaṃ pucchathā''ti.

[03] te pucchiṃsu. bhagavā pucchitaṃ pucchitaṃ kathesi. na kevalañca, macchānaṃyeva, tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe rukkhānampi pabbatapāde dvipadacatuppadasakuṇānampi nāmāni pucchāpetvā kathesi. atha dvīhi ^a^V1.0065^ea^ sakuṇehi mukhatuṇḍakena ḍaṃsitvā gahitadaṇḍake nisinno kuṇālasakuṇarājā purato pacchato ubhosu ca passesu sakuṇasaṅghaparivuto āgacchati. bhikkhū taṃ disvā -- ``esa, bhante, imesaṃ sakuṇānaṃ rājā bhavissati, parivārā ete etassā''ti maññāmāti. evametaṃ, bhikkhave, ayampi mameva vaṃso mama paveṇīti. idāni tāva mayaṃ, bhante, ete sakuṇe passāma. yaṃ pana bhagavā ^a^M1.0068^ea^ ``ayampi mameva vaṃso mama paveṇī''ti āha, taṃ sotukāmamhāti. sotukāmattha, bhikkhaveti? āma bhagavāti. tena hi suṇāthāti tīhi gāthāsatehi maṇḍetvā ^b^kuṇālajātakaṃ^eb^ (jā0 2.21.kuṇālajātaka) kathento anabhiratiṃ vinodesi. desanāpariyosāne sabbepi sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu, maggeneva ca nesaṃ iddhipi āgatā. bhagavā ``hotu tāva ettakaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūna''nti ākāse uppatitvā mahāvanameva agamāsi. tepi bhikkhū gamanakāle dasabalassa ānubhāvena gantvā āgamanakāle attano ānubhāvena bhagavantaṃ parivāretvā mahāvane otariṃsu.

[03] bhagavā paññattāsane nisīditvā te bhikkhū āmantetvā -- ``etha, bhikkhave, nisīdatha. uparimaggattayavajjhānaṃ vo kilesānaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathessāmī''ti kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathesi. bhikkhū cintayiṃsu -- ``bhagavā amhākaṃ anabhiratabhāvaṃ ñatvā kuṇāladahaṃ netvā anabhiratiṃ ^a^P1.0072^ea^ vinodesi, tattha sotāpattiphalaṃ pattānaṃ no idāni idha tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ adāsi, na kho pana amhehi `sotāpannā maya'nti vītināmetuṃ vaṭṭati, purisapurisehi no bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī''ti te dasabalassa pāde vanditvā uṭṭhāya nisīdanaṃ papphoṭetvā visuṃ visuṃ pabbhārarukkhamūlesu nisīdiṃsu.

[03] bhagavā cintesi -- ``ime bhikkhū pakatiyāpi avissaṭṭhakammaṭṭhānā, laddhupāyassa pana bhikkhuno kilamanakāraṇaṃ nāma natthi. gacchantā gacchantā ca vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ patvā `attanā paṭividdhaguṇaṃ ārocessāmā'ti mama santikaṃ āgamissanti. etesu āgatesu dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatā ekacakkavāḷe sannipatissanti, mahāsamayo bhavissati, vivitte okāse mayā nisīdituṃ vaṭṭatī''ti tato vivitte okāse buddhāsanaṃ paññāpetvā nisīdi.

[03] sabbapaṭhamaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā gatatthero saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. ^b^tato aparo tato aparo^eb^ti pañcasatāpi paduminiyaṃ padumāni viya vikasiṃsu. sabbapaṭhamaṃ arahattaṃ pattabhikkhu ^a^V1.0066^ea^ ``bhagavato ārocessāmī''ti pallaṅkaṃ vinibbhujitvā nisīdanaṃ papphoṭetvā uṭṭhāya dasabalābhimukho ahosi. ^b^evaṃ aparopi aparopī^eb^ti pañcasatā bhattasālaṃ pavisantā ^a^M1.0069^ea^ viya paṭipāṭiyāva āgamiṃsu. paṭhamaṃ āgato vanditvā nisīdanaṃ paññāpetvā, ekamantaṃ nisīditvā, paṭividdhaguṇaṃ ārocetukāmo ``atthi nu kho añño koci? natthī''ti nivattitvā āgatamaggaṃ olokento aparampi addasa aparampi addasayevāti sabbepi te āgantvā ekamantaṃ nisīditvā, ayaṃ imassa harāyamāno na kathesi, ayaṃ imassa harāyamāno na kathesi. khīṇāsavānaṃ kira dve ākārā honti -- ``aho vata mayā paṭividdhaguṇaṃ sadevako loko khippameva paṭivijjheyyā''ti cittaṃ uppajjati. paṭividdhabhāvaṃ pana nidhiladdhapuriso viya na aññassa ārocetukāmā honti.

[03] evaṃ osaṭamatte pana tasmiṃ ariyamaṇḍale pācīnayugandharaparikkhepato abbhā ^a^P1.0073^ea^ mahikā dhūmo rajo rāhūti, imehi upakkilesehi vippamuttaṃ buddhuppādapaṭimaṇḍitassa lokassa rāmaṇeyyakadassanatthaṃ pācīnadisāya ukkhittarajatamayamahāādāsamaṇḍalaṃ viya, nemivaṭṭiyaṃ gahetvā, parivattiyamānarajatacakkasassirikaṃ puṇṇacandamaṇḍalaṃ ullaṅghitvā, anilapathaṃ paṭipajjittha. iti evarūpe khaṇe laye muhutte bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṃ mahāvane mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehi sabbeheva arahantehi.

[03] tattha bhagavāpi mahāsammatassa vaṃse uppanno, tepi pañcasatā bhikkhū mahāsammatassa kule uppannā. bhagavāpi khattiyagabbhe jāto, tepi khattiyagabbhe jātā. bhagavāpi rājapabbajito, tepi rājapabbajitā. bhagavāpi setacchattaṃ pahāya hatthagataṃ cakkavattirajjaṃ nissajjitvā pabbajito, tepi setacchattaṃ pahāya hatthagatāni rajjāni vissajjitvā pabbajitā. iti bhagavā parisuddhe okāse, parisuddhe rattibhāge, sayaṃ parisuddho parisuddhaparivāro, vītarāgo vītarāgaparivāro, vītadoso vītadosaparivāro, vītamoho vītamohaparivāro, nittaṇho nittaṇhaparivāro, nikkileso nikkilesaparivāro, santo santaparivāro, danto dantaparivāro, mutto muttaparivāro, ativiya virocatīti. vaṇṇabhūmi nāmesā, yattakaṃ sakkoti, tattakaṃ vattabbaṃ. iti ime bhikkhū sandhāya vuttaṃ, ``pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehi sabbeheva arahantehī''ti.

[03] ^b^yebhuyyenā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0067^ea^ ^a^M1.0070^ea^ bahutarā sannipatitā, mandā na sannipatitā asaññī arūpāvacaradevatā samāpannadevatāyo ca. tatrāyaṃ sannipātakkamo -- mahāvanassa kira sāmantā devatā caliṃsu, ``āyāma bho! buddhadassanaṃ nāma bahūpakāraṃ, dhammassavanaṃ bahūpakāraṃ, bhikkhusaṅghadassanaṃ bahūpakāraṃ. āyāma āyāmā''ti! mahāsaddaṃ ^a^P1.0074^ea^ kurumānā āgantvā bhagavantañca taṃmuhuttaṃ arahattappattakhīṇāsave ca vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu. eteneva upāyena tāsaṃ tāsaṃ saddaṃ sutvā saddantarāḍḍhagāvutagāvutāḍḍhayojanayojanādivasena tiyojanasahassavitthate himavante, tikkhattuṃ tesaṭṭhiyā nagarasahassesu, navanavutiyā doṇamukhasatasahassesu, chanavutiyā paṭṭanakoṭisatasahassesu, chapaṇṇāsāya ratanākaresūti sakalajambudīpe, pubbavidehe, aparagoyāne, uttarakurumhi, dvīsu parittadīpasahassesūti sakalacakkavāḷe, tato dutiyatatiyacakkavāḷeti evaṃ dasasahassacakkavāḷesu devatā sannipatitāti veditabbā. dasasahassacakkavāḷañhi idha dasalokadhātuyoti adhippetaṃ. tena vuttaṃ -- ``dasahi ca lokadhātūhi devatā yebhuyyena sannipatitā hontī''ti.

[03] evaṃ sannipatitāhi devatāhi sakalacakkavāḷagabbhaṃ yāva brahmalokā sūcighare nirantaraṃ pakkhittasūcīhi viya paripuṇṇaṃ hoti. tattha brahmalokassa evaṃ uccattanaṃ veditabbaṃ -- lohapāsāde kira sattakūṭāgārasamo pāsāṇo brahmaloke ṭhatvā adho khitto catūhi māsehi pathaviṃ pāpuṇāti. evaṃ mahante okāse yathā heṭṭhā ṭhatvā khittāni pupphāni vā dhūmo vā upari gantuṃ, upari vā ṭhatvā khittasāsapā heṭṭhā otarituṃ antaraṃ na labhanti, evaṃ nirantarā devatā ahesuṃ. yathā kho pana cakkavattirañño nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ asambādhaṃ hoti, āgatāgatā mahesakkhā khattiyā okāsaṃ labhantiyeva, parato parato pana atisambādhaṃ hoti. evameva bhagavato nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ asambādhaṃ, āgatāgatā mahesakkhā devā ca brahmāno ca okāsaṃ labhantiyeva. api sudaṃ bhagavato āsannāsannaṭṭhāne vālagganittudanamatte padese dasapi vīsatipi devā sukhume attabhāve māpetvā aṭṭhaṃsu. sabbaparato saṭṭhi saṭṭhi devatā aṭṭhaṃsu.

[03] ^b^suddhāvāsakāyikāna^eb^nti ^a^M1.0071^ea^ ^a^P1.0075^ea^ suddhāvāsavāsīnaṃ. suddhāvāsā nāma suddhānaṃ anāgāmikhīṇāsavānaṃ āvāsā pañca brahmalokā. ^b^etadahosī^eb^ti kasmā ahosi? te kira brahmāno samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā yathā paricchedena vuṭṭhitā brahmabhavanaṃ olokentā pacchābhatte bhattagehaṃ viya suññataṃ addasaṃsu. tato ``kuhiṃ brahmāno gatā''ti āvajjantā mahāsamāgamaṃ ñatvā ^a^V1.0068^ea^ -- ``ayaṃ samāgamo mahā, mayaṃ ohīnā, ohīnakānaṃ pana okāso dullabho hoti, tasmā gacchantā atucchahatthā hutvā ekekaṃ gāthaṃ abhisaṅkharitvā gacchāma. tāya mahāsamāgame ca attano āgatabhāvaṃ jānāpessāma, dasabalassa ca vaṇṇaṃ bhāsissāmā''ti. iti tesaṃ samāpattito uṭṭhāya āvajjitattā etadahosi.

[03] ^b^bhagavato purato pāturahesu^eb^nti pāḷiyaṃ bhagavato santike abhimukhaṭṭhāneyeva otiṇṇā viya katvā vuttā, na kho panettha evaṃ attho veditabbo. te pana brahmaloke ṭhitāyeva gāthā abhisaṅkharitvā eko puratthimacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ otari, eko dakkhiṇacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ, eko pacchimacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ, eko uttaracakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ otari. tato puratthimacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ otiṇṇabrahmā nīlakasiṇaṃ samāpajjitvā nīlarasmiyo vissajjetvā dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatānaṃ maṇivammaṃ paṭimuñcanto viya attano āgatabhāvaṃ jānāpetvā buddhavīthi nāma kenaci uttarituṃ na sakkā, tasmā mahatiyā buddhavīthiyāva āgantvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho attanā abhisaṅkhataṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi.

[03] dakkhiṇacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ otiṇṇabrahmā pītakasiṇaṃ samāpajjitvā suvaṇṇapabhaṃ muñcitvā dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatānaṃ suvaṇṇapaṭaṃ pārupanto viya attano āgatabhāvaṃ jānāpetvā tatheva akāsi. pacchimacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ otiṇṇabrahmā lohitakasiṇaṃ samāpajjitvā lohitakarasmiyo muñcitvā dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatānaṃ rattavarakambalena parikkhipanto viya attano āgatabhāvaṃ jānāpetvā tatheva akāsi. uttaracakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ otiṇṇabrahmā odātakasiṇaṃ ^a^P1.0076^ea^ samāpajjitvā ^a^M1.0072^ea^ odātarasmiyo vissajjetvā dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatānaṃ sumanakusumapaṭaṃ pārupanto viya attano āgatabhāvaṃ jānāpetvā tatheva akāsi.

[03] pāḷiyaṃ pana ^b^bhagavato purato pāturahesuṃ. atha kho tā devatā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsū^eb^ti evaṃ ekakkhaṇe viya purato pātubhāvo ca abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ ṭhitabhāvo ca vutto, so iminā anukkamena ahosi, ekato katvā pana dassito. gāthābhāsanaṃ pana pāḷiyampi visuṃ visuṃyeva vuttaṃ.

[03] tattha ^a^V1.0069^ea^ ^b^mahāsamayo^eb^ti mahāsamūho. ^b^pavanaṃ^eb^ vuccati vanasaṇḍo. ubhayenapi bhagavā ``imasmiṃ pana vanasaṇḍe ajja mahāsamūho sannipāto''ti āha. tato yesaṃ so sannipāto, te dassetuṃ ^b^devakāyā samāgatā^eb^ti āha. tattha ^b^devakāyā^eb^ti devaghaṭā. ^b^āgatamha imaṃ dhammasamaya^eb^nti evaṃ samāgate devakāye disvā mayampi imaṃ dhammasamūhaṃ āgatā. kiṃ kāraṇā? ^b^dakkhitāye aparājitasaṅgha^eb^nti kenaci aparājitaṃ ajjeva tayo māre madditvā vijitasaṅgāmaṃ imaṃ aparājitasaṅghaṃ dassanatthāya āgatamhāti attho. so pana, brahmā, imaṃ gāthaṃ bhāsitvā, bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā, puratthimacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃyeva aṭṭhāsi.

[03] atha dutiyo vuttanayeneva āgantvā abhāsi. tattha ^b^tatra bhikkhavo^eb^ti tasmiṃ sannipātaṭṭhāne bhikkhū. ^b^samādahaṃsū^eb^ti samādhinā yojesuṃ. ^b^cittamattano ujukaṃ akaṃsū^eb^ti attano citte sabbe vaṅkakuṭilajimhabhāve haritvā ujukaṃ akariṃsu. ^b^sārathīva nettāni gahetvā^eb^ti yathā samappavattesu sindhavesu odhastapatodo sārathī sabbayottāni gahetvā acodento avārento tiṭṭhati, evaṃ chaḷaṅgupekkhāya samannāgatā guttadvārā sabbepete pañcasatā bhikkhū indriyāni rakkhanti paṇḍitā, ete daṭṭhuṃ idhāgatamhā bhagavāti, sopi gantvā yathāṭhāneyeva aṭṭhāsi.

[03] atha tatiyo vuttanayeneva āgantvā abhāsi. tattha ^b^chetvā khīla^eb^nti rāgadosamohakhīlaṃ chinditvā. ^b^paligha^eb^nti rāgadosamohapalighameva. ^b^indakhīla^eb^nti rāgadosamohaindakhīlameva ^a^P1.0077^ea^. ^b^ūhacca manejā^eb^ti ete taṇhāejāya anejā bhikkhū indakhīlaṃ ūhacca samūhanitvā catūsu disāsu appaṭihatacārikaṃ ^a^M1.0073^ea^ caranti. ^b^suddhā^eb^ti nirupakkilesā. ^b^vimalā^eb^ti nimmalā. idaṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^cakkhumatā^eb^ti pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumantena. ^b^sudantā^eb^ti cakkhutopi dantā sotatopi ghānatopi jivhātopi kāyatopi manatopi dantā. ^b^susunāgā^eb^ti taruṇanāgā. tatrāyaṃ vacanattho -- chandādīhi na gacchantīti ^b^nāgā,^eb^ tena tena maggena pahīne kilese na āgacchantīti nāgā, nānappakāraṃ āguṃ na karontīti nāgā. ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana mahāniddese (mahāni0 80) vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
[01] apica --
[21] ``āguṃ na karoti kiñci loke,
[27] sabbasaṃyoga visajja bandhanāni.
[26] sabbattha ^a^V1.0070^ea^ na sajjatī vimutto,
[22] nāgo tādi pavuccate tathattā''ti.. --

[25] evamettha attho veditabbo. ^b^susunāgā^eb^ti susū nāgā, susunāgabhāvasampattiṃ pattāti attho. te evarūpe anuttarena yoggācariyena damite taruṇanāge dassanāya āgatamha bhagavāti. sopi gantvā yathāṭhāneyeva aṭṭhāsi.
[03] atha catuttho vuttanayeneva āgantvā abhāsi. tattha ^b^gatāse^eb^ti nibbematikasaraṇagamanena gatā. sopi gantvā yathāṭhāneyeva aṭṭhāsīti. sattamaṃ.

[03] 38^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^maddakucchismi^eb^nti evaṃnāmake uyyāne. tañhi ajātasattumhi kucchigate tassa mātarā -- ``ayaṃ mayhaṃ kucchigato gabbho rañño sattu bhavissati. kiṃ me iminā''ti? gabbhapātanatthaṃ kucchi maddāpitā. tasmā ``maddakucchī''ti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ. migānaṃ pana abhayavāsatthāya dinnattā ^b^migadāyo^eb^ti vuccati.

[03] ^b^tena kho pana samayenā^eb^ti ettha ayaṃ anupubbikathā -- devadatto hi ajātasattuṃ nissāya dhanuggahe ca dhanapālakañca ^a^P1.0078^ea^ payojetvāpi tathāgatassa ^a^M1.0074^ea^ jīvitantarāyaṃ kātuṃ asakkonto ``sahattheneva māressāmī''ti gijjhakūṭapabbataṃ abhiruhitvā mahantaṃ kūṭāgārappamāṇaṃ silaṃ ukkhipitvā, ``samaṇo gotamo cuṇṇavicuṇṇo hotū''ti pavijjhi. mahāthāmavā kiresa pañcannaṃ hatthīnaṃ balaṃ dhāreti. aṭṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ, yaṃ buddhānaṃ parūpakkamena jīvitantarāyo bhaveyyāti taṃ tathāgatassa sarīrābhimukhaṃ āgacchantaṃ ākāse aññā silā uṭṭhahitvā sampaṭicchi. dvinnaṃ silānaṃ sampahārena mahanto pāsāṇassa sakalikā uṭṭhahitvā bhagavato piṭṭhipādapariyantaṃ abhihani, pādo mahāpharasunā pahato viya samuggatalohitena lākhārasamakkhito viya ahosi. bhagavā uddhaṃ ulloketvā devadattaṃ etadavoca -- ``bahu tayā moghapurisa, apuññaṃ pasutaṃ, yo tvaṃ paduṭṭhacitto vadhakacitto tathāgatassa lohitaṃ uppādesī''ti. tato paṭṭhāya bhagavato aphāsu jātaṃ. bhikkhū cintayiṃsu -- ``ayaṃ vihāro ujjaṅgalo ^a^V1.0071^ea^ visamo, bahūnaṃ khattiyādīnañceva pabbajitānañca anokāso''ti. te tathāgataṃ mañcasivikāya ādāya maddakucchiṃ nayiṃsu. tena vuttaṃ -- ``tena kho pana samayena bhagavato pādo sakalikāya khato hotī''ti.

[03] ^b^bhusā^eb^ti balavatiyo. ^b^suda^eb^nti nipātamattaṃ. ^b^dukkha^eb^nti sukhapaṭikkhepo. ^b^tibbā^eb^ti bahalā. ^b^kharā^eb^ti pharusā. ^b^kaṭukā^eb^ti tikhiṇā. ^b^asātā^eb^ti amadhurā. na tāsu mano appeti, na tā manaṃ appāyanti vaḍḍhentīti ^b^amanāpā. sato sampajāno^eb^ti vedanādhivāsanasatisampajaññena samannāgato hutvā. ^b^avihaññamāno^eb^ti apīḷiyamāno, samparivattasāyitāya vedanānaṃ vasaṃ agacchanto.

[03] ^b^sīhaseyya^eb^nti ettha kāmabhogiseyyā, petaseyyā, sīhaseyyā, tathāgataseyyāti catasso seyyā. tattha ``yebhuyyena, bhikkhave, kāmabhogī sattā vāmena passena sentī''ti ayaṃ kāmabhogiseyyā. tesu hi yebhuyyena dakkhiṇapassena ^a^P1.0079^ea^ sayāno nāma natthi. ``yebhuyyena, bhikkhave, petā uttānā sentī''ti ayaṃ petaseyyā. appamaṃsalohitattā hi aṭṭhisaṅghāṭajaṭitā ekena passena sayituṃ na sakkonti, uttānāva senti. ``yebhuyyena, bhikkhave, sīho migarājā naṅguṭṭhaṃ antarasatthimhi anupakkhipitvā dakkhiṇena passena setī''ti ayaṃ sīhaseyyā. tejussadattā ^a^M1.0075^ea^ hi sīho migarājā dve purimapāde ekasmiṃ, `pacchimapāde ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhapetvā naṅguṭṭhaṃ antarasatthimhi pakkhipitvā purimapādapacchimapādanaṅguṭṭhānaṃ ṭhitokāsaṃ sallakkhetvā dvinnaṃ purimapādānaṃ matthake sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā sayati, divasampi sayitvā pabujjhamāno na utrasanto pabujjhati, sīsaṃ pana ukkhipitvā purimapādādīnaṃ ṭhitokāsaṃ sallakkheti'. sace kiñci ṭhānaṃ vijahitvā ṭhitaṃ hoti, ``nayidaṃ tuyhaṃ jātiyā, na sūrabhāvassa anurūpa''nti anattamano hutvā tattheva sayati, na gocarāya pakkamati. avijahitvā ṭhite pana ``tuyhaṃ jātiyā ca sūrabhāvassa ca anurūpamida''nti haṭṭhatuṭṭho uṭṭhāya sīhavijambhitaṃ vijambhitvā kesarabhāraṃ vidhunitvā tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ naditvā gocarāya pakkamati. catutthajjhānaseyyā pana ``tathāgataseyyā''ti vuccati. tāsu idha sīhaseyyā āgatā. ayañhi tejussadairiyāpathattā uttamaseyyā nāma.

[03] ^b^pāde pāda^eb^nti dakkhiṇapāde vāmapādaṃ. ^b^accādhāyā^eb^ti atiādhāya, īsakaṃ atikkamma ṭhapetvā ^a^V1.0072^ea^. gopphakena hi gopphake jāṇunā vā jāṇumhi saṅghaṭṭiyamāne abhiṇhaṃ vedanā uppajjati, cittaṃ ekaggaṃ na hoti, seyyā aphāsukā hoti. yathā na saṅghaṭṭeti, evaṃ atikkamma ṭhapite vedanā nuppajjati, cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti, seyyā phāsu hoti. tasmā evaṃ nipajji. ^b^sato sampajāno^eb^ti sayanapariggāhakasatisampajaññena samannāgato. ``uṭṭhānasañña''nti panettha na vuttaṃ, gilānaseyyā hesā tathāgatassa.

[03] ^b^sattasatā^eb^ti ^a^P1.0080^ea^ imasmiṃ sutte sabbāpi tā devatā gilānaseyyaṭṭhānaṃ āgatā. ^b^udānaṃ udānesī^eb^ti gilānaseyyaṃ āgatānaṃ domanassena bhavitabbaṃ siyā. imāsaṃ pana tathāgatassa vedanādhivāsanaṃ disvā, ``aho buddhānaṃ mahānubhāvatā! evarūpāsu nāma vedanāsu vattamānāsu vikāramattampi natthi, sirīsayane alaṅkaritvā ṭhapitasuvaṇṇarūpakaṃ viya aniñjamānena kāyena nipanno, idānissa adhikataraṃ mukhavaṇṇo virocati, ābhāsampanno puṇṇacando viya sampati vikasitaṃ viya ca aravindaṃ assa mukhaṃ sobhati, kāyepi vaṇṇāyatanaṃ idāni susammaṭṭhakañcanaṃ viya vippasīdatī''ti udānaṃ udapādi.

[01] ^b^nāgo^eb^ ^a^M1.0076^ea^ ^b^vata bho^eb^ti, ettha ^b^bho^eb^ti dhammālapanaṃ. balavantaṭṭhena ^b^nāgo. nāgavatā^eb^ti nāgabhāvena. ^b^sīho vatā^eb^tiādīsu asantāsanaṭṭhena ^b^sīho^eb^. byattaparicayaṭṭhena kāraṇākāraṇajānanena vā ^b^ājānīyo^eb^. appaṭisamaṭṭhena ^b^nisabho^eb^. gavasatajeṭṭhako hi usabho, gavasahassajeṭṭhako vasabho, gavasatasahassajeṭṭhako nisabhoti vuccati. bhagavā pana appaṭisamaṭṭhena āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti. tenevatthena idha ``nisabho''ti vutto. dhuravāhaṭṭhena ^b^dhorayho^eb^. nibbisevanaṭṭhena ^b^danto^eb^.

[01] ^b^passā^eb^ti aniyamitāṇatti. ^b^samādhi^eb^nti arahattaphalasamādhiṃ. ^b^suvimutta^eb^nti phalavimuttiyā suvimuttaṃ. rāgānugataṃ pana cittaṃ abhinataṃ nāma hoti, dosānugataṃ apanataṃ. tadubhayapaṭikkhepena ^b^na cābhinataṃ na cāpanata^eb^nti āha. ^b^na ca sasaṅkhāraniggayhavāritagata^eb^nti na sasaṅkhārena sappayogena kilese niggahetvā vāritavataṃ, kilesānaṃ pana chinnattā vataṃ phalasamādhinā samāhitanti attho. ^b^atikkamitabba^eb^nti viheṭhetabbaṃ ghaṭṭetabbaṃ. ^b^adassanā^eb^ti aññāṇā. aññāṇī hi andhabālova evarūpe satthari aparajjheyyāti devadattaṃ ghaṭṭayamānā vadanti.

[03] ^b^pañcavedā^eb^ti ^a^P1.0081^ea^ itihāsapañcamānaṃ vedānaṃ dhārakā. ^b^sataṃ sama^eb^nti vassasataṃ. ^b^tapassī^eb^ti tapanissitakā ^a^V1.0073^ea^ hutvā. ^b^cara^eb^nti carantā. ^b^na sammāvimutta^eb^nti sacepi evarūpā brāhmaṇā vassasataṃ caranti, cittañca nesaṃ sammā vimuttaṃ na hoti. ^b^hīnattarūpā na pāraṃ gamā te^eb^ti hīnattasabhāvā te nibbānaṅgamā na honti. ``hīnattharūpā''tipi pāṭho, hīnatthajātikā parihīnatthāti attho. ^b^taṇhādhipannā^eb^ti taṇhāya ajjhotthaṭā. ^b^vatasīlabaddhā^eb^ti ajavatakukkuravatādīhi ca vatehi tādiseheva ca sīlehi baddhā. ^b^lūkhaṃ tapa^eb^nti pañcātapatāpanaṃ kaṇṭakaseyyādikaṃ tapaṃ. idāni sā devatā sāsanassa niyyānikabhāvaṃ kathentī ^b^na mānakāmassā^eb^tiādimāha. taṃ vuttatthamevāti. aṭṭhamaṃ.

[03] 39^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^pajjunnassa dhītā^eb^ti pajjunnassa nāma vassavalāhakadevarañño cātumahārājikassa dhītā. ^b^abhivande^eb^ti bhagavā tumhākaṃ pāde ^a^M1.0077^ea^ vandāmi. ^b^cakkhumatā^eb^ti pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumantena tathāgatena. ^b^dhammo anubuddho^eb^ti, ``idaṃ mayā pubbe paresaṃ santike kevalaṃ sutaṃyeva āsī''ti vadati. ^b^sāhaṃ dānī^eb^ti, sā ahaṃ idāni. ^b^sakkhi jānāmī^eb^ti, paṭivedhavasena paccakkhameva jānāmi. ^b^vigarahantā^eb^ti, ``hīnakkharapadabyañjano''ti vā ``aniyyāniko''ti vā evaṃ garahantā. ^b^roruva^eb^nti, dve roruvā -- dhūmaroruvo ca jālaroruvo ca. tattha dhūmaroruvo visuṃ hoti, jālaroruvoti pana avīcimahānirayassevetaṃ nāmaṃ. tattha hi sattā aggimhi jalante jalante punappunaṃ ravaṃ ravanti, tasmā so ``roruvo''ti vuccati. ^b^ghora^eb^nti dāruṇaṃ. ^b^khantiyā upasamena upetā^eb^ti ruccitvā khamāpetvā gahaṇakhantiyā ca rāgādiupasamena ca upetāti. navamaṃ.

[03] 40^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^dhammañcā^eb^ti ca saddena saṅghañca, iti tīṇi ratanāni namassamānā idhāgatāti vadati. ^b^atthavatī^eb^ti, atthavatiyo. ^b^bahunāpi kho ta^eb^nti yaṃ dhammaṃ sā abhāsi, taṃ ^a^P1.0082^ea^ dhammaṃ bahunāpi pariyāyena ahaṃ vibhajeyyaṃ. ^b^tādiso dhammo^eb^ti, tādiso hi ayaṃ bhagavā dhammo, taṃsaṇṭhito tappaṭibhāgo bahūhi pariyāyehi vibhajitabbayuttakoti dasseti. ^b^lapayissāmī^eb^ti, kathayissāmi. ^b^yāvatā me manasā pariyatta^eb^nti yattakaṃ mayā manasā pariyāpuṭaṃ, tassatthaṃ ^a^V1.0074^ea^ divasaṃ avatvā madhupaṭalaṃ pīḷentī viya muhutteneva saṃkhittena kathessāmi. sesaṃ uttānamevāti. dasamaṃ.
[06] satullapakāyikavaggo catuttho.

[03] 41^b^.^eb^ ādittavaggassa paṭhame ^b^jarāya maraṇena cā^eb^ti desanāsīsametaṃ, rāgādīhi pana ekādasahi aggīhi loko ādittova. ^b^dānenā^eb^ti dānacetanāya. ^b^dinnaṃ hoti sunīhata^eb^nti dānapuññacetanāhi dāyakasseva hoti gharasāmikassa viya nīhatabhaṇḍakaṃ, tenetaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^corā harantī^eb^ti ^a^M1.0078^ea^ adinne bhoge corāpi haranti rājānopi, aggipi ḍahati, ṭhapitaṭṭhānepi nassanti. ^b^antenā^eb^ti maraṇena. ^b^sarīraṃ sapariggaha^eb^nti sarīrañceva corādīnaṃ vasena avinaṭṭhabhoge ca. ^b^saggamupetī^eb^ti vessantaramahārājādayo viya sagge nibbattatīti. paṭhamaṃ.

[03] 42^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^annado^eb^ti yasmā atibalavāpi dve tīṇi bhattāni abhutvā uṭṭhātuṃ na sakkoti, bhutvā pana dubbalopi hutvā balasampanno hoti, tasmā ``annado balado''ti āha. ^b^vatthado^eb^ti yasmā surūpopi duccoḷo vā acoḷo vā virūpo hoti ohīḷito duddasiko, vatthacchanno devaputto viya sobhati ^a^P1.0083^ea^, tasmā ``vatthado hoti vaṇṇado''ti āha. ^b^yānado^eb^ti hatthiyānādīnaṃ dāyako. tesu pana --
[21] ``na hatthiyānaṃ samaṇassa kappati,
[27] na assayānaṃ, na rathena yātuṃ.
[26] idañca yānaṃ samaṇassa kappati,
[22] upāhanā rakkhato sīlakhandha''nti..

[03] tasmā ^a^V1.0075^ea^ chattupāhanakattarayaṭṭhimañcapīṭhānaṃ dāyako, yo ca maggaṃ sodheti, nisseṇiṃ karoti, setuṃ karoti, nāvaṃ paṭiyādeti, sabbopi yānadova hoti. ^b^sukhado hotī^eb^ti yānassa sukhāvahanato sukhado nāma hoti. ^b^cakkhudo^eb^ti andhakāre cakkhumantānampi rūpadassanābhāvato dīpado cakkhudo nāma hoti, anuruddhatthero viya dibbacakkhu sampadampi labhati.

[03] ^b^sabbadado hotīti^eb^ sabbesaṃyeva balādīnaṃ dāyako hoti. dve tayo gāme piṇḍāya caritvā kiñci aladdhā āgatassāpi sītalāya pokkharaṇiyā nhāyitvā patissayaṃ pavisitvā muhuttaṃ mañce nipajjitvā uṭṭhāya nisinnassa hi kāye balaṃ āharitvā pakkhittaṃ viya hoti. bahi vicarantassa ca kāye vaṇṇāyatanaṃ vātātapehi jhāyati, patissayaṃ pavisitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya muhuttaṃ nipannassa ca visabhāgasantati vūpasammati, sabhāgasantati okkamati, vaṇṇāyatanaṃ āharitvā pakkhittaṃ ^a^M1.0079^ea^ viya hoti. bahi vicarantassa pāde kaṇṭako vijjhati, khāṇu paharati, sarīsapādiparissayo ceva corabhayañca uppajjati, patissayaṃ pavisitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya nipannassa sabbete parissayā na honti, dhammaṃ sajjhāyantassa dhammapītisukhaṃ, kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontassa upasamasukhaṃ uppajjati. tathā bahi vicarantassa ca sedā muccanti, akkhīni phandanti, senāsanaṃ pavisanakkhaṇe kūpe otiṇṇo viya hoti, mañcapīṭhādīni na paññāyanti. muhuttaṃ nisinnassa pana akkhipasādo āharitvā pakkhitto viya hoti, dvārakavāṭavātapānamañcapīṭhādīni ^a^P1.0084^ea^ paññāyanti. tena vuttaṃ -- ``so ca sabbadado hoti, yo dadāti upassaya''nti.

[03] ^b^amataṃdado ca so hotī^eb^ti paṇītabhojanassa pattaṃ pūrento viya amaraṇadānaṃ nāma deti. ^b^yo dhammamanusāsatī^eb^ti yo dhammaṃ anusāsati, aṭṭhakathaṃ katheti, pāḷiṃ vāceti, pucchitapañhaṃ vissajjeti, kammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhati, dhammassavanaṃ karoti, sabbopesa dhammaṃ anusāsati nāma. sabbadānānañca idaṃ dhammadānameva agganti veditabbaṃ. vuttampi cetaṃ --
[21] ``sabbadānaṃ dhammadānaṃ jināti,
[27] sabbarasaṃ dhammaraso jināti.
[26] sabbaratiṃ ^a^V1.0076^ea^ dhammarati jināti,
[22] taṇhakkhayo sabbadukkhaṃ jinātī''ti.. (dha0 pa0 354). dutiyaṃ.

[03] 43^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^abhinandantī^eb^ti patthenti. ^b^bhajatī^eb^ti upagacchati, cittagahapatisīvalittherādike viya pacchato anubandhati. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā idhaloke paraloke ca annadāyakameva anugacchati, tasmā. sesaṃ uttānamevāti. tatiyaṃ.

[03] 44^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^ekamūla^eb^nti avijjā taṇhāya mūlaṃ, taṇhā avijjāya. idha pana taṇhā adhippetā. dvīhi sassatucchedadiṭṭhīhi āvaṭṭatīti ^b^dvirāvaṭṭā^eb^. sā ca rāgādīhi tīhi malehi ^b^timalā^eb^. tatrāssā moho sahajātakoṭiyā ^a^M1.0080^ea^ malaṃ hoti, rāgadosā upanissayakoṭiyā. pañca pana kāmaguṇā assā pattharaṇaṭṭhānā, tesu sā pattharatīti ^b^pañcapattharā^eb^. sā ca apūraṇīyaṭṭhena ^b^samuddo^eb^. ajjhattikabāhiresu panesā dvādasāyatanesu ^a^P1.0085^ea^ āvaṭṭati parivaṭṭatīti ^b^dvādasāvaṭṭā^eb^. apatiṭṭhaṭṭhena pana ^b^pātālo^eb^ti vuccatīti. ekamūlaṃ...pe0... pātālaṃ, atari isi, uttari samatikkamīti attho. catutthaṃ.

[03] 45^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^anomanāma^eb^nti sabbaguṇasamannāgatattā avekallanāmaṃ, paripūranāmanti attho. ^b^nipuṇatthadassi^eb^nti bhagavā saṇhasukhume khandhantarādayo atthe passatīti nipuṇatthadassī. ^b^paññādada^eb^nti anvayapaññādhigamāya paṭipadaṃ kathanavasena paññāya dāyakaṃ. ^b^kāmālaye asatta^eb^nti pañcakāmaguṇālaye alaggaṃ. ^b^kamamāna^eb^nti bhagavā mahābodhimaṇḍeyeva ariyamaggena gato, na idāni gacchati, atītaṃ pana upādāya idaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^mahesi^eb^nti mahantānaṃ sīlakkhandhādīnaṃ esitāraṃ pariyesitāranti. pañcamaṃ.

[03] 46^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^a^V1.0077^ea^ ^b^accharāgaṇasaṅghuṭṭha^eb^nti ayaṃ kira devaputto satthusāsane pabbajitvā vattapaṭipattiṃ pūrayamāno pañcavassakāle pavāretvā dvemātikaṃ paguṇaṃ katvā kammākammaṃ uggahetvā cittarucitaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggaṇhitvā sallahukavuttiko araññaṃ pavisitvā yo bhagavatā majjhimayāmo sayanassa koṭṭhāsoti anuññāto. tasmimpi sampatte ``pamādassa bhāyāmī''ti mañcakaṃ ukkhipitvā rattiñca divā ca nirāhāro kammaṭṭhānameva manasākāsi.

[03] athassa abbhantare satthakavātā uppajjitvā jīvitaṃ pariyādiyiṃsu. so dhurasmiṃyeva kālamakāsi. yo hi koci bhikkhu caṅkame caṅkamamāno vā ālambanatthambhaṃ nissāya ṭhito vā caṅkamakoṭiyaṃ cīvaraṃ ^a^P1.0086^ea^ sīse ṭhapetvā nisinno vā nipanno vā parisamajjhe alaṅkatadhammāsane dhammaṃ desento vā kālaṃ karoti, sabbo so dhurasmiṃ kālaṃ ^a^M1.0081^ea^ karoti nāma. iti ayaṃ caṅkamane kālaṃ katvā upanissayamandatāya āsavakkhayaṃ appatto tāvatiṃsabhavane mahāvimānadvāre niddāyitvā pabujjhanto viya paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi. tāvadevassa suvaṇṇatoraṇaṃ viya tigāvuto attabhāvo nibbatti.

[03] antovimāne sahassamattā accharā taṃ disvā, ``vimānasāmiko devaputto āgato, ramayissāma na''nti tūriyāni gahetvā parivārayiṃsu. devaputto na tāva cutabhāvaṃ jānāti, pabbajitasaññīyeva accharā oloketvā vihāracārikaṃ āgataṃ mātugāmaṃ disvā lajjī. paṃsukūliko viya upari ṭhitaṃ ghanadukūlaṃ ekaṃsaṃ karonto aṃsakūṭaṃ paṭicchādetvā indriyāni okkhipitvā adhomukho aṭṭhāsi. tassa kāyavikāreneva tā devatā ``samaṇadevaputto aya''nti ñatvā evamāhaṃsu -- ``ayya, devaputta, devaloko nāmāyaṃ, na samaṇadhammassa karaṇokāso, sampattiṃ anubhavanokāso''ti. so tatheva aṭṭhāsi. devatā ``na tāvāyaṃ sallakkhetī''ti tūriyāni paggaṇhiṃsu. so tathāpi anolokentova aṭṭhāsi.

[03] athassa sabbakāyikaṃ ādāsaṃ purato ṭhapayiṃsu. so chāyaṃ disvā cutabhāvaṃ ñatvā, ``na mayā imaṃ ṭhānaṃ patthetvā samaṇadhammo kato, uttamatthaṃ arahattaṃ patthetvā kato''ti sampattiyā vippaṭisārī ahosi, ``suvaṇṇapaṭaṃ paṭilabhissāmī''ti takkayitvā yuddhaṭṭhānaṃ otiṇṇamallo ^a^V1.0078^ea^ mūlakamuṭṭhiṃ labhitvā viya. so -- ``ayaṃ saggasampatti nāma sulabhā, buddhānaṃ pātubhāvo dullabho''ti cintetvā vimānaṃ apavisitvāva asambhinneneva sīlena accharāsaṅghaparivuto dasabalassa santikaṃ āgamma abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^accharāgaṇasaṅghuṭṭha^eb^nti accharāgaṇena gītavāditasaddehi saṅghositaṃ. ^b^pisācagaṇasevita^eb^nti tameva accharāgaṇaṃ pisācagaṇaṃ katvā vadati. ^b^vana^eb^nti nandanavanaṃ sandhāya vadati. ayañhi niyāmacittatāya attano garubhāvena devagaṇaṃ ``devagaṇo''ti vattuṃ na roceti. ``pisācagaṇo''ti vadati. nandanavanañca ``nandana''nti avatvā ``mohana''nti vadati ^a^M1.0082^ea^. ^b^kathaṃ yātrā bhavissatī^eb^ti ^a^P1.0087^ea^ kathaṃ niggamanaṃ bhavissati, kathaṃ atikkamo bhavissati, arahattassa me padaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ vipassanaṃ ācikkhatha bhagavāti vadati.

[03] atha bhagavā ``atisallikhateva ayaṃ devaputto, kiṃ nu kho ida''nti? āvajjento attano sāsane pabbajitabhāvaṃ ñatvā -- ``ayaṃ accāraddhavīriyatāya kālaṃ katvā devaloke nibbatto, ajjāpissa caṅkamanasmiṃyeva attabhāvo asambhinnena sīlena āgato''ti cintesi. buddhā ca akatābhinivesassa ādikammikassa akataparikammassa antevāsino cittakāro bhittiparikammaṃ viya -- ``sīlaṃ tāva sodhehi, samādhiṃ bhāvehi, kammassakatapaññaṃ ujuṃ karohī''ti paṭhamaṃ pubbabhāgappaṭipadaṃ ācikkhanti, kārakassa pana yuttapayuttassa arahattamaggapadaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ saṇhasukhumaṃ suññatāvipassanaṃyeva ācikkhanti, ayañca devaputto kārako abhinnasīlo, eko maggo assa anāgatoti suññatāvipassanaṃ ācikkhanto ^b^ujuko nāmā^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] tattha ^b^ujuko^eb^ti kāyavaṅkādīnaṃ abhāvato aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo ujuko nāma. ^b^abhayā nāma sā disā^eb^ti nibbānaṃ sandhāyāha. tasmiṃ hi kiñci bhayaṃ natthi, taṃ vā pattassa bhayaṃ natthīti ``abhayā nāma sā disā''ti vuttaṃ. ^b^ratho akūjano^eb^ti aṭṭhaṅgiko maggova adhippeto. yathā hi pākatikaratho akkhe vā anabbhañjite atirekesu vā manussesu abhiruḷhesu kūjati viravati, na evaṃ ariyamaggo. so hi ekappahārena caturāsītiyāpi pāṇasahassesu abhiruhantesu ^a^V1.0079^ea^ na kūjati na viravati. tasmā ``akūjano''ti vutto. ^b^dhammacakkehi saṃyuto^eb^ti kāyikacetasikavīriyasaṅkhātehi dhammacakkehi saṃyutto.

[03] ^b^hirī^eb^ti ettha hiriggahaṇena ottappampi gahitameva hoti. ^b^tassa apālambo^eb^ti yathā bāhirakarathassa rathe ṭhitānaṃ yodhānaṃ apatanatthāya dārumayaṃ apālambanaṃ hoti, evaṃ imassa maggarathassa ajjhattabahiddhāsamuṭṭhānaṃ hirottappaṃ apālambanaṃ. ^b^satyassa^eb^ ^a^P1.0088^ea^ ^b^parivāraṇa^eb^nti rathassa sīhacammādiparivāro viya imassāpi maggarathassa sampayuttā sati parivāraṇaṃ. ^b^dhamma^eb^nti lokuttaramaggaṃ ^a^M1.0083^ea^. ^b^sammādiṭṭhipurejava^eb^nti vipassanāsammādiṭṭhipurejavā assa pubbayāyikāti sammādiṭṭhipurejavo, taṃ sammādiṭṭhipurejavaṃ. yathā hi paṭhamataraṃ rājapurisehi kāṇakuṇiādīnaṃ nīharaṇena magge sodhite pacchā rājā nikkhamati, evamevaṃ vipassanā sammādiṭṭhiyā aniccādivasena khandhādīsu sodhitesu pacchā bhūmiladdhavaṭṭaṃ parijānamānā maggasammādiṭṭhi uppajjati. tena vuttaṃ ``dhammāhaṃ sārathiṃ brūmi, sammādiṭṭhipurejava''nti.

[03] iti bhagavā desanaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā avasāne cattāri saccāni dīpesi. desanāpariyosāne devaputto sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi. yathā hi rañño bhojanakāle attano mukhappamāṇe kabaḷe ukkhitte aṅke nisinno putto attano mukhappamāṇeneva tato kabaḷaṃ karoti, evamevaṃ bhagavati arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ desentepi sattā attano upanissayānurūpena sotāpattiphalādīni pāpuṇanti. ayampi devaputto sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā bhagavantaṃ gandhādīhi pūjetvā pakkāmīti. chaṭṭhaṃ.

[03] 47^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^dhammaṭṭhā sīlasampannā^eb^ti ke dhammaṭṭhā, ke sīlasampannāti pucchati. bhagavā imaṃ pañhaṃ thāvaravatthunā dīpento ^b^ārāmaropā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^ārāmaropā^eb^ti pupphārāmaphalārāmaropakā. ^b^vanaropā^eb^ti sayaṃjāte aropimavane sīmaṃ parikkhipitvā cetiyabodhicaṅkamanamaṇḍapakuṭileṇarattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānānaṃ kārakā chāyūpage rukkhe ropetvā dadamānāpi vanaropāyeva nāma. ^b^setukārakā^eb^ti visame setuṃ karonti, udake nāvaṃ paṭiyādenti ^a^V1.0080^ea^. ^b^papa^eb^nti pānīyadānasālaṃ. ^b^udapāna^eb^nti yaṃkiñci pokkharaṇītaḷākādiṃ. ^b^upassaya^eb^nti vāsāgāraṃ. ``upāsaya''ntipi pāṭho.

[03] ^b^sadā puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatī^eb^ti na akusalavitakkaṃ ^a^P1.0089^ea^ vā vitakkentassa niddāyantassa vā pavaḍḍhati. yadā yadā pana anussarati, tadā tadā tassa vaḍḍhati. imamatthaṃ sandhāya ``sadā puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatī''ti vuttaṃ. ^b^dhammaṭṭhā sīlasampannā^eb^ti tasmiṃ dhamme ṭhitattā tenapi sīlena sampannattā dhammaṭṭhā sīlasampannā. atha vā ^a^M1.0084^ea^ evarūpāni puññāni karontānaṃ dasa kusalā dhammā pūrenti, tesu ṭhitattā dhammaṭṭhā. teneva ca sīlena sampannattā sīlasampannāti. sattamaṃ.
[03] 48^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^idaṃ hi taṃ jetavana^eb^nti anāthapiṇḍiko devaputto jetavanassa ceva buddhādīnañca vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ āgato evamāha. ^b^isisaṅghanisevita^eb^nti bhikkhusaṅghanisevitaṃ.

[03] evaṃ paṭhamagāthāya jetavanassa vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā idāni ariyamaggassa kathento ^b^kammaṃ vijjā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^kamma^eb^nti maggacetanā. ^b^vijjā^eb^ti maggapaññā. ^b^dhammo^eb^ti samādhipakkhikā dhammā. ^b^sīlaṃ jīvitamuttama^eb^nti sīle patiṭṭhitassa jīvitaṃ uttamanti dasseti. atha vā ^b^vijjā^eb^ti diṭṭhisaṅkappā. ^b^dhammo^eb^ti vāyāmasatisamādhayo. ^b^sīla^eb^nti vācākammantājīvā. ^b^jīvitamuttama^eb^nti etasmiṃ sīle ṭhitassa jīvitaṃ nāma uttamaṃ. ^b^etena maccā sujjhantī^eb^ti etena aṭṭhaṅgikamaggena sattā visujjhanti.

[03] ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā maggena sujjhanti, na gottadhanehi, tasmā. ^b^yoniso vicine dhamma^eb^nti upāyena samādhipakkhiyadhammaṃ vicineyya. ^b^evaṃ tattha visujjhatī^eb^ti evaṃ tasmiṃ ariyamagge visujjhati. atha vā ^b^yoniso vicine dhamma^eb^nti upāyena pañcakkhandhadhammaṃ vicineyya. ^b^evaṃ tattha visujjhatī^eb^ti evaṃ tesu catūsu saccesu visujjhati.

[03] idāni sāriputtattherassa vaṇṇaṃ kathento ^b^sāriputtovā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^sāriputtovā^eb^ti avadhāraṇavacanaṃ, etehi paññādīhi sāriputtova seyyoti vadati. ^b^upasamenā^eb^ti kilesaupasamena ^a^V1.0081^ea^. ^b^pāraṃ gato^eb^ti nibbānaṃ gato. yo koci nibbānaṃ patto bhikkhu, so ^b^etāvaparamo siyā,^eb^ na therena uttaritaro nāma atthīti vadati. sesaṃ uttānamevāti. aṭṭhamaṃ.

[03] 49^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^P1.0090^ea^ ^b^maccharino^eb^ti maccherena samannāgatā. ekacco hi attano vasanaṭṭhāne bhikkhuṃ hatthaṃ pasāretvāpi na vandati, aññattha gato vihāraṃ ^a^M1.0085^ea^ pavisitvā sakkaccaṃ vanditvā madhurapaṭisanthāraṃ karoti -- ``bhante, amhākaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ nāgacchatha, sampanno padeso, paṭibalā mayaṃ ayyānaṃ yāgubhattādīhi upaṭṭhānaṃ kātu''nti. bhikkhū ``saddho ayaṃ upāsako''ti yāgubhattādīhi saṅgaṇhanti. atheko thero tassa gāmaṃ gantvā piṇḍāya carati. so taṃ disvā aññena vā gacchati, gharaṃ vā pavisati. sacepi sammukhībhāvaṃ āgacchati, hatthena vanditvā -- ``ayyassa bhikkhaṃ detha, ahaṃ ekena kammena gacchāmī''ti pakkamati. thero sakalagāmaṃ caritvā tucchapattova nikkhamati. idaṃ tāva mudumacchariyaṃ nāma, yena samannāgato adāyakopi dāyako viya paññāyati. idha pana thaddhamacchariyaṃ adhippetaṃ, yena samannāgato bhikkhūsu piṇḍāya paviṭṭhesu, ``therā ṭhitā''ti vutte, ``kiṃ mayhaṃ pādā rujjantī''tiādīni vatvā silāthambho viya khāṇuko viya ca thaddho hutvā tiṭṭhati, sāmīcimpi na karoti. ^b^kadariyā^eb^ti idaṃ maccharinoti padasseva vevacanaṃ. mudukampi hi macchariyaṃ ``macchariya''nteva vuccati, thaddhaṃ pana kadariyaṃ nāma. ^b^paribhāsakā^eb^ti bhikkhū gharadvāre ṭhite disvā, ``kiṃ tumhe kasitvā āgatā, vapitvā, lāyitvā? mayaṃ attanopi na labhāma, kuto tumhākaṃ, sīghaṃ nikkhamathā''tiādīhi saṃtajjakā. ^b^antarāyakarā^eb^ti ^a^P1.0091^ea^ dāyakassa saggantarāyo, paṭiggāhakānaṃ lābhantarāyo, attano upaghātoti imesaṃ antarāyānaṃ kārakā.

[03] ^b^samparāyo^eb^ti paraloko. ^b^ratī^eb^ti pañcakāmaguṇarati. ^b^khiḍḍā^eb^ti kāyikakhiḍḍādikā tividhā khiḍḍā. ^b^diṭṭhe dhammesa vipāko^eb^ti tasmiṃ nibbattabhavane diṭṭhe dhamme esa vipāko. ^b^samparāye ca duggatī^eb^ti ``yamalokaṃ upapajjare''ti vutte samparāye ca duggati.

[03] ^b^vadaññū^eb^ti bhikkhū gharadvāre ṭhitā kiñcāpi tuṇhīva honti, atthato pana -- ``bhikkhaṃ dethā''ti vadanti nāma. tatra ye ``mayaṃ pacāma, ime pana na pacanti, pacamāne patvā alabhantā ^a^V1.0082^ea^ kuhiṃ labhissantī''ti? deyyadhammaṃ saṃvibhajanti, te vadaññū nāma. ^b^pakāsantī^eb^ti vimānappabhāya jotanti. ^b^parasambhatesū^eb^ti parehi sampiṇḍitesu. ^b^samparāye ca suggatī^eb^ti, ``ete saggā''ti ^a^M1.0086^ea^ evaṃ vuttasamparāye sugati. ubhinnampi vā etesaṃ tato cavitvā puna samparāyepi duggatisugatiyeva hotīti. navamaṃ.

[03] 50^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^upapannāse^eb^ti nibbattivasena upagatā. ^b^vimuttā^eb^ti avihābrahmalokasmiṃ upapattisamanantarameva arahattaphalavimuttiyā vimuttā. ^b^mānusaṃ deha^eb^nti idha pañcorambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni eva vuttāni. ^b^dibbayoga^eb^nti pañca uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni. ^b^upaccagu^eb^nti atikkamiṃsu. ^b^upako^eb^tiādīni tesaṃ therānaṃ nāmāni. ^b^kusalī bhāsasī tesa^eb^nti, ``kusala''nti idaṃ vacanaṃ imassa atthīti ^b^kusalī,^eb^ tesaṃ therānaṃ tvaṃ kusalaṃ anavajjaṃ bhāsasi, thomesi pasaṃsasi ^a^P1.0092^ea^, paṇḍitosi devaputtāti vadati. ^b^taṃ te dhammaṃ idhaññāyā^eb^ti te therā taṃ dhammaṃ idha tumhākaṃ sāsane jānitvā. ^b^gambhīra^eb^nti gambhīratthaṃ. ^b^brahmacārī nirāmiso^eb^ti nirāmisabrahmacārī nāma anāgāmī, anāgāmī ahosinti attho. ^b^ahuvā^eb^ti ahosi. ^b^sagāmeyyo^eb^ti ekagāmavāsī. pariyosānagāthā saṅgītikārehi ṭhapitāti. dasamaṃ.
[06] ādittavaggo pañcamo.

[03] 51^b^.^eb^ jarāvaggassa paṭhame ^b^sādhū^eb^ti laddhakaṃ bhaddakaṃ. ^b^sīlaṃ yāva jarā^eb^ti iminā idaṃ dasseti -- yathā muttāmaṇirattavatthādīni ābharaṇāni taruṇakāleyeva sobhanti, jarājiṇṇakāle tāni dhārento ``ayaṃ ajjāpi bālabhāvaṃ pattheti, ummattako maññe''ti vattabbataṃ āpajjati ^a^V1.0083^ea^, na evaṃ sīlaṃ. sīlañhi niccakālaṃ sobhati. bālakālepi hi sīlaṃ rakkhantaṃ ``kiṃ imassa sīlenā''ti? vattāro natthi. majjhimakālepi mahallakakālepīti.

[03] ^b^saddhā^eb^ ^a^M1.0087^ea^ ^b^sādhu patiṭṭhitā^eb^ti hatthāḷavakacittagahapatiādīnaṃ viya maggena āgatā patiṭṭhitasaddhā nāma sādhu. ^b^paññā narānaṃ ratana^eb^nti ettha cittīkataṭṭhādīhi ratanaṃ veditabbaṃ. vuttañhetaṃ --

[02] ``yadi cittīkatanti ratanaṃ, nanu bhagavā cittīkato purisasīho, ye ca loke cittīkatā, tesaṃ cittīkato bhagavā. yadi ratikaranti ratanaṃ, nanu bhagavā ratikaro purisasīho, tassa vacanena carantā jhānaratisukhena abhiramanti. yadi atulyanti ratanaṃ, nanu bhagavā atulo purisasīho. na hi ^a^P1.0093^ea^ sakkā tuletuṃ guṇehi guṇapāramiṃ gato. yadi dullabhanti ratanaṃ, nanu bhagavā dullabho purisasīho. yadi anomasattaparibhoganti ratanaṃ, nanu bhagavā anomo sīlena samādhinā paññāya vimuttiyā vimuttiñāṇadassanenā''ti.
[03] idha pana dullabhapātubhāvaṭṭhena paññā ``ratana''nti vuttaṃ. ^b^puñña^eb^nti puññacetanā, sā hi arūpattā pariharituṃ na sakkāti. paṭhamaṃ.

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^ajarasā^eb^ti ajīraṇena, avipattiyāti attho. sīlañhi avipannameva sādhu hoti, vipannasīlaṃ ācariyupajjhāyādayopi na saṅgaṇhanti, gatagataṭṭhāne niddhamitabbova hotīti. dutiyaṃ.

[03] 53^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^sattho^eb^ti saddhiṃcaro, jaṅghasattho vā sakaṭasattho vā. ^b^mitta^eb^nti roge uppanne pāṭaṅkiyā vā aññena vā yānena haritvā khemantasampāpanena mittaṃ. ^b^sake ghare^eb^ti attano gehe ^a^V1.0084^ea^. tathārūpe roge jāte puttabhariyādayo jigucchanti, mātā pana asucimpi candanaṃ viya maññati. tasmā sā sake ghare mittaṃ. ^b^sahāyo atthajātassā^eb^ti uppannakiccassa yo taṃ kiccaṃ vahati nittharati, so kiccesu saha ayanabhāvena sahāyo mittaṃ, surāpānādisahāyā pana na mittā. ^b^samparāyika^eb^nti samparāyahitaṃ. tatiyaṃ.

[03] 54^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^a^M1.0088^ea^ ^b^puttā vatthū^eb^ti mahallakakāle paṭijagganaṭṭhena puttā patiṭṭhā. ^b^paramo^eb^ti aññesaṃ akathetabbassapi guyhassa kathetabbayuttatāya bhariyā paramo sakhā nāma. catutthaṃ.
[03] 55^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^vidhāvatī^eb^ti parasamuddādigamanavasena ito cito ca vidhāvati. pañcamaṃ.
[03] 56^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^a^P1.0094^ea^ ^b^dukkhā^eb^ti vaṭṭadukkhato. chaṭṭhaṃ.
[03] 57^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^parāyaṇa^eb^nti nipphatti avassayo. sattamaṃ.

[03] 58^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^rāgo uppatho^eb^ti sugatiñca nibbānañca gacchantassa amaggo. ^b^rattindivakkhayo^eb^ti rattidivehi, rattidivesu vā khīyati. ^b^itthī mala^eb^nti sesaṃ bāhiramalaṃ bhasmakhārādīhi dhovitvā sakkā sodhetuṃ, mātugāmamalena duṭṭho pana na sakkā suddho nāma kātunti itthī ``mala''nti vuttā. ^b^etthā^eb^ti ettha itthiyaṃ pajā sajjati. ^b^tapo^eb^ti indriyasaṃvaradhutaṅgaguṇavīriyadukkarakārikānaṃ nāmaṃ, idha pana ṭhapetvā dukkarakārikaṃ sabbāpi kilesasantāpikā paṭipadā vaṭṭati. ^b^brahmacariya^eb^nti methunavirati. aṭṭhamaṃ.
