[03] 59^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^V1.0085^ea^ ^b^kissa cābhirato^eb^ti kismiṃ abhirato. ^b^dutiyā^eb^ti sugatiñceva nibbānañca gacchantassa dutiyikā. ^b^paññā cenaṃ pasāsatī^eb^ti paññā etaṃ purisaṃ ``idaṃ karohi, idaṃ mākarī''ti anusāsati. navamaṃ.

[03] 60^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^chando nidāna^eb^nti gāyattiādiko chando gāthānaṃ nidānaṃ. pubbapaṭṭhāpanagāthā ārabhanto hi ``kataracchandena hotū''ti ārabhati ^a^M1.0089^ea^. ^b^viyañjana^eb^nti jananaṃ. akkharaṃ hi padaṃ janeti, padaṃ gāthaṃ janeti, gāthā atthaṃ pakāsetīti. ^b^nāmasannissitā^eb^ti samuddādipaṇṇattinissitā. gāthā ^a^P1.0095^ea^ ārabhanto hi samuddaṃ vā pathaviṃ vā yaṃ kiñci nāmaṃ nissayitvāva ārabhati. ^b^āsayo^eb^ti patiṭṭhā. kavito hi gāthā pavattanti. so tāsaṃ patiṭṭhā hotīti. dasamaṃ.
[06] jarāvaggo chaṭṭho.

[03] 61^b^.^eb^ addhavaggassa paṭhame ^b^nāmaṃ sabbaṃ addhabhavī^eb^ti nāmaṃ sabbaṃ abhibhavati anupatati. opapātikena vā hi kittimena vā nāmena mutto satto vā saṅkhāro vā natthi. yassapi hi rukkhassa vā pāsāṇassa vā ``idaṃ nāma nāma''nti na jānanti, anāmakotveva tassa nāmaṃ hoti. paṭhamaṃ.
[03] 62^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^a^V1.0086^ea^ ^b^sabbeva vasamanvagū^eb^ti ye cittassa vasaṃ gacchanti, tesaṃyeva anavasesapariyādānametaṃ. dutiyaṃ.
[03] 63^b^.^eb^ tatiyepi eseva nayo. tatiyaṃ.

[03] 64^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^kiṃ su saṃyojano^eb^ti kiṃ saṃyojano kiṃ bandhano? ^b^vicāraṇa^eb^nti vicaraṇā pādāni. bahuvacane ekavacanaṃ kataṃ. ^b^vitakkassa vicāraṇa^eb^nti vitakko tassa pādā. catutthaṃ.
[03] 65^b^.^eb^ pañcamepi eseva nayo. pañcamaṃ.
[03] 66^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^kenassubbhāhato^eb^ti kena abbhāhato. su-kāro nipātamattaṃ. ^b^icchādhūpāyito^eb^ti icchāya āditto. chaṭṭhaṃ.

[03] 67^b^.^eb^ sattame ^a^M1.0090^ea^ ^a^P1.0096^ea^ ^b^taṇhāya uḍḍito^eb^ti taṇhāya ullaṅghito. cakkhuñhi taṇhārajjunā āvunitvā rūpanāgadante uḍḍitaṃ, sotādīni saddādīsūti taṇhāya uḍḍito loko. ^b^maccunā pihito^eb^ti anantare attabhāve kataṃ kammaṃ na dūraṃ ekacittantaraṃ, balavatiyā pana māraṇantikavedanāya pabbatena viya otthaṭattā sattā taṃ na bujjhantīti ``maccunā pihito loko''ti vuttaṃ. sattamaṃ.
[03] 68^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame sveva pañho devatāya heṭṭhupariyāyavasena pucchito. aṭṭhamaṃ.
[03] 69^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^V1.0087^ea^ sabbaṃ uttānameva. navamaṃ.

[03] 70^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^kismiṃ loko samuppanno^eb^ti kismiṃ uppanne loko uppannoti pucchati. ^b^chasū^eb^ti chasu ajjhattikesu āyatanesu uppannesu uppannoti vuccati. ^b^chasu kubbatī^eb^ti tesuyeva chasu santhavaṃ karoti. ^b^upādāyā^eb^ti tāniyeva ca upādāya āgamma paṭicca pavattati. ^b^vihaññatī^eb^ti tesuyeva chasu vihaññati pīḷiyati. iti ajjhattikāyatanavasena ayaṃ pañho āgato, ajjhattikabāhirānaṃ pana vasena āharituṃ vaṭṭati. chasu hi ajjhattikāyatanesu uppannesu ayaṃ uppanno nāma hoti, chasu bāhiresu santhavaṃ karoti, channaṃ ajjhattikānaṃ upādāya chasu bāhiresu vihaññatīti. dasamaṃ.
[06] addhavaggo sattamo.

[03] 71^b^.^eb^ chetvāvaggassa ^a^P1.0097^ea^ paṭhame ^b^chetvā^eb^ti vadhitvā. ^b^sukhaṃ setī^eb^ti kodhapariḷāhena aparidayhamānattā sukhaṃ sayati. ^b^na socatī^eb^ti kodhavināsena vinaṭṭhadomanassattā na socati. ^b^visamūlassā^eb^ti dukkhavipākassa ^a^M1.0091^ea^. ^b^madhuraggassā^eb^ti kuddhassa paṭikujjhitvā, akkuṭṭhassa paccakkositvā, pahaṭassa ca paṭipaharitvā sukhaṃ uppajjati, taṃ sandhāya madhuraggoti vutto. imasmiṃ hi ṭhāne pariyosānaṃ agganti vuttaṃ. ^b^ariyā^eb^ti buddhādayo. paṭhamaṃ.

[03] 72^b^.^eb^ dutiye paññāyati etenāti ^b^paññāṇaṃ. dhajo rathassā^eb^ti mahantasmiṃ hi saṅgāmasīse dūratova ^a^V1.0088^ea^ dhajaṃ disvā ``asukarañño nāma ayaṃ ratho''ti ratho pākaṭo hoti. tena vuttaṃ ``dhajo rathassa paññāṇa''nti. ^b^aggi^eb^pi dūratova dhūmena paññāyati. coḷaraṭṭhaṃ paṇḍuraṭṭhanti evaṃ ^b^raṭṭha^eb^mpi raññā paññāyati. cakkavattirañño dhītāpi pana ^b^itthī^eb^ ``asukassa nāma bhariyā''ti bhattāraṃ patvāva paññāyati. tasmā ^b^dhūmo paññāṇamaggino^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. dutiyaṃ.

[03] 73^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^saddhīdha vitta^eb^nti yasmā saddho saddhāya muttamaṇiādīnipi vittāni labhati, tissopi kulasampadā, cha kāmasaggāni, nava brahmaloke patvā pariyosāne amatamahānibbānadassanampi labhati, tasmā maṇimuttādīhi vittehi saddhāvittameva seṭṭhaṃ. ^b^dhammo^eb^ti dasakusalakammapatho. ^b^sukhamāvahatī^eb^ti sabbampi sāsavānāsavaṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhasukhaṃ āvahati. ^b^sādutara^eb^nti ^a^P1.0098^ea^ lokasmiṃ loṇambilādīnaṃ sabbarasānaṃ saccameva madhurataraṃ. saccasmiṃ hi ṭhitā sīghavegaṃ nadimpi nivattenti, visampi nimmaddenti, aggimpi paṭibāhanti, devampi vassāpenti, tasmā taṃ sabbarasānaṃ madhurataranti vuttaṃ. ^b^paññājīviṃ jīvitamāhu seṭṭha^eb^nti yo paññājīvī gahaṭṭho samāno pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāya salākabhattādīni paṭṭhapetvā paññāya jīvati, pabbajito vā pana dhammena uppanne paccaye ``idamattha''nti paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ ādāya vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā ariyaphalādhigamavasena paññāya jīvati, taṃ paññājīviṃ puggalaṃ seṭṭhaṃ jīvitaṃ jīvatīti āhu. tatiyaṃ.

[03] 74^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^a^M1.0092^ea^ ^b^bīja^eb^nti uppatantānaṃ sattavidhaṃ dhaññabījaṃ seṭṭhaṃ. tasmiñhi uggate janapado khemo hoti subhikkho. ^b^nipatata^eb^nti nipatantānaṃ meghavuṭṭhi seṭṭhā. meghavuṭṭhiyañhi sati vividhāni sassāni uppajjanti, janapadā phītā honti khemā subhikkhā. ^b^pavajamānāna^eb^nti jaṅgamānaṃ padasā caramānānaṃ gāvo seṭṭhā. tā nissāya hi sattā pañca gorase paribhuñjamānā sukhaṃ viharanti. ^b^pavadata^eb^nti rājakulamajjhādīsu vadantānaṃ putto varo. so hi mātāpitūnaṃ anatthāvahaṃ na vadati.

[03] ^b^vijjā^eb^ ^a^V1.0089^ea^ ^b^uppatataṃ seṭṭhā^eb^ti purimapañhe kira sutvā samīpe ṭhitā ekā devatā ``devate, kasmā tvaṃ etaṃ pañhaṃ dasabalaṃ pucchasi? ahaṃ te kathessāmī''ti attano khantiyā laddhiyā pañhaṃ kathesi. atha naṃ itarā devatā āha -- ``yāva padhaṃsī vadesi devate yāva pagabbhā mukharā, ahaṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pucchāmi. tvaṃ mayhaṃ kasmā kathesī''ti? nivattetvā tadeva pañhaṃ dasabalaṃ pucchi. athassā satthā vissajjento ^b^vijjā uppatata^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^vijjā^eb^ti catumaggavijjā. sā hi uppatamānā sabbākusaladhamme samugghāteti. tasmā ``uppatataṃ seṭṭhā''ti vuttā. ^b^avijjā^eb^ti vaṭṭamūlakamahāavijjā. sā hi nipatantānaṃ osīdantānaṃ varā. ^b^pavajamānāna^eb^nti padasā caramānānaṃ jaṅgamānaṃ ^a^P1.0099^ea^ anomapuññakkhettabhūto saṅgho varo. tañhi tattha tattha disvā pasannacittā sattā sotthiṃ pāpuṇanti. ^b^buddho^eb^ti yādiso putto vā hotu añño vā, yesaṃ kesañci vadamānānaṃ buddho varo. tassa hi dhammadesanaṃ āgamma anekasatasahassānaṃ pāṇānaṃ bandhanamokkho hotīti. catutthaṃ.

[03] 75^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^kiṃsūdha bhītā^eb^ti kiṃ bhītā? ^b^maggo canekāyatanappavutto^eb^ti aṭṭhatiṃsārammaṇavasena anekehi kāraṇehi kathito. evaṃ sante kissa bhītā hutvā ayaṃ janatā dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo aggahesīti vadati. ^b^b^hūripaññā^eb^ti bahupañña ussannapañña. ^b^paralokaṃ na bhāye^eb^ti imasmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ gacchanto na bhāyeyya. ^b^paṇidhāyā^eb^ti ṭhapetvā. ^b^bahvannapānaṃ^eb^ ^a^M1.0093^ea^ ^b^gharamāvasanto^eb^ti anāthapiṇḍikādayo viya bahvannapāne ghare vasanto. ^b^saṃvibhāgī^eb^ti accharāya gahitampi nakhena phāletvā parassa datvāva bhuñjanasīlo. ^b^vadaññū^eb^ti vuttatthameva.

[03] idāni gāthāya aṅgāni uddharitvā dassetabbāni -- ``vāca''nti hi iminā cattāri vacīsucaritāni gahitāni, ``manenā''tipadena tīṇi manosucaritāni, ``kāyenā''ti padena tīṇi kāyasucaritāni. iti ime dasa kusalakammapathā pubbasuddhiaṅgaṃ nāma. ^b^bahvannapānaṃ gharamāvasanto^eb^ti iminā yaññaupakkharo gahito. ^b^saddho^eb^ti ekamaṅgaṃ, ^b^mudū^eb^ti ekaṃ, ^b^saṃvibhāgī^eb^ti ekaṃ, ^b^vadaññū^eb^ti ekaṃ. iti imāni cattāri aṅgāni sandhāya ``etesu dhammesu ṭhito catūsū''ti āha.

[03] aparopi ^a^V1.0090^ea^ pariyāyo -- vācantiādīni tīṇi aṅgāni, bahvannapānanti iminā yaññaupakkharova gahito, saddho mudū saṃvibhāgī vadaññūti ekaṃ aṅgaṃ. aparo dukanayo nāma hoti. ``vācaṃ manañcā''ti idamekaṃ aṅgaṃ, ``kāyena pāpāni akubbamāno, bahvannapānaṃ gharamāvasanto''ti ekaṃ, ``saddho mudū''ti ekaṃ, ``saṃvibhāgī vadaññū''ti ekaṃ. etesu catūsu dhammesu ṭhito dhamme ṭhito nāma hoti. so ito paralokaṃ gacchanto na bhāyati. pañcamaṃ.

[03] 76^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^a^P1.0100^ea^ ^b^nāmagottaṃ na jīratī^eb^ti atītabuddhānaṃ yāvajjadivasā nāmagottaṃ kathiyati, tasmā na jīratīti vuccati. porāṇā pana ``addhāne gacchante na paññāyissati, jīraṇasabhāvo pana na hotiyevā''ti vadanti. ^b^ālasya^eb^nti ālasiyaṃ, yena ṭhitaṭṭhāne ṭhitova, nisinnaṭṭhāne nisinnova hoti, telepi uttarante ṭhitiṃ na karoti. ^b^pamādo^eb^ti niddāya vā kilesavasena vā pamādo. ^b^anuṭṭhāna^eb^nti kammasamaye kammakaraṇavīriyābhāvo. ^b^asaṃyamo^eb^ti sīlasaññamābhāvo vissaṭṭhācāratā. ^b^niddā^eb^ti soppabahulatā. tāya gacchantopi ṭhitopi nisinnopi niddāyati, pageva nipanno. ^b^tandī^eb^ti aticchātādivasena āgantukālasiyaṃ. ^b^te chidde^eb^ti tāni cha chiddāni vivarāni. ^b^sabbaso^eb^ti ^a^M1.0094^ea^ sabbākārena. ^b^ta^eb^nti nipātamattaṃ. ^b^vivajjaye^eb^ti vajjeyya jaheyya. chaṭṭhaṃ.

[03] 77^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^satthamala^eb^nti malaggahitasatthaṃ. ^b^kiṃ su harantaṃ vārentī^eb^ti kaṃ harantaṃ nisedhenti. ^b^vaso^eb^ti āṇāpavattanaṃ. ^b^itthī^eb^ti avissajjanīyabhaṇḍattā ``itthī bhaṇḍānamuttamaṃ, varabhaṇḍa''nti āha. atha vā sabbepi bodhisattā ca cakkavattino ca mātukucchiyaṃyeva nibbattantīti ``itthī bhaṇḍānamuttama''nti āha. ^b^kodho satthamala^eb^nti kodho malaggahitasatthasadiso, paññāsatthassa vā malanti satthamalaṃ. ^b^abbuda^eb^nti vināsakāraṇaṃ, corā lokasmiṃ vināsakāti attho. ^b^haranto^eb^ti salākabhattādīni gahetvā gacchanto. salākabhattādīni hi paṭṭhapitakāleyeva manussehi pariccattāni. tesaṃ tāni haranto samaṇo piyo hoti, anāharante puññahāniṃ nissāya vippaṭisārino honti. sattamaṃ.

[03] 78^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^a^V1.0091^ea^ ^a^P1.0101^ea^ ^b^attānaṃ na dade^eb^ti parassa dāsaṃ katvā attānaṃ na dadeyya ṭhapetvā sabbabodhisatteti vuttaṃ. ^b^na pariccaje^eb^ti sīhabyagghādīnaṃ na pariccajeyya sabbabodhisatte ṭhapetvāyevāti vuttaṃ. ^b^kalyāṇa^eb^nti saṇhaṃ mudukaṃ. ^b^pāpika^eb^nti pharusaṃ vācaṃ. aṭṭhamaṃ.

[03] 79^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^saddhā bandhati pātheyya^eb^nti saddhaṃ uppādetvā dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ rakkhati, uposathakammaṃ karoti, tenetaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^sirī^eb^ti issariyaṃ. ^b^āsayo^eb^ti vasanaṭṭhānaṃ. issariye hi abhimukhībhūte thalatopi jalatopi bhogā āgacchantiyeva. tenetaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^parikassatī^eb^ti parikaḍḍhati. navamaṃ.

[03] 80^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^pajjoto^eb^ti padīpo viya hoti. ^b^jāgaro^eb^ti jāgarabrāhmaṇo viya hoti. ^b^gāvo kamme sajīvāna^eb^nti kammena saha jīvantānaṃ ^a^M1.0095^ea^ gāvova kamme kammasahāyā kammadutiyakā nāma honti. gomaṇḍalehi saddhiṃ kasikammādīni nipphajjanti. ^b^sītassa iriyāpatho^eb^ti sītaṃ assa sattakāyassa iriyāpatho jīvitavutti. ^b^sīta^eb^nti naṅgalaṃ. yassa hi naṅgalehi khettaṃ appamattakampi kaṭṭhaṃ na hoti, so kathaṃ jīvissatīti vadati. dasamaṃ.

[03] 81^b^.^eb^ ekādasame ^b^araṇā^eb^ti nikkilesā. ^b^vusita^eb^nti vusitavāso. ^b^bhojissiya^eb^nti adāsabhāvo. ^b^samaṇā^eb^ti khīṇāsavasamaṇā. te hi ekantena araṇā nāma. ^b^vusitaṃ na nassatī^eb^ti tesaṃ ariyamaggavāso ^a^P1.0102^ea^ na nassati. ^b^parijānantī^eb^ti puthujjanakalyāṇakato paṭṭhāya sekhā lokiyalokuttarāya pariññāya parijānanti. ^b^bhojissiya^eb^nti khīṇāsavasamaṇānaṃyeva niccaṃ bhujissabhāvo nāma. ^b^vandantī^eb^ti pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya vandanti. ^b^patiṭṭhita^eb^nti sīle patiṭṭhitaṃ ^a^V1.0092^ea^. ^b^samaṇīdhā^eb^ti samaṇaṃ idha. ^b^jātihīna^eb^nti api caṇḍālakulā pabbajitaṃ. ^b^khattiyā^eb^ti na kevalaṃ khattiyāva, devāpi sīlasampannaṃ samaṇaṃ vandantiyevāti. ekādasamaṃ.
[06] chetvāvaggo aṭṭhamo.
[06] iti sāratthappakāsiniyā
[03] saṃyuttanikāya-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] devatāsaṃyuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 82^b^.^eb^ devaputtasaṃyuttassa ^a^V1.0093^ea^ ^a^P1.0103^ea^ ^a^M1.0096^ea^ paṭhame ^b^devaputto^eb^ti devānañhi aṅke nibbattā purisā devaputtā nāma, itthiyo devadhītaro nāma honti. nāmavasena apākaṭāva ``aññatarā devatā''ti vuccati, pākaṭo ``itthannāmo devaputto''ti. tasmā heṭṭhā ``aññatarā devatā''ti vatvā idha ``devaputto''ti vuttaṃ. ^b^anusāsa^eb^nti anusiṭṭhiṃ. ayaṃ kira devaputto bhagavatā sambodhito sattame vasse yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā tidasapure vassaṃ upagamma abhidhammaṃ desentena jhānavibhaṅge -- ``bhikkhūti samaññāya bhikkhu, paṭiññāya bhikkhū''ti (vibha0 510). evaṃ bhikkhuniddesaṃ kathiyamānaṃ assosi. ``evaṃ vitakketha, mā evaṃ vitakkayittha, evaṃ manasikarotha, mā evaṃ manasākattha. idaṃ pajahatha, idaṃ upasampajja viharathā''ti (pārā0 19). evarūpaṃ pana bhikkhuovādaṃ bhikkhuanusāsanaṃ na assosi. so taṃ sandhāya -- ``bhikkhuṃ bhagavā pakāsesi, no ca bhikkhuno anusāsa''nti āha.

[03] ^b^tena hī^eb^ti yasmā mayā bhikkhuno anusiṭṭhi na pakāsitāti vadasi, tasmā. ^b^taññevettha paṭibhātū^eb^ti tuyhevesā anusiṭṭhipakāsanā upaṭṭhātūti. yo hi pañhaṃ kathetukāmo hoti, na ca sakkoti sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā kathetuṃ. yo vā na kathetukāmo hoti, sakkoti pana kathetuṃ. yo vā ^a^P1.0104^ea^ neva kathetukāmo hoti, kathetuṃ na ca sakkoti. sabbesampi tesaṃ bhagavā pañhaṃ bhāraṃ na karoti. ayaṃ pana devaputto kathetukāmo ceva, sakkoti ca kathetuṃ. tasmā tasseva bhāraṃ karonto bhagavā evamāha. sopi pañhaṃ kathesi.

[03] tattha ^a^V1.0094^ea^ ^b^subhāsitassa sikkhethā^eb^ti subhāsitaṃ sikkheyya, catusaccanissitaṃ dasakathāvatthunissitaṃ sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyanissitaṃ catubbidhaṃ vacīsucaritameva sikkheyya. ^b^samaṇūpāsanassa cā^eb^ti samaṇehi upāsitabbaṃ samaṇūpāsanaṃ ^a^M1.0097^ea^ nāma aṭṭhatiṃsabhedaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ, tampi sikkheyya bhāveyyāti attho. bahussutānaṃ vā bhikkhūnaṃ upāsanampi samaṇūpāsanaṃ. tampi `kiṃ, bhante, kusala''ntiādinā pañhapucchanena paññāvuddhatthaṃ sikkheyya. ^b^cittavūpasamassa cā^eb^ti aṭṭhasamāpattivasena cittavūpasamaṃ sikkheyya. iti devaputtena tisso sikkhā kathitā honti. purimapadena hi adhisīlasikkhā kathitā, dutiyapadena adhipaññāsikkhā, cittavūpasamena adhicittasikkhāti evaṃ imāya gāthāya sakalampi sāsanaṃ pakāsitameva hoti. paṭhamaṃ.

[03] 83^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^jhāyī^eb^ti dvīhi jhānehi jhāyī. ^b^vimuttacitto^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānavimuttiyā vimuttacitto. ^b^hadayassānupatti^eb^nti arahattaṃ. ^b^lokassā^eb^ti saṅkhāralokassa. ^b^anissito^eb^ti taṇhādiṭṭhīhi anissito, taṇhādiṭṭhiyo vā anissito. ^b^tadānisaṃso^eb^ti arahattānisaṃso. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- arahattānisaṃso bhikkhu arahattaṃ patthento jhāyī bhaveyya, suvimuttacitto bhaveyya, lokassa udayabbayaṃ ñatvā anissito bhaveyya. tantidhammo pana imasmiṃ sāsane pubbabhāgoti. dutiyaṃ.
[03] 84^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^māgho^eb^ti sakkassetaṃ nāmaṃ. sveva vattena aññe abhibhavitvā devissariyaṃ pattoti ^b^vatrabhū,^eb^ vatranāmakaṃ vā asuraṃ abhibhavatīti vatrabhū. tatiyaṃ.
[03] 85^b^.^eb^ catutthaṃ ^a^P1.0105^ea^ vuttatthameva. catutthaṃ.

[03] 86^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^na tenāsīsate bhava^eb^nti tena kāraṇena yaṃ kiñci bhavaṃ na pattheti. āyatapaggaho nāmesa devaputto, khīṇāsavassa kiccavosānaṃ natthi. khīṇāsavena hi ādito arahattappattiyā ^a^V1.0095^ea^ vīriyaṃ kataṃ ^a^M1.0098^ea^, aparabhāge mayā arahattaṃ pattanti mā tuṇhī bhavatu, tatheva vīriyaṃ daḷhaṃ karotu parakkamatūti cintetvā evamāha.

[01] atha bhagavā ``ayaṃ devaputto khīṇāsavassa kiccavosānaṃ akathento mama sāsanaṃ aniyyānikaṃ katheti, kiccavosānamassa kathessāmī''ti cintetvā ^b^natthi kicca^eb^ntiādimāha. tīsu kira piṭakesu ayaṃ gāthā asaṃkiṇṇā. bhagavatā hi aññattha vīriyassa doso nāma dassito natthi. idha pana imaṃ devaputtaṃ paṭibāhitvā ``khīṇāsavena pubbabhāge āsavakkhayatthāya araññe vasantena kammaṭṭhānaṃ ādāya vīriyaṃ kataṃ, aparabhāge sace icchati, karotu, no ce icchati, yathāsukhaṃ viharatū''ti khīṇāsavassa kiccavosānadassanatthaṃ evamāha. tattha ^b^gādha^eb^nti patiṭṭhaṃ. pañcamaṃ.

[03] 87^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^dukkara^eb^nti ayaṃ kira devaputto pubbayogāvacaro bahalakilesatāya sappayogena kilese vikkhambhento samaṇadhammaṃ katvā pubbūpanissayamandatāya ariyabhūmiṃ appatvāva kālaṃ katvā devaloke nibbatto. so ``tathāgatassa santikaṃ gantvā dukkarabhāvaṃ ārocessāmī''ti āgantvā evamāha. tattha ^b^dukkara^eb^nti dasapi vassāni...pe0... saṭṭhipi yadetaṃ ekantaparisuddhassa samaṇadhammassa karaṇaṃ nāma, taṃ dukkaraṃ. ^b^sekhā^eb^ti satta sekhā. ^b^sīlasamāhitā^eb^ti sīlena samāhitā samupetā. ^b^ṭhitattā^eb^ti patiṭṭhitasabhāvā. evaṃ pucchitapañhaṃ vissajjetvā idāni uparipañhasamuṭṭhāpanatthaṃ ^b^anagāriyupetassā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^a^P1.0106^ea^ ^b^anagāriyupetassā^eb^ti anagāriyaṃ niggehabhāvaṃ upetassa. sattabhūmikepi hi pāsāde vasanto bhikkhu vuḍḍhatarena āgantvā ``mayhaṃ idaṃ pāpuṇātī''ti vutte pattacīvaraṃ ādāya nikkhamateva. tasmā ``anagāriyupeto''ti vuccati. ^b^tuṭṭhī^eb^ti catupaccayasantoso. ^b^bhāvanāyā^eb^ti cittavūpasamabhāvanāya.

[03] ^b^te chetvā maccuno jāla^eb^nti ye rattindivaṃ indriyūpasame ratā, te dussamādahaṃ cittaṃ samādahanti. ye ca samāhitacittā, te catupaccayasantosaṃ pūrentā na kilamanti. ye santuṭṭhā, te sīlaṃ pūrentā na kilamanti ^a^M1.0099^ea^. ye sīle patiṭṭhitā satta sekhā, te ariyā maccuno jālasaṅkhātaṃ kilesajālaṃ chinditvā gacchanti. ^b^duggamo^eb^ti ``saccametaṃ, bhante, ye indriyūpasame ^a^V1.0096^ea^ ratā, te dussamādahaṃ samādahanti...pe0... ye sīle patiṭṭhitā, te maccuno jālaṃ chinditvā gacchanti''. kiṃ na gacchissanti? ayaṃ pana duggamo bhagavā visamo maggoti āha. tattha kiñcāpi ariyamaggo neva duggamo na visamo, pubbabhāgapaṭipadāya panassa bahū parissayā honti. tasmā evaṃ vutto. ^b^avaṃsirā^eb^ti ñāṇasirena adhosirā hutvā papatanti. ariyamaggaṃ ārohituṃ asamatthatāyeva ca te anariyamagge papatantīti ca vuccanti. ^b^ariyānaṃ samo maggo^eb^ti sveva maggo ariyānaṃ samo hoti. ^b^visame samā^eb^ti visamepi sattakāye samāyeva. chaṭṭhaṃ.

[03] 88^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^sambādhe^eb^ti nīvaraṇasambādhaṃ kāmaguṇasambādhanti dve sambādhā. tesu idha nīvaraṇasambādhaṃ adhippetaṃ. ^b^okāsa^eb^nti jhānassetaṃ nāmaṃ. ^b^paṭilīnanisabho^eb^ti paṭilīnaseṭṭho. paṭilīno nāma pahīnamāno vuccati. yathāha -- ``kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paṭilīno hoti ^a^P1.0107^ea^. idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno asmimāno pahīno hoti ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṃkato āyatiṃ anuppādadhammo''ti (a0 ni0 4.38; mahāni0 87). ^b^paccalatthaṃsū^eb^ti paṭilabhiṃsu. ^b^sammā te^eb^ti ye nibbānapattiyā satiṃ paṭilabhiṃsu, te lokuttarasamādhināpi susamāhitāti missakajjhānaṃ kathitaṃ. sattamaṃ.

[03] 89^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^purāṇatitthakaro^eb^ti pubbe titthakaro. ettha ca titthaṃ nāma dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo, titthakaro nāma tāsaṃ uppādako satthā. seyyathidaṃ nando, vaccho, kiso, saṃkicco. purāṇādayo pana titthiyā nāma. ayaṃ pana diṭṭhiṃ uppādetvā kathaṃ sagge nibbattoti? kammavāditāya. esa kira uposathabhattādīni adāsi, anāthānaṃ vattaṃ paṭṭhapesi, patissaye akāsi, pokkharaṇiyo khaṇāpesi, aññampi bahuṃ kalyāṇaṃ akāsi. so tassa nissandena sagge nibbatto, sāsanassa ^a^M1.0100^ea^ pana niyyānikabhāvaṃ jānāti. so tathāgatassa santikaṃ gantvā sāsanānucchavikā vīriyappaṭisaṃyuttā gāthā vakkhāmīti āgantvā ^b^chinda sota^eb^ntiādimāha.

[03] tattha ^a^V1.0097^ea^ ^b^chindā^eb^ti aniyamitāaṇatti. ^b^sota^eb^nti taṇhāsotaṃ. ^b^parakkammā^eb^ti parakkamitvā vīriyaṃ katvā. ^b^kāme^eb^ti kilesakāmepi vatthukāmepi. ^b^panudā^eb^ti nīhara. ^b^ekatta^eb^nti jhānaṃ. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- kāme ajahitvā muni jhānaṃ na upapajjati, na paṭilabhatīti attho. ^b^kayirā ce kayirāthena^eb^nti yadi vīriyaṃ kareyya, kareyyātha, taṃ vīriyaṃ na osakkeyya. ^b^daḷhamenaṃ parakkame^eb^ti daḷhaṃ enaṃ kareyya. ^b^sithilo hi paribbājo^eb^ti sithilagahitā pabbajjā. ^b^bhiyyo ākirate raja^eb^nti atirekaṃ ^a^P1.0108^ea^ upari kilesarajaṃ ākirati. ^b^akataṃ dukkaṭaṃ seyyo^eb^ti dukkaṭaṃ akatameva seyyo. ^b^yaṃ kiñcī^eb^ti na kevalaṃ dukkaṭaṃ katvā katasāmaññameva, aññampi yaṃ kiñci sithilaṃ kataṃ evarūpameva hoti. ^b^saṃkiliṭṭha^eb^nti dukkarakārikavataṃ. imasmiṃ hi sāsane paccayahetu samādinnadhutaṅgavataṃ saṃkiliṭṭhameva. ^b^saṅkassara^eb^nti saṅkāya saritaṃ, ``idampi iminā kataṃ bhavissati, idampi iminā''ti evaṃ āsaṅkitaparisaṅkitaṃ. ^b^ādibrahmacariyikā^eb^ti maggabrahmacariyassa ādibhūtā pubbapadhānabhūtā. aṭṭhamaṃ.

[03] 90^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^candimā^eb^ti candavimānavāsī devaputto. ^b^sabbadhī^eb^ti sabbesu khandhāayatanādīsu. ^b^lokānukampakā^eb^ti tuyhampi etassapi tādisā eva. ^b^santaramānovā^eb^ti turito viya. ^b^pamuñcasī^eb^ti atītatthe vattamānavacanaṃ. navamaṃ.

[03] 91^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^sūriyo^eb^ti sūriyavimānavāsī devaputto. ^b^andhakāre^eb^ti cakkhuviññāṇuppattinivāraṇena andhabhāvakaraṇe. virocatīti ^b^verocano. maṇḍalī^eb^ti maṇḍalasaṇṭhāno. ^b^mā, rāhu, gilī caramantalikkhe^eb^ti antalikkhe caraṃ sūriyaṃ, rāhu, mā gilīti vadati. kiṃ panesa taṃ gilatīti ^a^M1.0101^ea^? āma, gilati. rāhussa hi attabhāvo mahā, uccattanena aṭṭhayojanasatādhikāni cattāri yojanasahassāni, bāhantaramassa dvādasayojanasatāni, bahalattena cha yojanasatāni, sīsaṃ nava yojanasataṃ, nalāṭaṃ tiyojanasataṃ, bhamukantaraṃ paṇṇāsayojanaṃ, mukhaṃ dviyojanasataṃ, ghānaṃ tiyojanasataṃ, mukhādhānaṃ tiyojanasatagambhīraṃ hatthatalapādatalāni puthulato dviyojanasatāni ^a^P1.0109^ea^. aṅgulipabbāni paṇṇāsa yojanāni. so candimasūriye virocamāne disvā issāpakato ^a^V1.0098^ea^ tesaṃ gamanavīthiṃ otaritvā mukhaṃ vivaritvā tiṭṭhati. candavimānaṃ sūriyavimānaṃ vā tiyojanasatike mahānarake pakkhittaṃ viya hoti. vimāne adhivatthā devatā maraṇabhayatajjitā ekappahāreneva viravanti. so pana vimānaṃ kadāci hatthena chādeti, kadāci hanukassa heṭṭhā pakkhipati, kadāci jivhāya parimajjati, kadāci avagaṇḍakārakaṃ bhuñjanto viya kapolantare ṭhapeti. vegaṃ pana vāretuṃ na sakkoti. sace vāressāmīti gaṇḍakaṃ katvā tiṭṭheyya, matthakaṃ tassa bhinditvā nikkhameyya, ākaḍḍhitvā vā naṃ onameyya. tasmā vimānena saheva gacchati. ^b^pajaṃ mama^eb^nti candimasūriyā kira dvepi devaputtā mahāsamayasuttakathanadivase sotāpattiphalaṃ pattā. tena bhagavā ``pajaṃ mama''nti āha, putto mama esoti attho. dasamaṃ.
[06] paṭhamo vaggo.

[03] 92^b^.^eb^ dutiyavaggassa paṭhame ^b^kacchevā^eb^ti kacche viya. ^b^kacche^eb^ti pabbatakacchepi nadīkacchepi. ^b^ekodi nipakā^eb^ti ekaggacittā ceva paññānepakkena ca samannāgatā. ^b^satā^eb^ti satimanto. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- ye jhānāni labhitvā ^a^M1.0102^ea^ ekodī nipakā satā viharanti, te amakase pabbatakacche vā nadīkacche vā magā viya sotthiṃ gamissantīti. ^b^pāra^eb^nti nibbānaṃ. ^b^ambujo^eb^ti maccho. ^b^raṇañjahā^eb^ti kilesañjahā. yepi jhānāni labhitvā appamattā kilese jahanti, te suttajālaṃ bhinditvā macchā viya nibbānaṃ gamissantīti vuttaṃ hoti. paṭhamaṃ.

[03] 93^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^a^P1.0110^ea^ ^b^veṇḍū^eb^ti tassa devaputtassa nāmaṃ. ^b^payirupāsiyā^eb^ti parirupāsitvā. ^b^anusikkhare^eb^ti ^a^V1.0099^ea^ sikkhanti. ^b^siṭṭhipade^eb^ti anusiṭṭhipade. ^b^kāle te appamajjantā^eb^ti kāle te appamādaṃ karontā. dutiyaṃ.

[03] 94^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^dīghalaṭṭhī^eb^ti devaloke sabbe samappamāṇā tigāvutikāva honti, manussaloke panassa dīghattabhāvatāya evaṃnāmaṃ ahosi. so puññāni katvā devaloke nibbattopi tatheva paññāyi. tatiyaṃ.

[03] 95^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^gotamā^eb^ti bhagavantaṃ gottena ālapati. ^b^anāvaṭa^eb^nti tathāgatassa hi sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ pesentassa rukkho vā pabbato vā āvarituṃ samattho nāma natthi. tenāha ``anāvaṭa''nti. iti tathāgataṃ thometvā devaloke abhisaṅkhatapañhaṃ pucchanto ^b^kathaṃvidha^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^dukkhamaticca iriyatī^eb^ti dukkhaṃ atikkamitvā viharati. ^b^sīlavā^eb^ti lokiyalokuttarena sīlena samannāgato khīṇāsavo. ^b^paññā^eb^dayopi missakāyeva veditabbā. ^b^pūjayantī^eb^ti gandhapupphādīhi pūjenti. catutthaṃ.

[03] 96^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^appatiṭṭhe anālambe^eb^ti heṭṭhā apatiṭṭhe upari anālambane. ^b^susamāhito^eb^ti appanāyapi upacārenapi suṭṭhu samāhito ^a^M1.0103^ea^. ^b^pahitatto^eb^ti pesitatto. ^b^nandīrāgaparikkhīṇo^eb^ti parikkhīṇanandīrāgo. nandīrāgo nāma tayo kammābhisaṅkhārā. iti imāya gāthāya kāmasaññāgahaṇena pañcorambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni, rūpasaṃyojanagahaṇena pañca uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni, nandīrāgena tayo kammābhisaṅkhārā ^a^P1.0111^ea^ gahitā. evaṃ yassa dasa saṃyojanāni tayo ca kammābhisaṅkhārā pahīnā, so gambhīre mahoghe na sīdatīti. kāmasaññāya vā kāmabhavo, rūpasaṃyojanena rūpabhavo gahito, tesaṃ gahaṇena arūpabhavo gahitova ^a^V1.0100^ea^, nandīrāgena tayo kammābhisaṅkhārā gahitāti evaṃ yassa tīsu bhavesu tayo saṅkhārā natthi, so gambhīre na sīdatītipi dasseti. pañcamaṃ.
[03] 97^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhaṃ vuttatthameva. chaṭṭhaṃ.

[03] 98^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^subrahmā^eb^ti so kira devaputto accharāsaṅghaparivuto nandanakīḷikaṃ gantvā pāricchattakamūle paññattāsane nisīdi. taṃ pañcasatā devadhītaro parivāretvā nisinnā, pañcasatā rukkhaṃ abhiruḷhā. nanu ca devatānaṃ cittavasena yojanasatikopi rukkho onamitvā hatthaṃ āgacchati, kasmā tā abhiruḷhāti. khiḍḍāpasutatāya. abhiruyha pana madhurassarena gāyitvā gāyitvā pupphāni pātenti, tāni gahetvā itarā ekatovaṇṭikamālādivasena ganthenti. atha rukkhaṃ abhiruḷhā upacchedakakammavasena ekappahāreneva kālaṃ katvā avīcimhi nibbattā mahādukkhaṃ anubhavanti.

[03] atha kāle gacchante devaputto ``imāsaṃ neva saddo suyyati, na pupphāni pātenti. kahaṃ nu kho gatā''ti? āvajjento niraye nibbattabhāvaṃ disvā piyavatthukasokena ruppamāno cintesi -- ``etā tāva yathākammena gatā, mayhaṃ āyusaṅkhāro kittako''ti. so -- ``sattame divase mayāpi avasesāhi pañcasatāhi saddhiṃ kālaṃ katvā tattheva nibbattitabba''nti disvā balavatarena sokena ruppi. so -- ``imaṃ mayhaṃ sokaṃ sadevake loke aññatra tathāgatā niddhamituṃ samattho nāma natthī''ti cintetvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā ^b^niccaṃ utrasta^eb^nti gāthamāha.

[03] tattha ^a^M1.0104^ea^ ^b^ida^eb^nti attano cittaṃ dasseti. dutiyapadaṃ purimasseva ^a^P1.0112^ea^ vevacanaṃ. ^b^nicca^eb^nti ca padassa devaloke nibbattakālato paṭṭhāyāti attho na gahetabbo, sokuppattikālato pana paṭṭhāya niccanti veditabbaṃ. ^b^anuppannesu kicchesū^eb^ti ito sattāhaccayena yāni dukkhāni uppajjissanti, tesu. ^b^atho uppatitesu cā^eb^ti yāni pañcasatānaṃ accharānaṃ niraye nibbattānaṃ diṭṭhāni, tesu cāti evaṃ imesu uppannānuppannesu dukkhesu niccaṃ mama utrastaṃ cittaṃ, abbhantare ḍayhamāno viya homi bhagavāti dasseti.

[03] ^b^nāññatra^eb^ ^a^V1.0101^ea^ ^b^bojjhā tapasā^eb^ti bojjhaṅgabhāvanañca tapoguṇañca aññatra muñcitvā sotthiṃ na passāmīti attho. ^b^sabbanissaggā^eb^ti nibbānato. ettha kiñcāpi bojjhaṅgabhāvanā paṭhamaṃ gahitā, indriyasaṃvaro pacchā, atthato pana indriyasaṃvarova paṭhamaṃ veditabbo. indiyasaṃvare hi gahite catupārisuddhisīlaṃ gahitaṃ hoti. tasmiṃ patiṭṭhito bhikkhu nissayamuttako dhutaṅgasaṅkhātaṃ tapoguṇaṃ samādāya araññaṃ pavisitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvento saha vipassanāya bojjhaṅge bhāveti. tassa ariyamaggo yaṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjati, so ``sabbanissaggo''ti bhagavā catusaccavasena desanaṃ vinivattesi. devaputto desanāpariyosāne sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahīti. sattamaṃ.

[03] 99^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^kakudho devaputto^eb^ti ayaṃ kira kolanagare mahāmoggallānattherassa upaṭṭhākaputto daharakāleyeva therassa santike vasanto jhānaṃ nibbattetvā kālaṅkato, brahmaloke uppajji. tatrāpi naṃ kakudho brahmātveva sañjānanti. ^b^nandasī^eb^ti tussasi. ^b^kiṃ laddhā^eb^ti tuṭṭhi nāma kiñci manāpaṃ labhitvā hoti, tasmā evamāha. ^b^kiṃ jīyitthā^eb^ti yassa hi kiñci manāpaṃ cīvarādivatthu jiṇṇaṃ hoti, so socati, tasmā evamāha. ^b^aratī nābhikīratī^eb^ti ukkaṇṭhitā nābhibhavati. ^b^aghajātassā^eb^ti dukkhajātassa, vaṭṭadukkhe ṭhitassāti attho. ^b^nandījātassā^eb^ti jātataṇhassa. ^b^agha^eb^nti evarūpassa ^a^P1.0113^ea^ hi vaṭṭadukkhaṃ āgatameva hoti ^a^M1.0105^ea^. ``dukkhī sukhaṃ patthayatī''ti hi vuttaṃ. iti aghajātassa nandī hoti, sukhavipariṇāmena dukkhaṃ āgatamevāti nandījātassa aghaṃ hoti. aṭṭhamaṃ.
[03] 100^b^.^eb^ navamaṃ vuttatthameva. navamaṃ.
[03] 101^b^.^eb^ dasame ānandattherassa anumānabuddhiyā ānubhāvappakāsanatthaṃ ^b^aññataro^eb^ti āha. dasamaṃ.
[06] dutiyo vaggo.
[03] 102^b^.^eb^ tatiyavaggassa ^a^V1.0102^ea^ paṭhamaṃ vuttatthameva. paṭhamaṃ.

[03] 103^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^paṭikaccevā^eb^ti paṭhamaṃyeva. ^b^akkhacchinnovajhāyatī^eb^ti akkhacchinno avajhāyati, balavacintanaṃ cinteti. dutiyagāthāya ^b^akkhacchinnovā^eb^ti akkhacchinno viya. dutiyaṃ.

[03] 104^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^dāyako^eb^ti dānasīlo. ^b^dānapatī^eb^ti yaṃ dānaṃ demi, tassa pati hutvā demi, na dāso na sahāyo. yo hi attanā madhuraṃ bhuñjati, paresaṃ amadhuraṃ deti, so dānasaṅkhātassa deyyadhammassa dāso hutvā deti. yo yaṃ attanā bhuñjati, tadeva deti, so sahāyo hutvā deti. yo pana attanā yena tena yāpeti, paresaṃ madhuraṃ deti, so pati jeṭṭhako sāmi hutvā deti. ahaṃ ``tādiso ahosi''nti ^a^P1.0114^ea^ vadati.

[03] ^b^catūsu dvāresu^eb^ti tassa kira rañño sindhavaraṭṭhaṃ sodhivākaraṭṭhanti dve raṭṭhāni ahesuṃ, nagaraṃ roruvaṃ nāma. tassa ekekasmiṃ dvāre devasikaṃ satasahassaṃ uppajjati, antonagare vinicchayaṭṭhāne satasahassaṃ. so bahuhiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ rāsibhūtaṃ disvā kammassakatañāṇaṃ uppādetvā catūsu dvāresu ^a^M1.0106^ea^ dānasālāyo kāretvā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ dvāre uṭṭhitāayena dānaṃ dethāti amacce ṭhapesi. tenāha -- ``catūsu dvāresu dānaṃ dīyitthā''ti.

[03] ^b^samaṇabrāhmaṇakapaṇaddhikavanibbakayācakāna^eb^nti ettha ^b^samaṇā^eb^ti pabbajjūpagatā. ^b^brāhmaṇā^eb^ti bhovādino. samitapāpabāhitapāpe pana samaṇabrāhmaṇe esa nālattha. ^b^kapaṇā^eb^ti duggatā daliddamanussā kāṇakuṇiādayo. ^b^addhikā^eb^ti pathāvino. ^b^vanibbakā^eb^ti ye ``iṭṭhaṃ, dinnaṃ, kantaṃ, manāpaṃ, kālena, anavajjaṃ dinnaṃ, dadaṃ cittaṃ pasādeyya, gacchatu bhavaṃ brahmaloka''ntiādinā nayena ^a^V1.0103^ea^ dānassa vaṇṇaṃ thomayamānā vicaranti. ^b^yācakā^eb^ti ye ``pasatamattaṃ detha, sarāvamattaṃ dethā''tiādīni ca vatvā yācamānā vicaranti. ^b^itthāgārassa dānaṃ dīyitthā^eb^ti paṭhamadvārassa laddhattā tattha uppajjanakasatasahasse aññampi dhanaṃ pakkhipitvā rañño amacce hāretvā attano amacce ṭhapetvā raññā dinnadānato rājitthiyo mahantataraṃ dānaṃ adaṃsu. taṃ sandhāyevamāha. ^b^mama dānaṃ paṭikkamī^eb^ti yaṃ mama dānaṃ tattha dīyittha, taṃ paṭinivatti. sesadvāresupi eseva nayo. ^b^kocī^eb^ti katthaci. ^b^dīgharatta^eb^nti asītivassasahassāni. ettakaṃ kira kālaṃ tassa rañño dānaṃ dīyittha. tatiyaṃ.
[03] 105^b^.^eb^ catutthaṃ vuttatthameva. catutthaṃ.

[03] 106^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^a^P1.0115^ea^ ^b^kosalesu viharantī^eb^ti bhagavato santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā tattha gantvā viharanti. ^b^uddhatā^eb^ti akappiye kappiyasaññitāya ca kappiye akappiyasaññitāya ca anavajje sāvajjasaññitāya ca sāvajje anavajjasaññitāya ca uddhaccapakatikā hutvā. ^b^unnaḷā^eb^ti uggatanaḷā, uṭṭhitatucchamānāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^capalā^eb^ti pattacīvaramaṇḍanādinā cāpallena yuttā. ^b^mukharā^eb^ti mukhakharā, kharavacanāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^vikiṇṇavācā^eb^ti asaṃyatavacanā, divasampi niratthakavacanapalāpino. ^b^muṭṭhassatino^eb^ti naṭṭhassatino sativirahitā, idha kataṃ ettha pamussanti. ^b^asampajānā^eb^ti nippaññā. ^b^asamāhitā^eb^ti appanāupacārasamādhirahitā, caṇḍasote ^a^M1.0107^ea^ baddhanāvāsadisā. ^b^vibbhantacittā^eb^ti anavaṭṭhitacittā, panthāruḷhabālamigasadisā. ^b^pākatindriyā^eb^ti saṃvarābhāvena gihikāle viya vivaṭaindriyā.

[03] ^b^jantū^eb^ti evaṃnāmako devaputto. ^b^tadahuposathe^eb^ti tasmiṃ ahu uposathe, uposathadivaseti attho. ^b^pannarase^eb^ti cātuddasikādipaṭikkhepo. ^b^upasaṅkamī^eb^ti codanatthāya upagato. so kira cintesi -- ``ime bhikkhū satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā nikkhantā, idāni pamattā viharanti, na kho panete pāṭiyekkaṃ nisinnaṭṭhāne codiyamānā kathaṃ gaṇhissanti, samāgamanakāle codissāmī''ti uposathadivase tesaṃ sannipatitabhāvaṃ ñatvā upasaṅkami. ^b^gāthāhi ajjhabhāsī^eb^ti sabbesaṃ majjhe ṭhatvā gāthā abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^a^V1.0104^ea^ yasmā guṇakathāya saddhiṃ nigguṇassa aguṇo pākaṭo hoti, tasmā guṇaṃ tāva kathento ^b^sukhajīvino pure āsu^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^sukhajīvino pure āsu^eb^nti pubbe bhikkhū supposā subharā ^a^P1.0116^ea^ ahesuṃ, uccanīcakulesu sapadānaṃ caritvā laddhena missakapiṇḍena yāpesunti adhippāyena evamāha. ^b^anicchā^eb^ti nittaṇhā hutvā.

[03] evaṃ porāṇakabhikkhūnaṃ vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā idāni tesaṃ avaṇṇaṃ kathento ^b^dupposa^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^gāme gāmaṇikā viyā^eb^ti yathā gāme gāmakuṭā nānappakārena janaṃ pīḷetvā khīradadhitaṇḍulādīni āharāpetvā bhuñjanti, evaṃ tumhepi anesanāya ṭhitā tumhākaṃ jīvikaṃ kappethāti adhippāyena vadati. ^b^nipajjantī^eb^ti uddesaparipucchāmanasikārehi anatthikā hutvā sayanamhi hatthapāde vissajjetvā nipajjanti. ^b^parāgāresū^eb^ti paragehesu, kulasuṇhādīsūti attho. ^b^mucchitā^eb^ti kilesamucchāya mucchitā.

[03] ^b^ekacce^eb^ti vattabbayuttakeyeva. ^b^apaviddhā^eb^ti chaḍḍitakā. ^b^anāthā^eb^ti apatiṭṭhā. ^b^petā^eb^ti susāne chaḍḍitā kālaṅkatamanussā. yathā hi susāne chaḍḍitā nānāsakuṇādīhi khajjanti, ñātakāpi nesaṃ nāthakiccaṃ na ^a^M1.0108^ea^ karonti, na rakkhanti, na gopayanti, evamevaṃ evarūpāpi ācariyupajjhāyādīnaṃ santikā ovādānusāsaniṃ na labhantīti apaviddhā anāthā, yathā petā, tatheva honti. pañcamaṃ.

[03] 107^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^yatthā^eb^ti cakkavāḷalokassa ekokāse bhummaṃ. ^b^na cavati na upapajjatī^eb^ti idaṃ aparāparaṃ cutipaṭisandhivasena gahitaṃ. ^b^gamanenā^eb^ti padagamanena. ^b^nāhaṃ taṃ lokassa anta^eb^nti satthā saṅkhāralokassa antaṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^ñāteyya^eb^ntiādīsu ñātabbaṃ, daṭṭhabbaṃ, pattabbanti attho.
[03] iti devaputtena cakkavāḷalokassa anto pucchito, satthārā saṅkhāralokassa kathito. so pana attano pañhena saddhiṃ satthu byākaraṇaṃ sametīti saññāya pasaṃsanto ^b^acchariya^eb^ntiādimāha.

[03] ^b^daḷhadhammo^eb^ti ^a^V1.0105^ea^ daḷhadhanu, uttamappamāṇena dhanunā samannāgato. ^b^dhanuggaho^eb^ti dhanuācariyo. ^b^susikkhito^eb^ti ^a^P1.0117^ea^ dasa dvādasa vassāni dhanusippaṃ sikkhito. ^b^katahattho^eb^ti usabhappamāṇepi vālaggaṃ vijjhituṃ samatthabhāvena katahattho. ^b^katūpāsano^eb^ti katasarakkhepo dassitasippo. ^b^asanenā^eb^ti kaṇḍena. ^b^atipāteyyā^eb^ti atikkameyya. yāvatā so tālacchāyaṃ atikkameyya, tāvatā kālena ekacakkavāḷaṃ atikkamāmīti attano javasampattiṃ dasseti.

[03] ^b^puratthimā samuddā pacchimo^eb^ti yathā puratthimasamuddā pacchimasamuddo dūre, evaṃ me dūre padavītihāro ahosīti vadati. so kira pācīnacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ ṭhito pādaṃ pasāretvā pacchimacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ akkamati, puna dutiyaṃ pādaṃ pasāretvā paracakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ akkamati. ^b^icchāgata^eb^nti icchā eva. ^b^aññatrevā^eb^ti nippapañcataṃ dasseti. bhikkhācārakāle kiresa nāgalatādantakaṭṭhaṃ khāditvā anotatte mukhaṃ dhovitvā kāle sampatte uttarakurumhi piṇḍāya caritvā cakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ nisinno bhattakiccaṃ karoti, tattha muhuttaṃ vissamitvā puna javati. ^b^vassasatāyuko^eb^ti tadā dīghāyukakālo hoti, ayaṃ pana vassasatāvasiṭṭhe ^a^M1.0109^ea^ āyumhi gamanaṃ ārabhi. ^b^vassasatajīvī^eb^ti taṃ vassasataṃ anantarāyena jīvanto. ^b^antarāva kālaṅkato^eb^ti cakkavāḷalokassa antaṃ appatvā antarāva mato. so pana tattha kālaṃ katvāpi āgantvā imasmiṃyeva cakkavāḷe nibbatti. ^b^appatvā^eb^ti saṅkhāralokassa antaṃ appatvā. ^b^dukkhassā^eb^ti vaṭṭadukkhassa. ^b^antakiriya^eb^nti pariyantakaraṇaṃ. ^b^kaḷevare^eb^ti attabhāve. ^b^sasaññimhi samanake^eb^ti sasaññe sacitte. ^b^loka^eb^nti dukkhasaccaṃ. ^b^lokasamudaya^eb^nti samudayasaccaṃ. ^b^lokanirodha^eb^nti nirodhasaccaṃ. ^b^paṭipada^eb^nti maggasaccaṃ. iti -- ``nāhaṃ, āvuso, imāni cattāri saccāni tiṇakaṭṭhādīsu paññapemi ^a^P1.0118^ea^, imasmiṃ pana cātumahābhūtike kāyasmiṃ yeva paññapemī''ti dasseti. ^b^samitāvī^eb^ti samitapāpo. ^b^nāsīsatī^eb^ti na pattheti. chaṭṭhaṃ.
[03] 108-109^b^.^eb^ sattamaṭṭhamāni vuttatthāneva. sattamaṃ, aṭṭhamaṃ.

[03] 110^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^tuyhampi no, ānanda, sāriputto ruccatī^eb^ti satthā therassa vaṇṇaṃ kathetukāmo, vaṇṇo ca nāmesa visabhāgapuggalassa santike kathetuṃ na vaṭṭati. tassa santike kathito ^a^V1.0106^ea^ hi matthakaṃ na pāpuṇāti. so hi ``asuko nāma bhikkhu sīlavā''ti vutte. ``kiṃ tassa sīlaṃ? gorūpasīlo so. kiṃ tayā añño sīlavā na diṭṭhapubbo''ti vā? ``paññavā''ti vutte, ``kiṃ pañño so? kiṃ tayā añño paññavā na diṭṭhapubbo''ti? vā, ādīni vatvā vaṇṇakathāya antarāyaṃ karoti. ānandatthero pana sāriputtattherassa sabhāgo, paṇītāni labhitvā therassa deti, attano upaṭṭhākadārake pabbājetvā therassa santike upajjhaṃ gaṇhāpeti, upasampādeti. sāriputtattheropi ānandattherassa tatheva karoti. kiṃ kāraṇā? aññamaññassa guṇesu pasīditvā. ānandatthero hi -- ``amhākaṃ jeṭṭhabhātiko ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ satasahassañca kappe pāramiyo pūretvā soḷasavidhaṃ paññaṃ paṭivijjhitvā dhammasenāpatiṭṭhāne ṭhito''ti therassa guṇesu pasīditvāva theraṃ mamāyati. sāriputtattheropi -- ``sammāsambuddhassa mayā kattabbaṃ mukhodakadānādikiccaṃ sabbaṃ ānando karoti. ānandaṃ nissāya ahaṃ icchiticchitaṃ samāpattiṃ samāpajjituṃ labhāmī''ti āyasmato ānandassa guṇesu ^a^M1.0110^ea^ pasīditvāva taṃ mamāyati. tasmā bhagavā sāriputtattherassa vaṇṇaṃ kathetukāmo ānandattherassa santike kathetuṃ āraddho.

[03] tattha ^b^tuyhampī^eb^ti sampiṇḍanattho pi-kāro. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- ``ānanda, sāriputtassa ācāro gocaro vihāro abhikkamo ^a^P1.0119^ea^ paṭikkamo ālokitavilokitaṃ samiñjitapasāraṇaṃ mayhaṃ ruccati, asītimahātherānaṃ ruccati, sadevakassa lokassa ruccati. tuyhampi ruccatī''ti?

[03] tato thero sāṭakantare laddhokāso balavamallo viya tuṭṭhamānaso hutvā -- ``satthā mayhaṃ piyasahāyassa vaṇṇaṃ kathāpetukāmo. labhissāmi no ajja, dīpadhajabhūtaṃ mahājambuṃ vidhunanto viya valāhakantarato candaṃ nīharitvā dassento viya sāriputtattherassa vaṇṇaṃ kathetu''nti cintetvā paṭhamataraṃ tāva catūhi padehi puggalapalāpe haranto ^b^kassa hi nāma, bhante, abālassā^eb^tiādimāha. bālo hi bālatāya, duṭṭho dosatāya, mūḷho mohena, vipallatthacitto ummattako cittavipallāsena vaṇṇaṃ ``vaṇṇo''ti vā avaṇṇaṃ ``avaṇṇe''ti vā, ``ayaṃ buddho, ayaṃ sāvako''ti vā na jānāti. abālādayo pana jānanti, tasmā ^b^abālassā^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^na rucceyyā^eb^ti bālādīnaṃyeva hi so na rucceyya, na aññassa kassaci na rucceyya.

[03] evaṃ ^a^V1.0107^ea^ puggalapalāpe haritvā idāni soḷasahi padehi yathābhūtaṃ vaṇṇaṃ kathento ^b^paṇḍito, bhante^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^paṇḍito^eb^ti paṇḍiccena samannāgato, catūsu kosallesu ṭhitassetaṃ nāmaṃ. vuttañhetaṃ -- ``yato kho, ānanda, bhikkhu dhātukusalo ca hoti āyatanakusalo ca paṭiccasamuppādakusalo ca ṭhānāṭṭhānakusalo ca, ettāvatā kho, ānanda, `paṇḍito bhikkhū'ti alaṃ vacanāyā''ti (ma0 ni0 3.124). ^b^mahāpañño^eb^tiādīsu mahāpaññādīhi samannāgatoti attho. tatridaṃ mahāpaññādīnaṃ nānattaṃ (paṭi0 ma0 3.4) -- katamā ^b^mahāpaññā^eb^? mahante sīlakkhandhe pariggaṇhātīti mahāpaññā, mahante samādhikkhandhe, paññākkhandhe, vimuttikkhandhe, vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhe pariggaṇhātīti mahāpaññā. mahantāni ṭhānāṭṭhānāni, mahāvihārasamāpattiyo, mahantāni ariyasaccāni, mahante satipaṭṭhāne, sammappadhāne, iddhipāde, mahantāni indriyāni, balāni, bojjhaṅgāni, mahante ^a^M1.0111^ea^ ariyamagge ^a^P1.0120^ea^, mahantāni sāmaññaphalāni, mahāabhiññāyo, mahantaṃ paramatthaṃ nibbānaṃ pariggaṇhātīti mahāpaññā.
[03] sā pana therassa devorohanaṃ katvā saṅkassanagaradvāre ṭhitena satthārā puthujjanapañcake pañhe pucchite taṃ vissajjentassa pākaṭā jātā.

[03] katamā ^b^puthupaññā^eb^? puthu nānākhandhesu, (ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti puthupaññā.) puthu nānādhātūsu, puthu nānāāyatanesu, puthu nānāpaṭiccasamuppādesu, puthu nānāsuññatamanupalabbhesu, puthu nānāatthesu, dhammesu niruttīsu paṭibhānesu, puthu nānāsīlakkhandhesu, puthu nānāsamādhi-paññāvimutti-vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhesu, puthu nānāṭhānāṭṭhānesu, puthu nānāvihārasamāpattīsu, puthu nānāariyasaccesu, puthu nānāsatipaṭṭhānesu, sammappadhānesu, iddhipādesu, indriyesu, balesu, bojjhaṅgesu, puthu nānāariyamaggesu, sāmaññaphalesu, abhiññāsu, puthu nānājanasādhāraṇe dhamme samatikkamma paramatthe nibbāne ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti puthupaññā.

[03] katamā ^b^hāsapaññā^eb^? idhekacco hāsabahulo vedabahulo tuṭṭhibahulo pāmojjabahulo sīlaṃ paripūreti, indriyasaṃvaraṃ paripūreti, bhojane mattaññutaṃ, jāgariyānuyogaṃ, sīlakkhandhaṃ, samādhikkhandhaṃ, paññākkhandhaṃ, vimuttikkhandhaṃ, vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhaṃ paripūretīti, hāsapaññā. hāsabahulo pāmojjabahulo ṭhānāṭṭhānaṃ paṭivijjhatīti hāsapaññā. hāsabahulo vihārasamāpattiyo paripūretīti hāsapaññā. hāsabahulo ariyasaccāni paṭivijjhati. satipaṭṭhāne ^a^V1.0108^ea^, sammappadhāne, iddhipāde, indriyāni, balāni ^a^P1.0121^ea^, bojjhaṅgāni, ariyamaggaṃ bhāvetīti hāsapaññā. hāsabahulo sāmaññaphalāni sacchikaroti, abhiññāyo paṭivijjhatīti hāsapaññā, hāsabahulo vedatuṭṭhipāmojjabahulo paramatthaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikarotīti hāsapaññā.
[03] thero ca sarado nāma tāpaso hutvā anomadassissa bhagavato pādamūle aggasāvakapatthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi. taṃkālato paṭṭhāya hāsabahulo sīlaparipūraṇādīni akāsīti hāsapañño.

[03] katamā ^a^M1.0112^ea^ ^b^javanapaññā^eb^? yaṃkiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ...pe0... yaṃ dūre santike vā, sabbaṃ rūpaṃ aniccato khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā. dukkhato khippaṃ, anattato khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā. yā kāci vedanā...pe0... yā kāci saññā... ye keci saṅkhārā... yaṃkiñci viññāṇaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ...pe0... sabbaṃ viññāṇaṃ aniccato, dukkhato, anattato khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā. cakkhu...pe0... jarāmaraṇaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ aniccato, dukkhato, anattato khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā. rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhena, dukkhaṃ bhayaṭṭhena, anattā asārakaṭṭhenāti tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā rūpanirodhe nibbāne khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā. vedanā... saññā... saṅkhārā... viññāṇaṃ... cakkhu...pe0... jarāmaraṇaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhena...pe0... vibhūtaṃ katvā jarāmaraṇanirodhe nibbāne khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā. rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ...pe0... viññāṇaṃ. cakkhu...pe0... jarāmaraṇaṃ aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ khayadhammaṃ vayadhammaṃ virāgadhammaṃ nirodhadhammanti ^a^P1.0122^ea^ tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā jarāmaraṇanirodhe nibbāne khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā.

[03] katamā ^b^tikkhapaññā^eb^? khippaṃ kilese chindatīti tikkhapaññā. uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāseti, uppannaṃ byāpādavitakkaṃ... uppannaṃ vihiṃsāvitakkaṃ... uppannuppanne pāpake akusale dhamme... uppannaṃ rāgaṃ... dosaṃ... mohaṃ... kodhaṃ... upanāhaṃ... makkhaṃ... paḷāsaṃ... issaṃ... macchariyaṃ... māyaṃ... sāṭheyyaṃ... thambhaṃ... sārambhaṃ... mānaṃ... atimānaṃ... madaṃ... pamādaṃ... sabbe kilese... sabbe duccarite... sabbe abhisaṅkhāre... sabbe bhavagāmikamme nādhivāseti pajahati vinodeti, byantīkaroti, anabhāvaṃ gametīti tikkhapaññā. ekasmiṃ āsane ^a^V1.0109^ea^ cattāro ca ariyamaggā, cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni, catasso ca paṭisambhidāyo, cha ca abhiññāyo adhigatā honti sacchikatā phassitā paññāyāti tikkhapaññā.

[03] thero ca bhāgineyyassa dīghanakhaparibbājakassa vedanāpariggahasutte desiyamāne ṭhitakova sabbakilese chinditvā sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ paṭividdhakālato paṭṭhāya tikkhapañño nāma jāto. tenāha -- ``tikkhapañño, bhante, āyasmā sāriputto''ti.

[03] katamā ^a^M1.0113^ea^ ^b^nibbedhikapaññā^eb^? idhekacco sabbasaṅkhāresu ubbegabahulo hoti uttāsabahulo ukkaṇṭhanabahulo aratibahulo anabhiratibahulo bahimukho na ramati sabbasaṅkhāresu, anibbiddhapubbaṃ appadālitapubbaṃ lobhakkhandhaṃ nibbijjhati padāletīti nibbedhikapaññā. anibbiddhapubbaṃ appadālitapubbaṃ dosakkhandhaṃ... mohakkhandhaṃ... kodhaṃ... upanāhaṃ...pe0... sabbe bhavagāmikamme nibbijjhati padāletīti nibbedhikapaññā.

[03] ^b^appiccho^eb^ti santaguṇaniguhanatā, paccayapaṭiggahaṇe ca mattaññutā, etaṃ appicchalakkhaṇanti iminā lakkhaṇena samannāgato. ^b^santuṭṭho^eb^ti catūsu paccayesu yathālābhasantoso yathābalasantoso yathāsāruppasantosoti, imehi tīhi santosehi samannāgato. ^b^pavivitto^eb^ti kāyaviveko ca ^a^P1.0123^ea^ vivekaṭṭhakāyānaṃ nekkhammābhiratānaṃ, cittaviveko ca parisuddhacittānaṃ paramavodānappattānaṃ, upadhiviveko ca nirupadhīnaṃ puggalānaṃ visaṅkhāragatānanti, imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vivekānaṃ lābhī. ^b^asaṃsaṭṭho^eb^ti dassanasaṃsaggo savanasaṃsaggo samullapanasaṃsaggo paribhogasaṃsaggo kāyasaṃsaggoti, imehi pañcahi saṃsaggehi virahito. ayañca pañcavidho saṃsaggo rājūhi rājamahāmattehi titthiyehi titthiyasāvakehi upāsakehi upasikāhi bhikkhūhi bhikkhunīhīti aṭṭhahi puggalehi saddhiṃ jāyati, so sabbopi therassa natthīti asaṃsaṭṭho.

[03] ^b^āraddhavīriyo^eb^ti paggahitavīriyo paripuṇṇavīriyo. tattha āraddhavīriyo bhikkhu gamane uppannakilesassa ṭhānaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na deti, ṭhāne uppannassa nisajjaṃ, nisajjāya uppannassa seyyaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na deti, tasmiṃ tasmiṃ iriyāpathe uppannaṃ tattha tattheva niggaṇhāti. thero pana catucattālīsa vassāni mañce piṭṭhiṃ na pasāreti. taṃ sandhāya ``āraddhavīriyo''ti āha. ^b^vattā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0110^ea^ odhunanavattā. bhikkhūnaṃ ajjhācāraṃ disvā ``ajja kathessāmi, sve kathessāmī''ti kathāvavatthānaṃ na karoti, tasmiṃ tasmiṃ yeva ṭhāne ovadati anusāsatīti attho.

[03] ^b^vacanakkhamo^eb^ti vacanaṃ khamati. eko hi parassa ovādaṃ deti, sayaṃ pana aññena ovadiyamāno kujjhati. thero pana parassapi ovādaṃ deti, sayaṃ ^a^M1.0114^ea^ ovadiyamānopi sirasā sampaṭicchati. ekadivasaṃ kira sāriputtattheraṃ sattavassiko sāmaṇero -- ``bhante, sāriputta, tumhākaṃ nivāsanakaṇṇo olambatī''ti āha. thero kiñci avatvāva ekamantaṃ gantvā parimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsetvā āgamma ``ettakaṃ vaṭṭati ācariyā''ti añjaliṃ paggayha aṭṭhāsi.
[21] ``tadahu pabbajito santo, jātiyā sattavassiko.
[22] sopi maṃ anusāseyya, sampaṭicchāmi matthake''ti.. (mi0 pa0 6.4.8) --

[03] ^b^codako^eb^ti ^a^P1.0124^ea^ vatthusmiṃ otiṇṇe vā anotiṇṇe vā vītikkamaṃ disvā -- ``āvuso, bhikkhunā nāma evaṃ nivāsetabbaṃ, evaṃ pārupitabbaṃ, evaṃ gantabbaṃ, evaṃ ṭhātabbaṃ, evaṃ nisīditabbaṃ, evaṃ khāditabbaṃ, evaṃ bhuñjitabba''nti tantivasena anusiṭṭhiṃ deti.
[03] ^b^pāpagarahī^eb^ti pāpapuggale na passe, na tesaṃ vacanaṃ suṇe, tehi saddhiṃ ekacakkavāḷepi na vaseyyaṃ.
[21] ``mā me kadāci pāpiccho, kusīto hīnavīriyo.
[22] appassuto anādaro, sameto ahu katthacī''ti.. --

[25] evaṃ pāpapuggalepi garahati, ``samaṇena nāma rāgavasikena dosamohavasikena na hotabbaṃ, uppanno rāgo doso moho pahātabbo''ti evaṃ pāpadhammepi garahatīti dvīhi kāraṇehi ``pāpagarahī, bhante, āyasmā sāriputto''ti vadati.

[03] evaṃ ^a^V1.0111^ea^ āyasmatā ānandena soḷasahi padehi therassa yathābhūtavaṇṇappakāsane kate -- ``kiṃ ānando attano piyasahāyassa vaṇṇaṃ kathetuṃ na labhati, kathetu kiṃ pana tena kathitaṃ tatheva hoti, kiṃ so sabbaññū''ti? koci pāpapuggalo vattuṃ mā labhatūti satthā taṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanaṃ akuppaṃ sabbaññubhāsitaṃ karonto jinamuddikāya lañchanto ^b^evameta^eb^ntiādimāha.

[03] evaṃ ^a^M1.0115^ea^ tathāgatena ca ānandattherena ca mahātherassa vaṇṇe kathiyamāne bhumaṭṭhakā devatā uṭṭhahitvā eteheva soḷasahi padehi vaṇṇaṃ kathayiṃsu. tato ākāsaṭṭhakadevatā sītavalāhakā uṇhavalāhakā cātumahārājikāti yāva akaniṭṭhabrahmalokā devatā uṭṭhahitvā eteheva soḷasahi padehi vaṇṇaṃ kathayiṃsu. etenupāyena ekacakkavāḷaṃ ādiṃ katvā dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu devatā uṭṭhahitvā kathayiṃsu. athāyasmato sāriputtassa saddhivihāriko susīmo devaputto cintesi -- ``imā devatā attano attano nakkhattakīḷaṃ pahāya ^a^P1.0125^ea^ tattha tattha gantvā mayhaṃ upajjhāyasseva vaṇṇaṃ kathenti, gacchāmi tathāgatassa santikaṃ, gantvā etadeva vaṇṇabhaṇanaṃ devatābhāsitaṃ karomī''ti, so tathā akāsi. taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^atha kho susīmo^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[01] ^b^uccāvacā^eb^ti aññesu ṭhānesu paṇītaṃ uccaṃ vuccati, hīnaṃ avacaṃ. idha pana uccāvacāti nānāvidhā vaṇṇanibhā. tassā kira devaparisāya nīlaṭṭhānaṃ atinīlaṃ, pītakaṭṭhānaṃ atipītakaṃ, lohitaṭṭhānaṃ atilohitaṃ, odātaṭṭhānaṃ accodātanti, catubbidhā vaṇṇanibhā pātubhavi. teneva ^b^seyyathāpi nāmā^eb^ti catasso upamā āgatā. tattha ^b^subho^eb^ti sundaro. ^b^jātimā^eb^ti jātisampanno. ^b^suparikammakato^eb^ti dhovanādiparikammena suṭṭhu parikammakato. ^b^paṇḍukambale nikkhitto^eb^ti rattakambale ṭhapito. ^b^evameva^eb^nti rattakambale nikkhittamaṇi viya sabbā ekappahāreneva virocituṃ āraddhā. ^b^nikkha^eb^nti atirekapañcasuvaṇṇena katapiḷandhanaṃ. tañhi ghaṭṭanamajjanakkhamaṃ hoti. ^b^jambonada^eb^nti mahājambusākhāya pavattanadiyaṃ nibbattaṃ, mahājambuphalarase vā pathaviyaṃ paviṭṭhe suvaṇṇaṅkurā uṭṭhahanti, tena suvaṇṇena katapiḷandhanantipi attho. ^b^dakkhakammāraputtaukkāmukhasukusalasampahaṭṭha^eb^nti sukusalena kammāraputtena ukkāmukhe pacitvā sampahaṭṭhaṃ. dhātuvibhaṅge (ma0 ni0 3.357 ādayo) akatabhaṇḍaṃ gahitaṃ, idha pana katabhaṇḍaṃ.

[03] ^b^viddhe^eb^ti dūrībhūte. ^b^deve^eb^ti ākāse. ^b^nabhaṃ abbhussakkamāno^eb^ti ākāsaṃ abhilaṅghanto. iminā ^a^V1.0112^ea^ taruṇasūriyabhāvo dassito. ^b^sorato^eb^ti ^a^M1.0116^ea^ soraccena samannāgato. ^b^danto^eb^ti nibbisevano. ^b^satthuvaṇṇābhato^eb^ti ^a^P1.0126^ea^ satthārā ābhatavaṇṇo. satthā hi aṭṭhaparisamajjhe nisīditvā ``sevatha, bhikkhave, sāriputtamoggallāne''tiādinā (ma0 ni0 3.371) nayena therassa vaṇṇaṃ āharīti thero ābhatavaṇṇo nāma hoti. ^b^kālaṃ kaṅkhatī^eb^ti parinibbānakālaṃ pattheti. khīṇāsavo hi neva maraṇaṃ abhinandati, na jīvitaṃ pattheti, divasasaṅkhepaṃ vetanaṃ gahetvā ṭhitapuriso viya kālaṃ pana pattheti, olokento tiṭṭhatīti attho. tenevāha --
[21] ``nābhinandāmi maraṇaṃ, nābhinandāmi jīvitaṃ.
[22] kālañca paṭikaṅkhāmi, nibbisaṃ bhatako yathā''ti.. (theragā0 1001-1002). navamaṃ.

[03] 111^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^nānātitthiyasāvakā^eb^ti te kira kammavādino ahesuṃ, tasmā dānādīni puññāni katvā sagge nibbattā, te ``attano attano satthari pasādena nibbattamhā''ti saññino hutvā ``gacchāma dasabalassa santike ṭhatvā amhākaṃ satthārānaṃ vaṇṇaṃ kathessāmā''ti āgantvā paccekagāthāhi kathayiṃsu. tattha ^b^chinditamārite^eb^ti chindite ca mārite ca. ^b^hatajānīsū^eb^ti pothane ca dhanajānīsu ca. ^b^puññaṃ vā panā^eb^ti attano puññampi na samanupassati, saṅkhepato puññāpuññānaṃ vipāko natthīti vadati. ^b^sa ve vissāsamācikkhī^eb^ti so -- ``evaṃ katapāpānampi katapuññānampi vipāko natthī''ti vadanto sattānaṃ vissāsaṃ avassayaṃ patiṭṭhaṃ ācikkhati, tasmā mānanaṃ vandanaṃ pūjanaṃ arahatīti vadati.

[03] ^b^tapojigucchāyā^eb^ti kāyakilamathatapena pāpajigucchanena. ^b^susaṃvutatto^eb^ti samannāgato pihito vā. ^b^jegucchī^eb^ti tapena pāpajigucchako. ^b^nipako^eb^ti paṇḍito. ^b^cātuyāmasusaṃvuto^eb^ti cātuyāmena susaṃvuto. cātuyāmo ^a^P1.0127^ea^ nāma sabbavārivārito ca hoti sabbavāriyutto ca sabbavāridhuto ca sabbavāriphuṭo cāti ime cattāro koṭṭhāsā. tattha ^b^sabbavārivārito^eb^ti vāritasabbaudako, paṭikkhittasabbasītodakoti attho. so kira sītodake sattasaññī hoti ^a^M1.0117^ea^, tasmā taṃ na valañjeti. ^b^sabbavāriyutto^eb^ti sabbena pāpavāraṇena yuto. ^b^sabbavāridhuto^eb^ti sabbena pāpavāraṇena dhutapāpo ^a^V1.0113^ea^. ^b^sabbavāriphuṭo^eb^ti sabbena pāpavāraṇena phuṭṭho. ^b^diṭṭhaṃ sutañca ācikkha^eb^nti diṭṭhaṃ ``diṭṭhaṃ me''ti sutaṃ ``sutaṃ me''ti ācikkhanto, na niguhanto. ^b^na hi nūna kibbisī^eb^ti evarūpo satthā kibbisakārako nāma na hoti.

[03] ^b^nānātitthiye^eb^ti so kira nānātitthiyānaṃyeva upaṭṭhāko, tasmā te ārabbha vadati. ^b^pakudhako kātiyāno^eb^ti pakudho kaccāyano. ^b^nigaṇṭho^eb^ti nāṭaputto. ^b^makkhalipūraṇāse^eb^ti makkhali ca pūraṇo ca. ^b^sāmaññappattā^eb^ti samaṇadhamme koṭippattā. ^b^na hi nūna te^eb^ti sappurisehi na dūre, teyeva loke sappurisāti vadati. ^b^paccabhāsī^eb^ti ``ayaṃ ākoṭako imesaṃ nagganissirikānaṃ dasabalassa santike ṭhatvā vaṇṇaṃ kathetīti tesaṃ avaṇṇaṃ kathessāmī''ti patiabhāsīti.

[01] tattha ^b^sahācaritenā^eb^ti saha caritamattena. ^b^chavo sigālo^eb^ti lāmako kālasigālo. ^b^kotthuko^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^saṅkassarācāro^eb^ti āsaṅkitasamācāro. ^b^na sataṃ sarikkho^eb^ti paṇḍitānaṃ sappurisānaṃ sadiso na hoti, kiṃ tvaṃ kālasigālasadise titthiye sīhe karosīti?

[03] ^b^anvāvisitvā^eb^ti ``ayaṃ evarūpānaṃ satthārānaṃ avaṇṇaṃ katheti, teneva naṃ mukhena vaṇṇaṃ kathāpessāmī''ti cintetvā tassa sarīre anuāvisi adhimucci, evaṃ anvāvisitvā. ^b^āyuttā^eb^ti tapojigucchane yuttapayuttā. ^b^pālayaṃ pavivekiya^eb^nti pavivekaṃ pālayantā. te kira ``nhāpitapavivekaṃ pālessāmā''ti ^a^P1.0128^ea^ sayaṃ kese luñcanti. ``cīvarapavivekaṃ pātessāmā''ti naggā vicaranti. ``piṇḍapātapavivekaṃ pālessāmā''ti sunakhā viya bhūmiyaṃ vā bhuñjanti hatthesu vā. ``senāsanapavivekaṃ pālessāmā''ti kaṇṭakaseyyādīni kappenti. ^b^rūpe niviṭṭhā^eb^ti taṇhādiṭṭhīhi rūpe patiṭṭhitā. ^b^devalokābhinandino^eb^ti devalokapatthanakāmā. ^b^mātiyā^eb^ti maccā, te ve maccā paralokatthāya sammā anusāsantīti vadati.

[03] ^b^iti^eb^ ^a^M1.0118^ea^ ^b^viditvā^eb^ti ``ayaṃ paṭhamaṃ etesaṃ avaṇṇaṃ kathetvā idāni vaṇṇaṃ katheti, ko nu kho eso''ti āvajjento jānitvāva. ^b^ye cantalikkhasmiṃ pabhāsavaṇṇā^eb^ti ye antalikkhe candobhāsasūriyobhāsasañjhārāgaindadhanutārakarūpānaṃ pabhāsavaṇṇā. ^b^sabbeva te te^eb^ti sabbeva te tayā. ^b^namucī^eb^ti māraṃ ālapati. ^b^āmisaṃva macchānaṃ vadhāya khittā^eb^ti yathā macchānaṃ vadhatthāya baḷisalaggaṃ ^a^V1.0114^ea^ āmisaṃ khipati, evaṃ tayā pasaṃsamānena ete rūpā sattānaṃ vadhāya khittāti vadati.

[03] ^b^māṇavagāmiyo^eb^ti ayaṃ kira devaputto buddhupaṭṭhāko. ^b^rājagahīyāna^eb^nti rājagahapabbatānaṃ. ^b^seto^eb^ti kelāso. ^b^aghagāmina^eb^nti ākāsagāmīnaṃ. ^b^udadhina^eb^nti udakanidhānānaṃ. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- yathā rājagahīyānaṃ pabbatānaṃ vipulo seṭṭho, himavantapabbatānaṃ kelāso, ākāsagāmīnaṃ ādicco, udakanidhānānaṃ samuddo, nakkhattānaṃ cando, evaṃ sadevakassa lokassa buddho seṭṭhoti. dasamaṃ.
[06] nānātitthiyavaggo tatiyo.
[06] iti sāratthappakāsiniyā
[03] saṃyuttanikāya-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] devaputtasaṃyuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 112^b^.^eb^ kosalasaṃyuttassa ^a^V1.0115^ea^ ^a^M1.0119^ea^ paṭhame ^a^P1.0129^ea^ ^b^bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodī^eb^ti yathā khamanīyādīni pucchanto bhagavā tena, evaṃ sopi bhagavatā saddhiṃ samappavattamodo ahosi. sītodakaṃ viya uṇhodakena sammoditaṃ ekībhāvaṃ agamāsi. yāya ca -- ``kacci, bho gotama, khamanīyaṃ, kacci yāpanīyaṃ, kacci bhoto ca gotamassa sāvakānañca appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāro''tiādikāya kathāya sammodi, taṃ pītipāmojjasaṅkhātasammodajananato sammodituṃ yuttabhāvato ca ^b^sammodanīyaṃ,^eb^ atthabyañjanamadhuratāya cirampi kālaṃ sāretuṃ nirantaraṃ pavattetuṃ araharūpato saritabbabhāvato ca ^b^sāraṇīyaṃ^eb^. suyyamānasukhato ca sammodanīyaṃ, anussariyamānasukhato sāraṇīyaṃ. tathā byañjanaparisuddhatāya sammodanīyaṃ, atthaparisuddhatāya sāraṇīyanti evaṃ anekehi pariyāyehi sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā pariyosāpetvā niṭṭhapetvā ito pubbe tathāgatassa adiṭṭhattā guṇāguṇavasena gambhīrabhāvaṃ vā uttānabhāvaṃ vā ajānanto ekamantaṃ nisīdi, ekamantaṃ nisinno kho yaṃ ovaṭṭikasāraṃ katvā āgato lokanissaraṇabhavokkantipañhaṃ satthu sammāsambuddhataṃ pucchituṃ ^b^bhavampi no^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] tattha ^b^bhavampī^eb^ti pi-kāro sampiṇḍanatthe nipāto, tena ca cha satthāre sampiṇḍeti. yathā pūraṇādayo ``sammāsambuddhamhā''ti paṭijānanti, evaṃ bhavampi nu paṭijānātīti attho. idaṃ pana rājā na attano laddhiyā, loke mahājanena ^a^P1.0130^ea^ gahitapaṭiññāvasena pucchati. atha bhagavā buddhasīhanādaṃ nadanto ^b^yaṃ hi taṃ mahārājā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^ahaṃ hi mahārājā^eb^ti anuttaraṃ sabbaseṭṭhaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇasaṅkhātaṃ sammāsambodhiṃ ahaṃ abhisambuddhoti attho. ^b^samaṇabrāhmaṇā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0116^ea^ pabbajjūpagamanena ^a^M1.0120^ea^ samaṇā, jātivasena brāhmaṇā. ^b^saṅghino^eb^tiādīsu pabbajitasamūhasaṅkhāto saṅgho etesaṃ atthīti ^b^saṅghino^eb^. sveva gaṇo etesaṃ atthīti ^b^gaṇino^eb^. ācārasikkhāpanavasena tassa gaṇassa ācariyāti ^b^gaṇācariyā. ñātā^eb^ti paññātā pākaṭā. ``appicchā santuṭṭhā appicchatāya vatthampi na nivāsentī''ti evaṃ samuggato yaso etesaṃ atthīti ^b^yasassino. titthakarā^eb^ti laddhikarā. ^b^sādhusammatā^eb^ti ``santo sappurisā''ti evaṃ sammatā. ^b^bahujanassā^eb^ti assutavato andhabālaputhujjanassa. ^b^pūraṇo^eb^tiādīni tesaṃ nāmagottāni. ^b^pūraṇo^eb^ti hi nāmameva. tathā, ^b^makkhalī^eb^ti. so pana gosālāya jātattā ^b^gosālo^eb^ti vutto. ^b^nāṭaputto^eb^ti nāṭassa putto. ^b^belaṭṭhaputto^eb^ti belaṭṭhassa putto. ^b^kaccāyano^eb^ti pakudhassa gottaṃ. kesakambalassa dhāraṇato ^b^ajito kesakambalo^eb^ti vutto.

[03] ^b^tepi mayā^eb^ti kappakolāhalaṃ buddhakolāhalaṃ cakkavattikolāhalanti tīṇi kolāhalāni. tattha ``vassasatasahassamatthake kappuṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatī''ti kappakolāhalaṃ nāma hoti -- ``ito vassasatasahassamatthake loko vinassissati, mettaṃ mārisā, bhāvetha, karuṇaṃ muditaṃ upekkha''nti manussappathe devatā ghosentiyo vicaranti. ``vassasahassamatthake pana buddho uppajjissatī''ti buddhakolāhalaṃ nāma hoti -- ``ito vassasahassamatthake buddho uppajjitvā dhammānudhammapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannena saṅgharatanena parivārito dhammaṃ desento vicarissatī''ti devatā ugghosenti. ``vassasatamatthake pana cakkavattī uppajjissatī''ti cakkavattikolāhalaṃ nāma hoti -- ``ito vassasatamatthake sattaratanasampanno catuddīpissaro ^a^P1.0131^ea^ sahassa puttaparivāro vehāsaṅgamo cakkavattirājā uppajjissatī''ti devatā ugghosenti.

[03] imesu tīsu kolāhalesu ime cha satthāro buddhakolāhalaṃ sutvā ācariye payirupāsitvā cintāmāṇivijjādīni uggaṇhitvā -- ``mayaṃ buddhamhā''ti paṭiññaṃ katvā mahājanaparivutā janapadaṃ vicarantā anupubbena sāvatthiyaṃ pattā. tesaṃ upaṭṭhākā rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā, ``mahārāja, pūraṇo kassapo...pe0... ajito kesakambalo buddho kira sabbaññū kirā''ti ārocesuṃ. rājā ``tumheva ne nimantetvā ānethā''ti āha ^a^M1.0121^ea^. te gantvā tehi, ``rājā vo nimanteti. rañño gehe bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā''ti vuttā gantuṃ na ussahanti, punappunaṃ vuccamānā upaṭṭhākānaṃ cittānurakkhaṇatthāya adhivāsetvā sabbe ekatova agamaṃsu. rājā āsanāni paññāpetvā ^a^V1.0117^ea^ ``nisīdantū''ti āha. nigguṇānaṃ attabhāve rājusmā nāma pharati, te mahārahesu āsanesu nisīdituṃ asakkontā phalakesu ceva bhūmiyaṃ ca nisīdiṃsu.

[03] rājā ``ettakeneva natthi tesaṃ anto sukkadhammo''ti vatvā āhāraṃ adatvāva tālato patitaṃ muggarena pothento viya ``tumhe buddhā, na buddhā''ti pañhaṃ pucchi. te cintayiṃsu -- ``sace `buddhamhā'ti vakkhāma, rājā buddhavisaye pañhaṃ pucchitvā kathetuṃ asakkonte `tumhe mayaṃ buddhāti mahājanaṃ vañcetvā āhiṇḍathā'ti jivhampi chindāpeyya, aññampi anatthaṃ kareyyā''ti sakapaṭiññāya eva `na mayaṃ buddhā'ti vadiṃsu. atha ne rājā gehato nikaḍḍhāpesi. te rājagharato nikkhante upaṭṭhākā pucchiṃsu -- ``kiṃ ācariyā rājā tumhe pañhaṃ pucchitvā sakkārasammānaṃ akāsī''ti? rājā ``buddhā tumhe''ti pucchi, tato mayaṃ -- ``sace ayaṃ rājā buddhavisaye pañhaṃ kathiyamānaṃ ajānanto amhesu manaṃ padosessati, bahuṃ apuññaṃ pasavissatī''ti rañño anukampāya `na mayaṃ buddhā'ti vadimhā, mayaṃ pana buddhā eva, amhākaṃ buddhabhāvo, udakena dhovitvāpi harituṃ na sakkāti. iti bahiddhā `buddhamhā'ti ^a^P1.0132^ea^ āhaṃsu -- rañño santike `na mayaṃ buddhā'ti vadiṃsūti, idaṃ gahetvā rājā evamāha. tattha ^b^kiṃ pana bhavaṃ gotamo daharo ceva jātiyā, navo ca pabbajjāyā^eb^ti idaṃ attano paṭiññaṃ gahetvā vadati. tattha ^b^ki^eb^nti paṭikkhepavacanaṃ. ete jātimahallakā ca cirapabbajitā ca ``buddhamhā''ti na paṭijānanti, bhavaṃ gotamo jātiyā ca daharo pabbajjāya ca navo kiṃ paṭijānāti? mā paṭijānāhīti attho.

[01] ^b^na uññātabbā^eb^ti na avajānitabbā. ^b^na paribhotabbā^eb^ti na paribhavitabbā. ^b^katame cattāro^eb^ti kathetukamyatāpucchā. ^b^khattiyo^eb^ti rājakumāro. ^b^urago^eb^ti āsīviso. ^b^aggī^eb^ti aggiyeva. ^b^bhikkhū^eb^ti imasmiṃ pana pade desanākusalatāya attānaṃ abbhantaraṃ katvā sīlavantaṃ pabbajitaṃ dasseti. ettha ^a^M1.0122^ea^ ca daharaṃ rājakumāraṃ disvā, ukkamitvā maggaṃ adento, pārupanaṃ anapanento, nisinnāsanato anuṭṭhahanto, hatthipiṭṭhādīhi anotaranto, heṭṭhā katvā maññanavasena aññampi evarūpaṃ anācāraṃ karonto khattiyaṃ avajānāti nāma. ``bhaddako vatāyaṃ rājakumāro, mahākaṇḍo mahodaro -- kiṃ nāma yaṃkiñci corūpaddavaṃ vūpasametuṃ yattha katthaci ṭhāne rajjaṃ anusāsituṃ sakkhissatī''tiādīni vadanto paribhoti nāma. añjanisalākamattampi āsīvisapotakaṃ kaṇṇādīsu piḷandhanto aṅgulimpi jivhampi ḍaṃsāpento uragaṃ avajānāti nāma ^a^V1.0118^ea^. ``bhaddako vatāyaṃ āsīviso udakadeḍḍubho viya kiṃ nāma kiñcideva ḍaṃsituṃ kassacideva kāye visaṃ pharituṃ sakkhissatī''tiādīni vadanto paribhoti nāma. khajjopanakamattampi aggiṃ gahetvā hatthena kīḷanto bhaṇḍukkhalikāya khipanto cūḷāya vā sayanapiṭṭhasāṭakapasibbakādīsu vā ṭhapento aggiṃ avajānāti nāma. ``bhaddako vatāyaṃ aggi kataraṃ nu kho yāgubhattaṃ pacissati, kataraṃ macchamaṃsaṃ, kassa sītaṃ vinodessatī''tiādīni vadanto paribhoti nāma. daharasāmaṇerampi pana disvā ukkamitvā maggaṃ adentoti ^a^P1.0133^ea^ rājakumāre vuttaṃ anācāraṃ karonto bhikkhuṃ avajānāti nāma. ``bhaddako vatāyaṃ sāmaṇero mahākaṇṭho mahodaro yaṃkiñci buddhavacanaṃ uggahetuṃ yaṃkiñci araññaṃ ajjhogāhetvā vasituṃ sakkhissati, saṅghattherakāle manāpo bhavissatī''tiādīni vadanto paribhoti nāma. taṃ sabbampi na kātabbanti dassento ^b^na uññātabbo na paribhotabbo^eb^ti āha.

[03] ^b^etadavocā^eb^ti etaṃ gāthābandhaṃ avoca. gāthā ca nāmetā tadatthadīpanāpi honti visesatthadīpanāpi, tatrimā tadatthampi visesatthampi dīpentiyeva. tattha ^b^khattiya^eb^nti khettānaṃ adhipatiṃ. vuttañhetaṃ ``khettānaṃ adhipatīti kho, vāseṭṭha, `khattiyo khattiyo'tveva dutiyaṃ akkharaṃ upanibbatta''nti (dī0 ni0 3.131). ^b^jātisampanna^eb^nti tāyeva khattiyajātiyā jātisampannaṃ. ^b^abhijāta^eb^nti tīṇi kulāni atikkamitvā jātaṃ.

[03] ^b^ṭhānaṃ hī^eb^ti kāraṇaṃ vijjati. ^b^manujindo^eb^ti manussajeṭṭhako. ^b^rājadaṇḍenā^eb^ti rañño uddhaṭadaṇḍena, so appako nāma na hoti, dasasahassavīsatisahassappamāṇo hotiyeva. ^b^tasmiṃ pakkamate bhusa^eb^nti ^a^M1.0123^ea^ tasmiṃ puggale balavaupakkamaṃ upakkamati. ^b^rakkhaṃ jīvitamattano^eb^ti attano jīvitaṃ rakkhamāno taṃ khattiyaṃ parivajjeyya na ghaṭṭeyya.

[03] ^b^uccāvacehī^eb^ti nānāvidhehi. ^b^vaṇṇehī^eb^ti saṇṭhānehi. yena yena hi vaṇṇena caranto gocaraṃ labhati, yadi sappavaṇṇena, yadi deḍḍubhavaṇṇena, yadi dhamanivaṇṇena, antamaso kalandakavaṇṇenapi caratiyeva. ^b^āsajjā^eb^ti patvā. ^b^bāla^eb^nti yena bālena ghaṭṭito, taṃ bālaṃ naraṃ vā nāriṃ vā ḍaṃseyya.

[03] ^b^pahūtabhakkha^eb^nti bahubhakkhaṃ. aggissa hi abhakkhaṃ nāma natthi. ^b^jālina^eb^nti jālavantaṃ. ^b^pāvaka^eb^nti ^a^V1.0119^ea^ aggiṃ. pāvagantipi pāṭho. ^b^kaṇhavattani^eb^nti vattanīti maggo, agginā gatamaggo kaṇho hoti kāḷako, tasmā ``kaṇhavattanī''ti vuccati.

[03] ^b^mahā hutvānā^eb^ti mahanto hutvā. aggi hi ekadā yāvabrahmalokappamāṇopi hoti. ^b^jāyanti^eb^ ^a^P1.0134^ea^ ^b^tattha pārohā^eb^ti tattha agginā daḍḍhavane pārohā jāyanti. ^b^pārohā^eb^ti tiṇarukkhādayo vuccanti. te hi agginā daḍḍhaṭṭhāne mūlamattepi avasiṭṭhe pādato rohanti jāyanti vaḍḍhanti, tasmā ``pārohā''ti vuccanti. puna rohanatthena vā ^b^pārohā. ahorattānamaccaye^eb^ti rattindivānaṃ atikkame. nidāghepi deve vuṭṭhamatte jāyanti.

[03] ^b^bhikkhu ḍahati tejasā^eb^ti ettha akkosantaṃ paccakkosanto bhaṇḍantaṃ paṭibhaṇḍanto paharantaṃ paṭipaharanto bhikkhu nāma kiñci bhikkhutejasā ḍahituṃ na sakkoti. yo pana akkosantaṃ na paccakkosati, bhaṇḍantaṃ na paṭibhaṇḍati. paharantaṃ na paṭipaharati, tasmiṃ vippaṭipanno tassa sīlatejena ḍayhati. tenevetaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^na tassa puttā pasavo^eb^ti tassa puttadhītaropi gomahiṃsakukkuṭasūkarādayo pasavopi na bhavanti, vinassantīti attho. ^b^dāyādā vindare dhana^eb^nti tassa dāyādāpi dhanaṃ na vindanti. ^b^tālāvatthū bhavanti te^eb^ti te bhikkhutejasā daḍḍhā vatthumattāvasiṭṭho matthakacchinnatālo viya bhavanti, puttadhītādivasena na vaḍḍhantīti attho.

[03] ^b^tasmā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0124^ea^ yasmā samaṇatejena daḍḍhā matthakacchinnatālo viya aviruḷhidhammā bhavanti, tasmā. ^b^sammadeva samācare^eb^ti sammā samācareyya. sammā samācarantena pana kiṃ kātabbanti? khattiyaṃ tāva nissāya laddhabbaṃ gāmanigamayānavāhanādiānisaṃsaṃ, uragaṃ nissāya tassa kīḷāpanena laddhabbaṃ vatthahiraññasuvaṇṇādiānisaṃsaṃ aggiṃ nissāya tassānubhāvena pattabbaṃ yāgubhattapacanasītavinodanādiānisaṃsaṃ, bhikkhuṃ nissāya tassa vasena pattabbaṃ asutasavanasutapariyodapana-saggamaggādhigamādiānisaṃsaṃ sampassamānena ``ete nissāya pubbe vuttappakāro ādīnavo atthi. kiṃ imehī''ti? na sabbaso pahātabbā. issariyatthikena pana vuttappakāraṃ avajānanañca paribhavanañca akatvā pubbuṭṭhāyipacchānipātitādīhi ^a^P1.0135^ea^ upāyehi khattiyakumāro tosetabbo, evaṃ tato issariyaṃ adhigamissati. ahituṇḍikena urage vissāsaṃ akatvā nāgavijjaṃ parivattetvā ajapadena daṇḍena gīvāya gahetvā visaharena mūlena dāṭhā dhovitvā peḷāyaṃ pakkhipitvā kīḷāpentena caritabbaṃ. evaṃ taṃ nissāya ghāsacchādanādīni labhissati. yāgupacanādīni ^a^V1.0120^ea^ kattukāmena aggiṃ vissāsena bhaṇḍukkhalikādīsu apakkhipitvā hatthehi anāmasantena gomayacuṇṇādīhi jāletvā yāgupacanādīni kattabbāni, evaṃ taṃ nissāya ānisaṃsaṃ labhissati. asutasavanādīni patthayantenapi bhikkhuṃ ativissāsena vejjakammanavakammādīsu ayojetvā catūhi paccayehi sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhātabbo, evaṃ taṃ nissāya asutapubbaṃ buddhavacanaṃ asutapubbaṃ pañhāvinicchayaṃ diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaṃ atthaṃ tisso kulasampattiyo cha kāmasaggāni nava ca brahmaloke patvā amatamahānibbānadassanampi labhissatīti imamatthaṃ sandhāya ^b^sammadeva samācare^eb^ti āha.

[03] ^b^etadavocā^eb^ti dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasanno pasādaṃ āvikaronto etaṃ ``abhikkanta''ntiādivacanaṃ avoca. tattha ^b^abhikkanta^eb^nti abhikantaṃ atīṭṭhaṃ atimanāpaṃ, atisundaranti attho. ettha ekena abhikkantasaddena desanaṃ thometi ``abhikkantaṃ, bhante, yadidaṃ bhagavato dhammadesanā''ti. ekena attano ^a^M1.0125^ea^ pasādaṃ ``abhikkantaṃ, bhante, yadidaṃ bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ āgamma mama pasādo''ti.

[03] tato paraṃ catūhi upamāhi desanaṃyeva thometi. tattha ^b^nikkujjita^eb^nti adhomukhaṭhapitaṃ, heṭṭhāmukhajātaṃ vā. ^b^ukkujjeyyā^eb^ti uparimukhaṃ kareyya. ^b^paṭicchanna^eb^nti tiṇapaṇṇādichāditaṃ. ^b^vivareyyā^eb^ti ugghāṭeyya. ^b^mūḷhassā^eb^ti disāmūḷhassa. ^b^maggaṃ ācikkheyyā^eb^ti ^a^P1.0136^ea^ hatthe gahetvā ``esa maggo''ti vadeyya. ^b^andhakāre^eb^ti kāḷapakkhacātuddasī aḍḍharattaghanavanasaṇḍa meghapaṭalehi caturaṅge tame. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- yathā koci nikkujjitaṃ ukkujjeyya, evaṃ saddhammavimukhaṃ asaddhamme patitaṃ maṃ asaddhammā vuṭṭhāpentena, yathā paṭicchannaṃ vivareyya, evaṃ kassapassa bhagavato sāsanantaradhānā pabhuti micchādiṭṭhigahanapaṭicchannaṃ sāsanaṃ vivarantena, yathā mūḷhassa maggaṃ ācikkheyya, evaṃ kummaggamicchāmaggapaṭipannassa me saggamokkhamaggaṃ āvikarontena, yathā andhakāre telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya, evaṃ mohandhakāre nimuggassa me buddhādiratanarūpāni apassato tappaṭicchādakamohandhakāraviddhaṃsakadesanāpajjotaṃ dhārentena mayhaṃ bhagavatā etehi pariyāyehi pakāsitattā anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsitoti.

[03] evaṃ desanaṃ thometvā imāya desanāya ratanattaye pasannacitto pasannākāraṃ karonto ^b^esāha^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^esāha^eb^nti eso ahaṃ. ^b^bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañcā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0121^ea^ bhagavantañca dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañcāti imaṃ ratanattayaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi. ^b^upāsakaṃ maṃ, bhante, bhagavā dhāretū^eb^ti maṃ bhagavā `upāsako aya'nti evaṃ dhāretu, jānātūti attho. ^b^ajjatagge^eb^ti ajjataṃ ādiṃ katvā. ajjadaggeti vā pāṭho, da-kāro padasandhikaro, ajja aggaṃ katvāti attho. ^b^pāṇupeta^eb^nti pāṇehi upetaṃ yāva me jīvitaṃ pavattati, tāva upetaṃ anaññasatthukaṃ tīhi saraṇagamanehi saraṇaṃ gataṃ upāsakaṃ kappiyakārakaṃ maṃ bhagavā dhāretūti ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana sumaṅgalavilāsiniyā dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāya sāmaññaphalasutte sabbākārena vuttoti. paṭhamaṃ.

[03] 113^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^a^M1.0126^ea^ ^a^P1.0137^ea^ ^b^abhivādetvā^eb^ti purimasutte saraṇagatattā idha abhivādesi. ^b^ajjhatta^eb^nti niyakajjhattaṃ, attano santāne uppajjantīti attho. ^b^lobhā^eb^dīsu lubbhanalakkhaṇo lobho, dussanalakkhaṇo doso, muyhanalakkhaṇo mohoti. ^b^hiṃsantī^eb^ti viheṭhenti nāsenti vināsenti. ^b^attasambhūtā^eb^ti attani sambhūtā. ^b^tacasāraṃva samphala^eb^nti yathā tacasāraṃ veḷuṃ vā naḷaṃ vā attano phalaṃ hiṃsati vināseti, evaṃ hiṃsanti vināsentīti. dutiyaṃ.

[03] 114^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^aññatra jarāmaraṇā^eb^ti jarāmaraṇato mutto nāma atthīti vuccati. ^b^khattiyamahāsālā^eb^ti khattiyamahāsālā nāma mahāsārappattā khattiyā. yesaṃ hi khattiyānaṃ heṭṭhimantena koṭisataṃ nidhānagataṃ hoti, tayo kahāpaṇakumbhā valañjanatthāya gehamajjhe rāsiṃ katvā ṭhapitā honti, te ^b^khattiyamahāsālā^eb^ nāma. yesaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ asītikoṭidhanaṃ nihitaṃ hoti, diyaḍḍho kahāpaṇakumbho valañjanatthāya gehamajjhe rāsiṃ katvā ṭhapito hoti, te ^b^brāhmaṇamahāsālā^eb^ nāma. yesaṃ gahapatīnaṃ cattālīsakoṭidhanaṃ nihitaṃ hoti, kahāpaṇakumbho valañjanatthāya gehamajjhe rāsiṃ katvā ṭhapito hoti, te ^b^gahapatimahāsālā^eb^ nāma.

[03] ^b^aḍḍhā^eb^ti issarā. nidhānagatadhanassa mahantatāya ^b^mahaddhanā^eb^. suvaṇṇarajatabhājanādīnaṃ upabhogabhaṇḍānaṃ mahantatāya ^b^mahābhogā^eb^. anidhānagatassa jātarūparajatassa pahūtatāya, ^b^pahūtajātarūparajatā^eb^ ^a^V1.0122^ea^. vittūpakaraṇassa tuṭṭhikaraṇassa pahūtatāya ^b^pahūtavittūpakaraṇā^eb^. godhanādīnañca sattavidhadhaññānañca pahūtatāya ^b^pahūtadhanadhaññā. tesampi jātānaṃ natthi aññatra jarāmaraṇā^eb^ti tesampi evaṃ issarānaṃ jātānaṃ nibbattānaṃ natthi aññatra jarāmaraṇā, jātattāyeva jarāmaraṇato mokkho nāma natthi, antojarāmaraṇeyeva hoti.

[03] ^b^arahanto^eb^tiādīsu ^a^M1.0127^ea^ ^a^P1.0138^ea^ ārakā kilesehīti arahanto. khīṇā etesaṃ cattāro āsavāti ^b^khīṇāsavā^eb^. brahmacariyavāsaṃ vuṭṭhā pariniṭṭhitavāsāti ^b^vusitavanto^eb^. catūhi maggehi karaṇīyaṃ etesaṃ katanti ^b^katakaraṇīyā^eb^. khandhabhāro kilesabhāro abhisaṅkhārabhāro kāmaguṇabhāroti, ime ohitā bhārā etesanti ^b^ohitabhārā^eb^. anuppatto arahattasaṅkhāto sako attho etesanti ^b^anuppattasadatthā^eb^. dasavidhampi parikkhīṇaṃ bhavasaṃyojanaṃ etesanti ^b^parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojanā^eb^. sammā kāraṇehi jānitvā vimuttāti ^b^sammadaññāvimuttā^eb^. maggapaññāya catusaccadhammaṃ ñatvā phalavimuttiyā vimuttāti attho. ^b^bhedanadhammo^eb^ti bhijjanasabhāvo. ^b^nikkhepanadhammo^eb^ti nikkhipitabbasabhāvo. khīṇāsavassa hi ajīraṇadhammopi atthi, ārammaṇato paṭividdhaṃ nibbānaṃ, taṃ hi na jīrati. idha panassa jīraṇadhammaṃ dassento evamāha. atthuppattiko kirassa suttassa nikkhepo. sivikasālāya nisīditvā kathitanti vadanti. tattha bhagavā citrāni rathayānādīni disvā diṭṭhameva upamaṃ katvā, ``jīranti ve rājarathā''ti gāthamāha.

[03] tattha ^b^jīrantī^eb^ti jaraṃ pāpuṇanti. ^b^rājarathā^eb^ti rañño abhirūhanarathā. ^b^sucittā^eb^ti suvaṇṇarajatādīhi suṭṭhu cittitā. ^b^atho sarīrampi jaraṃ upetī^eb^ti evarūpesu anupādiṇṇakesu sāradārumayesu rathesu jīrantesu imasmiṃ ajjhattike upādiṇṇake maṃsalohitādimaye sarīre kiṃ vattabbaṃ? sarīrampi jaraṃ upetiyevāti attho. ^b^santo have sabbhi pavedayantī^eb^ti santo sabbhīhi saddhiṃ sataṃ dhammo na jaraṃ upetīti evaṃ pavedayanti. ``sataṃ dhammo nāma nibbānaṃ, taṃ na jīrati, ajaraṃ amatanti evaṃ kathentī''ti attho. yasmā vā nibbānaṃ āgamma sīdanasabhāvā kilesā bhijjanti, tasmā taṃ sabbhīti vuccati. iti purimapadassa kāraṇaṃ dassento ``santo have sabbhi pavedayantī''ti āha. idaṃ hi vuttaṃ hoti -- sataṃ dhammo na jaraṃ upeti, tasmā santo sabbhi pavedayanti. ajaraṃ nibbānaṃ sataṃ dhammoti ^a^P1.0139^ea^ ācikkhantīti attho. sundarādhivacanaṃ vā etaṃ sabbhīti. yaṃ sabbhidhammabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ santo pavedayanti kathayanti, so sataṃ dhammo na jaraṃ upetītipi attho. tatiyaṃ.

[03] 115^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^a^V1.0123^ea^ ^a^M1.0128^ea^ ^b^rahogatassā^eb^ti rahasi gatassa. ^b^paṭisallīnassā^eb^ti nilīnassa ekībhūtassa. ^b^evametaṃ, mahārājā^eb^ti idha bhagavā imaṃ suttaṃ sabbaññubhāsitaṃ karonto āha. ^b^antakenādhipannassā^eb^ti maraṇena ajjhotthaṭassa. catutthaṃ.

[03] 116^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^hatthikāyo^eb^ti hatthighaṭā. sesesupi eseva nayo. ^b^saṃvaro^eb^ti pidahanaṃ. ^b^sādhu sabbattha saṃvaro^eb^ti iminā kammapathabhedaṃ apattassa kammassa saṃvaraṃ dasseti. ^b^lajjī^eb^ti hirimā. lajjīgahaṇena cettha ottappampi gahitameva hoti. pañcamaṃ.

[03] 117^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^uḷāre uḷāre^eb^ti paṇīte ca bahuke ca. ^b^majjantī^eb^ti mānamajjanena majjanti. ^b^atisāra^eb^nti atikkamaṃ. ^b^kūṭa^eb^nti pāsaṃ. ^b^pacchāsa^eb^nti pacchā tesaṃ. chaṭṭhaṃ.

[03] 118^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^kāmahetū^eb^ti kāmamūlakaṃ. ^b^kāmanidāna^eb^nti kāmapaccayā. ^b^kāmādhikaraṇa^eb^nti kāmakāraṇā. sabbāni hetāni aññamaññavevacanāneva. ^b^bhadramukho^eb^ti sundaramukho. ekadivasaṃ kira rājā aḍḍakaraṇe nisīdi. tattha paṭhamataraṃ lañjaṃ gahetvā nisinnā amaccā assāmikepi sāmike kariṃsu. rājā taṃ ñatvā -- ``mayhaṃ tāva pathavissarassa sammukhāpete evaṃ karonti, parammukhā kiṃ nāma na karissanti? paññāyissati dāni viṭaṭūbho senāpati sakena ^a^P1.0140^ea^ rajjena, kiṃ mayhaṃ evarūpehi lañjakhādakehi musāvādīhi saddhiṃ ekaṭṭhāne nisajjāyā''ti cintesi. tasmā evamāha. ^b^khippaṃva oḍḍita^eb^nti kuminaṃ viya oḍḍitaṃ. yathā macchā oḍḍitaṃ kuminaṃ pavisantā na jānanti, evaṃ sattā kilesakāmena vatthukāmaṃ vītikkamantā na jānantīti attho. sattamaṃ.

[03] 119^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^a^V1.0124^ea^ ^a^M1.0129^ea^ ^b^atthi nu kho te mallike^eb^ti kasmā pucchati? ayaṃ kira mallikā duggatamālākārassa dhītā, ekadivasaṃ āpaṇato pūvaṃ gahetvā ``mālārāmaṃ gantvāva khādissāmī''ti gacchantī paṭipathe bhikkhusaṅghaparivāraṃ bhagavantaṃ bhikkhācāraṃ pavisantaṃ disvā pasannacittā taṃ bhagavato adāsi. satthā nisīdanākāraṃ dassesi. ānandatthero cīvaraṃ paññāpetvā adāsi. bhagavā tattha nisīditvā taṃ pūvaṃ paribhuñjitvā mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā sitaṃ pātvākāsi. thero ``imissā, bhante, ko vipāko bhavissatī''ti pucchi. ānanda, ajjesā tathāgatassa paṭhamabhojanaṃ adāsi, ajjeva kosalarañño aggamahesī bhavissatīti. taṃdivasameva ca rājā kāsigāme bhāgineyyena yuddhena parājito palāyitvā nagaraṃ āgacchanto mālārāmaṃ pavisitvā balakāyassa āgamanaṃ āgamesi. tassa sā vattaṃ akāsi. so tāya vatte pasīditvā taṃ antepūraṃ atihārāpetvā taṃ aggamahesiṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.

[01] athekadivasaṃ cintesi -- ``mayā imissā duggatakulassa dhītuyā mahantaṃ issariyaṃ dinnaṃ, yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ puccheyyaṃ `ko te piyo'ti? sā `tvaṃ me, mahārāja, piyo'ti vatvā puna maṃ pucchissati. athassāhaṃ `mayhampi tvaṃyeva piyā'ti vakkhāmī''ti. iti so aññamaññaṃ vissāsajananatthaṃ sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ kathento pucchati. sā pana devī paṇḍitā buddhupaṭṭhāyikā dhammupaṭṭhāyikā saṅghupaṭṭhāyikā mahāpaññā ^a^P1.0141^ea^, tasmā evaṃ cintesi -- ``nāyaṃ pañho rañño mukhaṃ oloketvā kathetabbo''ti. sā saraseneva kathetvā rājānaṃ pucchi. rājā tāya sarasena kathitattā nivattituṃ alabhanto sayampi saraseneva kathetvā ``sakāraṇaṃ idaṃ, tathāgatassa naṃ ārocessāmī''ti gantvā bhagavato ārocesi. ^b^nevajjhagā^eb^ti nādhigacchati. ^b^evaṃ piyo puthu attā paresa^eb^nti yathā ekassa attā piyo, evaṃ paresaṃ puthusattānampi attā piyoti attho. aṭṭhamaṃ.

[03] 120^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^M1.0130^ea^ ^b^thūṇūpanītānī^eb^ti thūṇaṃ upanītāni, thūṇāya baddhāni honti. ^b^parikammāni karontī^eb^ti ettāvatā tehi bhikkhūhi rañño āraddhayañño tathāgatassa ārocito. kasmā pana raññā ayaṃ yañño āraddho? dussupinapaṭighātāya. ekadivasaṃ kira rājā sabbālaṅkārappaṭimaṇḍito ^a^V1.0125^ea^ hatthikkhandhavaragato nagaraṃ anusañcaranto vātapānaṃ vivaritvā olokayamānaṃ ekaṃ itthiṃ disvā tassā paṭibaddhacitto tatova paṭinivattitvā antepuraṃ pavisitvā ekassa purisassa tamatthaṃ ārocetvā ``gaccha tassā sassāmikabhāvaṃ vā assāmikabhāvaṃ vā jānāhī''ti pesesi. so gantvā pucchi. sā ``eso me sāmiko āpaṇe nisinno''ti dassesi. rājapuriso rañño tamatthaṃ ācikkhi. rājā taṃ purisaṃ pakkosāpetvā ``maṃ upaṭṭhahā''ti āha. ``nāhaṃ, deva, upaṭṭhahituṃ jānāmī''ti ca vutte ``upaṭṭhānaṃ nāma na ācariyassa santike uggahetabba''nti balakkārena āvudhaphalakaṃ gāhāpetvā upaṭṭhākaṃ akāsi. upaṭṭhahitvā gehaṃ gatamattameva ca naṃ puna pakkosāpetvā ``upaṭṭhākena nāma rañño vacanaṃ kattabbaṃ, gaccha ito yojanamatte amhākaṃ sīsadhovanapokkharaṇī atthi, tato aruṇamattikañca lohituppalamālañca gaṇhitvā ehi. sace ajjeva nāgacchasi, rājadaṇḍaṃ karissāmī''ti vatvā pesesi. so rājabhayena nikkhamitvā ^a^P1.0142^ea^ gato.

[03] rājāpi tasmiṃ gate dovārikaṃ pakkosāpetvā, ``ajja sāyanheyeva dvāraṃ pidahitvā `ahaṃ rājadūto'ti vā `uparājadūto'ti vā bhaṇantānampi mā vivarī''ti āha. so puriso mattikañca uppalāni ca gahetvā dvāre pihitamatte āgantvā bahuṃ vadantopi dvāraṃ alabhitvā parissayabhayena jetavanaṃ gato. rājāpi rāgapariḷāhena abhibhūto kāle nisīdati, kāle tiṭṭhati, kāle nipajjati, sanniṭṭhānaṃ alabhanto yattha katthaci nisinnakova makkaṭaniddāya niddāyati.

[03] pubbe ^a^M1.0131^ea^ ca tasmiṃyeva nagare cattāro seṭṭhiputtā paradārikakammaṃ katvā nandopanandāya nāma lohakumbhiyā nibbattiṃsu. te pheṇuddehakaṃ paccamānā tiṃsavassasahassāni heṭṭhā gacchantā kumbhiyā talaṃ pāpuṇanti, tiṃsavassasahassāni upari gacchantā matthakaṃ pāpuṇanti. te taṃ divasaṃ ālokaṃ oloketvā attano dukkaṭabhayena ekekaṃ gāthaṃ vattukāmā vattuṃ asakkontā ekekaṃ akkharameva āhaṃsu. eko sa-kāraṃ, eko so-kāraṃ, eko na-kāraṃ, eko du-kāraṃ āha. rājā tesaṃ nerayikasattānaṃ saddaṃ sutakālato paṭṭhāya sukhaṃ avindamānova taṃrattāvasesaṃ vītināmesi.

[03] aruṇe uṭṭhite purohito āgantvā taṃ sukhaseyyaṃ pucchi. so ``kuto me, ācariya, sukha''nti ^a^V1.0126^ea^? vatvā, ``supine evarūpe sadde assosi''nti ācikkhi. brāhmaṇo -- ``imassa rañño iminā supinena vuḍḍhi vā hāni vā natthi, apica kho pana yaṃ imassa gehe atthi, taṃ samaṇassa gotamassa hoti, gotamasāvakānaṃ hoti, brāhmaṇā kiñci na labhanti, brāhmaṇānaṃ bhikkhaṃ uppādessāmī''ti, ``bhāriyo ayaṃ, mahārāja, supino tīsu jānīsu ekā paññāyati, rajjantarāyo vā bhavissati jīvitantarāyo vā, devo vā na vassissatī''ti āha. kathaṃ sotthi bhaveyya ācariyāti? ``mantetvā ñātuṃ sakkā, mahārājāti. gacchatha ācariyehi saddhiṃ mantetvā amhākaṃ sotthiṃ karothā''ti.

[01] so sivikasālāyaṃ brāhmaṇe sannipātetvā tamatthaṃ ārocetvā, ``visuṃ visuṃ gantvā evaṃ vadathā''ti tayo vagge akāsi ^a^P1.0143^ea^. brāhmaṇā pavisitvā rājānaṃ sukhaseyyaṃ pucchiṃsu. rājā purohitassa kathitaniyāmeneva kathetvā ``kathaṃ sotthi bhaveyyā''ti pucchi. mahābrāhmaṇā -- ``sabbapañcasataṃ yaññaṃ yajitvā etassa kammassa sotthi bhaveyya, evaṃ, mahārāja, ācariyā kathentī''ti āhaṃsu. rājā tesaṃ sutvā anabhinanditvā appaṭikkositvā tuṇhī ahosi. atha dutiyavaggabrāhmaṇāpi āgantvā tattheva kathesuṃ. tathā tatiyavaggabrāhmaṇāpi. atha rājā ``yaññaṃ karontū''ti āṇāpesi. tato paṭṭhāya brāhmaṇā usabhādayo pāṇe āharāpesuṃ. nagare mahāsaddo udapādi ^a^M1.0132^ea^. taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā mallikā rājānaṃ tathāgatassa santikaṃ pesesi. so gantvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. atha naṃ bhagavā -- ``handa kuto nu tvaṃ, mahārāja, āgacchasi divādivassā''ti āha. rājā -- ``ajja me, bhante, supinake cattāro saddā sutā, sohaṃ brāhmaṇe pucchiṃ. brāhmaṇā `bhāriyo, mahārāja, supino, sabbapañcasataṃ yaññaṃ yajitvā paṭikammaṃ karomāti āraddhā'''ti āha. kinti te, mahārāja, saddā sutāti. so yathāsutaṃ ārocesi. atha naṃ bhagavā āha -- pubbe, mahārāja, imasmiṃyeva nagare cattāro seṭṭhiputtā paradārikā hutvā nandopanandāya lohakumbhiyā nibbattā saṭṭhivassasahassamatthake uggacchiṃsu.
[03] tattha eko --
[21] ``saṭṭhivassasahassāni, paripuṇṇāni sabbaso.
[22] niraye paccamānānaṃ, kadā anto bhavissatī''ti..(pe0 va0 802; jā0 1.4.54) --
[25] imaṃ ^a^V1.0127^ea^ gāthaṃ vatthukāmo ahosi. dutiyo --
[21] ``sohaṃ nūna ito gantvā, yoniṃ laddhāna mānusiṃ.
[22] vadaññū sīlasampanno, kāhāmi kusalaṃ bahu''nti.. (pe0 va0 805; jā0 1.4.56) --
[25] imaṃ gāthaṃ vatthukāmo ahosi. tatiyo --
[21] ``natthi anto kuto anto, na anto paṭidissati.
[22] tadā hi pakataṃ pāpaṃ, mama tuyhañca mārisā''ti.. (pe0 va0 803; jā0 1.4.55) --
[25] imaṃ gāthaṃ vatthukāmo ahosi. catuttho --
[21] ``dujjīvitamajīvimhā, ye sante na dadamhase.
[22] vijjamānesu bhogesu, dīpaṃ nākamha attano''ti.. (pe0 va0 804; jā0 1.4.53) --

[25] imaṃ ^a^P1.0144^ea^. te imā gāthā vattuṃ asakkontā ekekaṃ akkharaṃ vatvā tattheva nimuggā. iti, mahārāja, te nerayikasattā yathākammena viraviṃsu. tassa saddassa sutapaccayā tuyhaṃ hāni vā vuḍḍhi vā natthi. ettakānaṃ pana pasūnaṃ ghātanakammaṃ nāma bhāriyanti nirayabhayena tajjetvā dhammakathaṃ ^a^M1.0133^ea^ kathesi. rājā dasabale pasīditvā, ``muñcāmi, nesaṃ jīvitaṃ dadāmi, haritāni ceva tiṇāni khādantu, sītalāni ca pānīyāni pivantu, sīto ca nesaṃ vāto upavāyatū''ti vatvā, ``gacchatha hārethā''ti manusse āṇāpesi. te gantvā brāhmaṇe palāpetvā taṃ pāṇasaṅghaṃ bandhanato mocetvā nagare dhammabheriṃ carāpesuṃ.

[03] atha rājā dasabalassa santike nisinno āha -- ``bhante, ekaratti nāma tiyāmā hoti, mayhaṃ pana ajja dve rattiyo ekato ghaṭitā viya ahesu''nti. sopi puriso tattheva nisinno ^a^V1.0128^ea^ āha -- ``bhante, yojanaṃ nāma catugāvutaṃ hoti, mayhaṃ pana ajja dve yojanāni ekato katāni viya ahesu''nti. atha bhagavā -- ``jāgarassa tāva rattiyā dīghabhāvo pākaṭo, santassa yojanassa dīghabhāvo pākaṭo, vaṭṭapatitassa pana bālaputhujjanassa anamataggasaṃsāravaṭṭaṃ ekantadīghamevā''ti rājānañca tañca purisaṃ nerayikasatte ca ārabbha dhammapade imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi --
[21] ``dīghā jāgarato ratti, dīghaṃ santassa yojanaṃ.
[22] dīgho bālānaṃ saṃsāro, saddhammaṃ avijānata''nti.. (dha0 pa0 60).
[03] gāthāpariyosāne so itthisāmiko puriso sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. ^b^etamatthaṃ viditvā^eb^ti etaṃ kāraṇaṃ jānitvā.
