[03] ^b^assamedha^eb^ntiādīsu -- porāṇarājakāle kira sassamedhaṃ purisamedhaṃ sammāpāsaṃ vācāpeyyanti cattāri saṅgahavatthūni ahesuṃ, yehi rājāno lokaṃ saṅgaṇhiṃsu. tattha nipphannasassato ^a^P1.0145^ea^ dasamabhāgaggahaṇaṃ ^b^sassamedhaṃ^eb^ nāma, sassasampādane medhāvitāti attho. mahāyodhānaṃ chamāsikaṃ bhatta-vetanānuppadānaṃ ^b^purisamedhaṃ^eb^ nāma, purisasaṅgaṇhane medhāvitāti attho. daliddamanussānaṃ hatthato lekhaṃ gahetvā tīṇi vassāni vināva vaḍḍhiyā sahassadvisahassamattadhanānuppadānaṃ ^b^sammāpāsaṃ^eb^ nāma. tañhi sammā manusse pāseti, hadaye bandhitvā viya ṭhapeti, tasmā sammāpāsanti vuccati. ``tāta mātulā''tiādinā nayena saṇhavācābhaṇanaṃ vācāpeyyaṃ nāma, piyavācāti attho. evaṃ catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi saṅgahitaṃ raṭṭhaṃ iddhañceva ^a^M1.0134^ea^ hoti phītañca pahūtānnapānaṃ khemaṃ nirabbudaṃ. manussā mudā modamānā ure putte naccentā apārutagharadvārā viharanti. idaṃ gharadvāresu aggaḷānaṃ abhāvato ^b^niraggaḷa^eb^nti vuccati. ayaṃ porāṇikā paveṇī.

[03] aparabhāge pana okkākarājakāle brāhmaṇā imāni cattāri saṅgahavatthūni imañca raṭṭhasampattiṃ parivattetvā uddhaṃmūlakaṃ katvā assamedhaṃ purisamedhanti ādike pañca yaññe nāma akaṃsu. tesu assamettha medhanti vadhantīti ^b^assamedho^eb^. dvīhi pariyaññehi yajitabbassa ekavīsatiyūpassa ekasmiṃ majjhimadivaseyeva sattanavutipañcapasusataghātabhiṃsanassa ṭhapetvā bhūmiñca ^a^V1.0129^ea^ purise ca avasesasabbavibhavadakkhiṇassa yaññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. purisamettha medhantīti ^b^purisamedho^eb^. catūhi pariyaññehi yajitabbassa saddhiṃ bhūmiyā assamedhe vuttavibhavadakkhiṇassa yaññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. sammamettha pāsentīti ^b^sammāpāso^eb^. divase divase sammaṃ khipitvā tassa ^a^P1.0146^ea^ patitokāse vediṃ katvā saṃhārimehi yūpādīhi sarassatinadiyā nimuggokāsato pabhuti paṭilomaṃ gacchantena yajitabbassa satrayāgassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. vājamettha pivantīti ^b^vājapeyyo^eb^. ekena pariyaññena sattarasahi pasūhi yajitabbassa beluvayūpassa sattarasakadakkhiṇassa yaññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. natthi ettha aggaḷāti ^b^niraggaḷo^eb^. navahi pariyaññehi yajitabbassa saddhiṃ bhūmiyā ca purisehi ca assamedhe vuttavibhavadakkhiṇassa sabbamedhapariyāyanāmassa assamedhavikappassevetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ^b^mahārambhā^eb^ti mahākiccā mahākaraṇīyā. ^b^sammaggatā^eb^ti sammā paṭipannā buddhādayo. ^b^nirārambhā^eb^ti appatthā appakiccā. ^b^yajanti anukula^eb^nti anukulesu yajanti, yaṃ niccabhattādi pubbapurisehi paṭṭhapitaṃ, taṃ aparāparaṃ anupacchinnattā manussā dadantīti attho. navamaṃ.

[03] 121^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^idha, bhante, raññā^eb^ti idaṃ te bhikkhū tesu manussesu ānandattherassa sukatakāraṇaṃ ārocentā ārocesuṃ. rañño kira sakkena kusarājassa dinno aṭṭhavaṅko maṇi paveṇiyā āgato. rājā alaṅkaraṇakāle taṃ maṇiṃ āharathāti āha. manussā ``ṭhapitaṭṭhāne ^a^M1.0135^ea^ na passāmā''ti ārocesuṃ. rājā antogharacārino ``maṇiṃ pariyesitvā dethā''ti bandhāpesi. ānandatthero te disvā maṇipaṭisāmakānaṃ ekaṃ upāyaṃ ācikkhi ^a^P1.0147^ea^. te rañño ārocesuṃ. rājā ``paṇḍito thero, therassa vacanaṃ karothā''ti. paṭisāmakamanussā rājaṅgaṇe udakacāṭiṃ ṭhapetvā sāṇiyā parikkhipāpetvā te manusse āhaṃsu -- ``sāṭakaṃ pārupitvā ettha gantvā hatthaṃ otārethā''ti. maṇicoro cintesi -- ``rājabhaṇḍaṃ vissajjetuṃ vā valañjetuṃ vā na sakkā''ti. so gehaṃ gantvā maṇiṃ upakacchake ṭhapetvā sāṭakaṃ pārupitvā āgamma udakacāṭiyaṃ pakkhipitvā pakkāmi. mahājane paṭikkante rājamanussā cāṭiyaṃ hatthaṃ otāretvā maṇiṃ disvā āharitvā rañño adaṃsu. ``ānandattherena kira dassitanayena maṇi diṭṭho''ti mahājano kolāhalaṃ akāsi. te bhikkhū taṃ kāraṇaṃ tathāgatassa ārocentā imaṃ pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ. satthā -- ``anacchariyaṃ, bhikkhave, yaṃ ānando manussānaṃ hatthāruḷhamaṇiṃ āharāpeyya ^a^V1.0130^ea^, yattha pubbe paṇḍitā attano ñāṇe ṭhatvā ahetukapaṭisandhiyaṃ nibbattānaṃ tiracchānagatānampi hatthāruḷhaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ āharāpetvā rañño adaṃsū''ti vatvā --
[21] ``ukkaṭṭhe sūramicchanti, mantīsu akutūhalaṃ.
[22] piyañca annapānamhi, atthe jāte ca paṇḍita''nti.. (jā0 1.1.92) --
[25] mahāsārajātakaṃ kathesi.

[03] ^b^na taṃ daḷha^eb^nti taṃ bandhanaṃ thiranti na kathenti. ^b^yadāyasa^eb^nti yaṃ āyasā kataṃ. ^b^sārattarattā^eb^ti suṭṭhu rattarattā, sārattena vā rattā sārattarattā, sāraṃ idanti maññanāya rattāti attho. ^b^apekkhā^eb^ti ālayo nikanti. ^b^āhū^eb^ti kathenti. ^b^ohārina^eb^nti catūsu apāyesu ākaḍḍhanakaṃ. ^b^sithila^eb^nti na āyasādibandhanaṃ viya iriyāpathaṃ nivāretvā ṭhitaṃ. tena hi bandhanena baddhā paradesampi gacchantiyeva. ^b^duppamuñca^eb^nti aññatra lokuttarañāṇena muñcituṃ asakkuṇeyyanti. dasamaṃ.
[06] paṭhamo vaggo.

[03] 122^b^.^eb^ dutiyavaggassa ^a^M1.0136^ea^ paṭhame ^a^P1.0148^ea^ ^b^pubbārāme migāramātupāsāde^eb^ti pubbārāmasaṅkhāte vihāre migāramātuyā pāsāde. tatrāyaṃ anupubbikathā -- atīte satasahassakappamatthake ekā upāsikā padumuttaraṃ bhagavantaṃ nimantetvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa satasahassadānaṃ datvā bhagavato pādamūle nipajjitvā -- ``anāgate tumhādisassa buddhassa aggupaṭṭhāyikā homī''ti patthanaṃ akāsi. sā kappasatasahassaṃ devesu ca manussesu ca saṃsaritvā amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle bhaddiyanagare meṇḍakaputtassa dhanañcayaseṭṭhino gehe sumanadeviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi ^a^V1.0131^ea^. jātakāle cassā visākhāti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. sā yadā bhagavā bhaddiyanagaraṃ agamāsi, tadā pañcahi dārikāsatehi saddhiṃ bhagavato paccuggamanaṃ gatā paṭhamadassanamhiyeva sotāpannā ahosi. aparabhāge sāvatthiyaṃ migāraseṭṭhiputtassa puṇṇavaḍḍhanakumārassa gehaṃ gatā. tattha naṃ migāraseṭṭhi mātiṭṭhāne ṭhapesi, tasmā migāramātāti vuccati. tāya kārite pāsāde.

[03] ^b^bahi dvārakoṭṭhake^eb^ti pāsādadvārakoṭṭhakassa bahi, na vihāradvārakoṭṭhakassa. so kira pāsādo lohapāsādo viya samantā catudvārakoṭṭhakayuttena pākārena parikkhitto. tesu pācīnadvārakoṭṭhakassa bahi pāsādacchāyāyaṃ pācīnalokadhātuṃ olokento paññatte varabuddhāsane nisinno hoti.

[01] ^b^parūḷhakacchanakhalomā^eb^ti parūḷhakacchā parūḷhanakhā parūḷhalomā, kacchādīsu dīghalomā dīghanakhā cāti attho. ^b^khārivividha^eb^nti vividhakhāriṃ nānappakārakaṃ pabbajitaparikkhārabhaṇḍakaṃ. ^b^avidūre atikkamantī^eb^ti avidūramaggena nagaraṃ pavisanti. ^b^rājāhaṃ^eb^ ^a^P1.0149^ea^, ^b^bhante^eb^ti ahaṃ, bhante, rājā pasenadi kosalo, mayhaṃ nāmaṃ tumhe jānāthāti. kasmā pana rājā loke aggapuggalassa santike nisinno evarūpānaṃ naggabhogganissirikānaṃ añjaliṃ paggaṇhātīti. saṅgaṇhanatthāya. evaṃ hissa ahosi -- ``sacāhaṃ ettakampi etesaṃ na karissāmi ^a^M1.0137^ea^, `mayaṃ puttadāraṃ pahāya etassatthāya dubbhojanadukkhaseyyādīni anubhoma, ayaṃ amhākaṃ añjalimattampi na karotī'ti attanā diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ paṭicchādetvā na katheyyuṃ. evaṃ kate pana anigūhitvā kathessantī''ti. tasmā evamakāsi. apica satthu ajjhāsayajānanatthaṃ evamakāsi.
[03] ^b^kāsikacandana^eb^nti saṇhacandanaṃ. ^b^mālāgandhavilepana^eb^nti vaṇṇagandhatthāya mālaṃ, sugandhabhāvatthāya gandhaṃ, vaṇṇagandhatthāya vilepanañca dhārentena.

[03] ^b^saṃvāsenā^eb^ti sahavāsena. ^b^sīlaṃ veditabba^eb^nti ayaṃ susīlo vā dussīlo vāti saṃvasantena upasaṅkamantena jānitabbo. ^b^tañca kho dīghena addhunā na ittara^eb^nti tañca sīlaṃ dīghena kālena veditabbaṃ, na ittarena. dvīhatīhañhi saṃyatākāro ca saṃvutindriyākāro ca na sakkā dassetuṃ. ^b^manasikarotā^eb^ti sīlamassa pariggahessāmīti manasikarontena paccavekkhanteneva sakkā ^a^V1.0132^ea^ jānituṃ, na itarena. ^b^paññavatā^eb^ti tampi sappaññeneva paṇḍitena. bālo hi manasikarontopi jānituṃ na sakkoti.
[03] ^b^saṃvohārenā^eb^ti kathanena.
[21] ``yo hi koci manussesu, vohāraṃ upajīvati.
[22] evaṃ vāseṭṭha jānāhi, vāṇijo so na brāhmaṇo''ti.. (ma0 ni0 2.457) --

[25] ettha hi byavahāro vohāro nāma. ``cattāro ariyavohārā cattāro anariyavohārā''ti (dī0 ni0 3.313) ettha cetanā. ``saṅkhā samaññā paññatti vohāro''ti (dha0 sa0 1313-1315) ettha paññatti. ``vohāramattena so vohareyyā''ti (saṃ0 ni0 1.25) ettha kathā vohāro. idhāpi esova adhippeto. ekaccassa hi sammukhā kathā parammukhāya kathāya na sameti, parammukhā ^a^P1.0150^ea^ kathā ca sammukhāya kathāya, tathā purimakathā ca pacchimakathāya, pacchimakathā ca purimakathāya. so kathenteneva sakkā jānituṃ ``asuci eso puggalo''ti. sucisīlassa pana purimaṃ pacchimena, pacchimañca purimena sameti, sammukhākathitaṃ parammukhākathitena, parammukhākathitañca sammukhākathitena, tasmā kathentena sakkā sucibhāvo jānitunti pakāsento evamāha.

[03] ^b^thāmo^eb^ti ^a^M1.0138^ea^ ñāṇathāmo. yassa hi ñāṇathāmo natthi, so uppannesu upaddavesu gahetabbaggahaṇaṃ katabbakiccaṃ apassanto advāragharaṃ paviṭṭho viya carati. tenāha ^b^āpadāsu kho, mahārāja, thāmo veditabbo^eb^ti. ^b^sākacchāyā^eb^ti saṃkathāya. duppaññassa hi kathā udake geṇḍu viya uppalavati, paññavato kathentassa paṭibhānaṃ anantaraṃ hoti. udakavipphanditeneva hi maccho khuddako vā mahanto vāti ñāyati. ^b^ocarakā^eb^ti heṭṭhācarakā. ^b^carā^eb^ hi pabbatamatthakena carantāpi heṭṭhā -- carakāva honti. ^b^ocaritvā^eb^ti avacaritvā vīmaṃsitvā, taṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvāti attho. ^b^rajojalla^eb^nti rajañca jallañca. ^b^vaṇṇarūpenā^eb^ti vaṇṇasaṇṭhānena. ^b^ittaradassanenā^eb^ti lahukadassanena. ^b^viyañjanenā^eb^ti parikkhārabhaṇḍakena. ^b^patirūpako mattikākuṇḍalovā^eb^ti suvaṇṇakuṇḍalapatirūpako mattikākuṇḍalova. ^b^lohaḍḍhamāso^eb^ti lohaḍḍhamāsako. paṭhamaṃ.

[03] 123^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^a^V1.0133^ea^ ^b^rūpā^eb^ti nīlapītādibhedaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ. ^b^kāmānaṃ agga^eb^nti etaṃ kāmānaṃ uttamaṃ seṭṭhanti rūpagaruko āha. sesesupi eseva nayo. ^b^yato^eb^ti yadā. ^b^manāpapariyanta^eb^nti ^a^P1.0151^ea^ manāpanipphattikaṃ manāpakoṭikaṃ. tattha dve manāpāni puggalamanāpaṃ sammutimanāpañca. puggalamanāpaṃ nāma yaṃ ekassa puggalassa iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ hoti, tadeva aññassa aniṭṭhaṃ akantaṃ. paccantavāsīnañhi gaṇḍuppādāpi iṭṭhā honti kantā manāpā, majjhimadesavāsīnaṃ atijegucchā. tesañca moramaṃsādīni iṭṭhāni honti, itaresaṃ tāni atijegucchāni. idaṃ puggalamanāpaṃ. itaraṃ sammutimanāpaṃ.

[03] iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇaṃ nāma loke paṭivibhattaṃ natthi, vibhajitvā pana dassetabbaṃ. vibhajantena ca na atīssarānaṃ mahāsammatamahāsudassanadhammāsokādīnaṃ vasena vibhajitabbaṃ. tesañhi dippakappampi ārammaṇaṃ amanāpaṃ upaṭṭhāti. atiduggatānaṃ dullabhannapānānaṃ vasenapi na vibhajitabbaṃ. tesañhi kaṇājakabhattasitthānipi pūtimaṃsassa rasopi atimadhuro amatasadiso hoti. majjhimānaṃ pana gaṇakamahāmattaseṭṭhi kuṭumbikavāṇijādīnaṃ kālena ^a^M1.0139^ea^ iṭṭhaṃ kālena aniṭṭhaṃ labhamānānaṃ vasena vibhajitabbaṃ. tañca panetaṃ ārammaṇaṃ javanaṃ paricchindituṃ na sakkoti. javanañhi iṭṭhepi rajjati aniṭṭhepi, iṭṭhepi dussati aniṭṭhepi. ekantato pana vipākacittaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhaṃ paricchindati. kiñcāpi hi micchādiṭṭhikā buddhaṃ vā saṅghaṃ vā mahācetiyādīni vā uḷārāni ārammaṇāni disvā akkhīni pidahanti domanassaṃ āpajjanti, dhammasaddaṃ sutvā kaṇṇe thakenti, cakkhuviññāṇasotaviññāṇāni pana tesaṃ kusalavipākāneva honti. kiñcāpi gūthasūkarādayo gūthagandhaṃ ghāyitvā khādituṃ labhissāmāti somanassajātā honti, gūthadassane pana nesaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, tassa gandhaghāyane ghānaviññāṇaṃ, rasasāyane jivhāviññāṇañca akusalavipākameva hoti. bhagavā pana puggalamanāpataṃ sandhāya ^b^te ca, mahārāja, rūpā^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] ^b^candanaṅgaliko^eb^ti idaṃ tassa upāsakassa nāmaṃ. ^b^paṭibhāti maṃ bhagavā^eb^ti bhagavā mayhaṃ ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ upaṭṭhāti paññāyati. tassa te pañca rājāno āmuttamaṇikuṇḍale sajjitāya ^a^P1.0152^ea^ āpānabhūmiyā nisinnavaseneva mahatā rājānubhāvena paramena issariyavibhavena āgantvāpi dasabalassa ^a^V1.0134^ea^ santike ṭhitakālato paṭṭhāya divā padīpe viya udakābhisitte aṅgāre viya sūriyuṭṭhāne khajjopanake viya ca hatappabhe hatasobhe taṃ tathāgatañca tehi sataguṇena sahassaguṇena virocamānaṃ disvā, ``mahantā vata bho buddhā nāmā''ti paṭibhānaṃ udapādi. tasmā evamāha.

[03] ^b^kokanada^eb^nti padumassevetaṃ vevacanaṃ. ^b^pāto^eb^ti kālasseva. ^b^siyā^eb^ti bhaveyya. ^b^avītagandha^eb^nti avigatagandhaṃ. ^b^aṅgīrasa^eb^nti sammāsambuddhaṃ. bhagavato hi aṅgato rasmiyo nikkhamanti, tasmā aṅgīrasoti vuccati. yathā kokanadasaṅkhātaṃ padumaṃ pātova phullaṃ avītagandhaṃ siyā, evameva bhagavantaṃ aṅgīrasaṃ tapantaṃ ādiccamiva antalikkhe virocamānaṃ passāti ayamettha saṅkhepattho. ^b^bhagavantaṃ acchādesī^eb^ti bhagavato adāsīti attho. lokavohārato panettha īdisaṃ vacanaṃ hoti. so kira upāsako -- ``ete tathāgatassa guṇesu pasīditvā mayhaṃ pañca uttarāsaṅge ^a^M1.0140^ea^ denti, ahampi te bhagavatova dassāmī''ti cintetvā adāsi. dutiyaṃ.

[03] 124^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^doṇapākakura^eb^nti doṇapākaṃ kuraṃ, doṇassa taṇḍulānaṃ pakkabhattaṃ tadūpiyañca sūpabyañjanaṃ bhuñjatīti attho. ^b^bhuttāvī^eb^ti pubbe bhattasammadaṃ vinodetvā muhuttaṃ vissamitvā buddhupaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati, taṃdivasaṃ pana bhuñjantova dasabalaṃ saritvā hatthe dhovitvā agamāsi. ^b^mahassāsī^eb^ti tassa gacchato balavā bhattaparīḷāho udapādi, tasmā mahantehi assāsehi assasati, gattatopissa sedabindūni muccanti, tamenaṃ ubhosu passesu ṭhatvā yamakatālavaṇṭehi bījanti, buddhagāravena pana nipajjituṃ na ussahatīti idaṃ sandhāya ``mahassāsī''ti vuttaṃ. ^b^imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsī^eb^ti, rājā bhojane ^a^P1.0153^ea^ amattaññutāya kilamati, phāsu vihāraṃ dānissa karissāmīti cintetvā abhāsi. ^b^manujassā^eb^ti sattassa. ^b^kahāpaṇasata^eb^nti pātarāse paṇṇāsaṃ sāyamāse paṇṇāsanti evaṃ kahāpaṇasataṃ. ^b^pariyāpuṇitvā^eb^ti raññā saddhiṃ thokaṃ gantvā ``imaṃ maṅgalāsiṃ kassa dammi, mahārājā''ti? asukassa nāma dehīti so taṃ asiṃ datvā dasabalassa santikaṃ āgamma vanditvā ṭhitakova ``gāthaṃ vadatha, bho gotamā''ti vatvā bhagavatā vuttaṃ pariyāpuṇitvāti attho.

[03] ^b^bhattābhihāre^eb^ ^a^V1.0135^ea^ ^b^sudaṃ bhāsatī^eb^ti kathaṃ bhāsati? bhagavatā anusiṭṭhiniyāmena. bhagavā hi naṃ evaṃ anusāsi -- ``māṇava, imaṃ gāthaṃ naṭo viya pattapattaṭṭhāne mā avaca, rañño bhuñjanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā paṭhamapiṇḍādīsupi avatvā vosānapiṇḍe gahite vadeyyāsi, rājā sutvāva bhattapiṇḍaṃ chaḍḍessati. atha rañño hatthesu dhotesu pātiṃ apanetvā sitthāni gaṇetvā tadupiyaṃ byañjanaṃ ñatvā punadivase tāvatake taṇḍule hāreyyāsi, pātarāse ca vatvā sāyamāse mā vadeyyāsī''ti. so sādhūti paṭissuṇitvā taṃdivasaṃ rañño pātarāsaṃ bhutvā gatattā sāyamāse bhagavato anusiṭṭhiniyāmena gāthaṃ abhāsi ^a^M1.0141^ea^. rājā dasabalassa vacanaṃ saritvā bhattapiṇḍaṃ pātiyaṃyeva chaḍḍesi. rañño hatthesu dhotesu pātiṃ apanetvā sitthāni gaṇetvā tadupiyaṃ byañjanaṃ ñatvā punadivase tattake taṇḍule hariṃsu.

[03] ^b^nāḷikodanaparamatāya saṇṭhāsī^eb^ti so kira māṇavo divase divase tathāgatassa santikaṃ gacchati, dasabalassa vissāsiko ahosi. atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ pucchi ``rājā kittakaṃ bhuñjatī''ti? so ``nāḷikodana''nti āha. vaṭṭissati ettāvatā purisabhāgo esa, ito paṭṭhāya gāthaṃ mā vadīti. iti rājā tattheva saṇṭhāsi. ^b^diṭṭhadhammikena ceva atthena samparāyikena cā^eb^ti ettha sallikhitasarīratā diṭṭhadhammikattho nāma, sīlaṃ samparāyikattho. bhojane mattaññutā hi sīlaṅgaṃ nāma hotīti. tatiyaṃ.

[03] 125^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^a^P1.0154^ea^ ^b^vedehiputto^eb^ti ^b^vedehī^eb^ti paṇḍitādhivacanametaṃ, paṇḍititthiyā puttoti attho. ^b^caturaṅgini^eb^nti hatthiassarathapattisaṅkhātehi catūhi aṅgehi samannāgataṃ. ^b^sannayhitvā^eb^ti cammapaṭimuñcanādīhi sannāhaṃ kāretvā. ^b^saṅgāmesu^eb^nti yujjhiṃsu. kena kāraṇena? mahākosalaraññā kira bimbisārassa dhītaraṃ dentena dvinnaṃ rajjānaṃ antare satasahassuṭṭhāno kāsigāmo nāma dhītu dinno. ajātasattunā ca pitari mārite mātāpissa rañño viyogasokena nacirasseva matā. tato rājā pasenadi kosalo -- ``ajātasattunā mātāpitaro māritā, mayhaṃ pitu santako gāmo''ti tassatthāya aḍḍaṃ karoti. ajātasattupi ``mayhaṃ mātu santako''ti tassa gāmassatthāya dvepi mātulabhāgineyyā yujjhiṃsu.

[03] pāpā ^a^V1.0136^ea^ devadattādayo mittā assāti ^b^pāpamitto^eb^. teyevassa sahāyāti ^b^pāpasahāyo^eb^. tesvevassa cittaṃ ninnaṃ sampavaṅkanti ^b^pāpasampavaṅko^eb^. pasenadissa sāriputtattherādīnaṃ vasena kalyāṇamittāditā veditabbā. ^b^dukkhaṃ setī^eb^ti jitāni hatthiādīni anusocanto dukkhaṃ sayissati. idaṃ bhagavā puna tassa jayakāraṇaṃ disvā āha. ^b^jayaṃ veraṃ pasavatī^eb^ti jinanto veraṃ pasavati, veripuggalaṃ labhati. catutthaṃ.

[03] 126^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^a^M1.0142^ea^ ^b^abbhuyyāsī^eb^ti parājaye garahappatto ``ārāmaṃ gantvā bhikkhūnaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ suṇāthā''ti rattibhāge buddharakkhitena nāma vuḍḍhapabbajitena dhammarakkhitassa vuḍḍhapabbajitassa ``sace rājā imañca upāyaṃ katvā gaccheyya, puna jineyyā''ti vuttajayakāraṇaṃ sutvā abhiuyyāsi.

[03] ^b^yāvassa upakappatī^eb^ti yāva tassa upakappati sayhaṃ hoti. ^b^yadā caññe^eb^ti yadā aññe. ^b^vilumpantī^eb^ti taṃ vilumpitvā ^a^P1.0155^ea^ ṭhitapuggalaṃ vilumpanti. ^b^vilumpatī^eb^ti vilumpiyati. ^b^ṭhānaṃ hi maññatī^eb^ti ``kāraṇa''nti hi maññati. ^b^yadā^eb^ti yasmiṃ kāle. ^b^jetāraṃ labhate jaya^eb^nti jayanto puggalo pacchā jetārampi labhati. ^b^rosetāra^eb^nti ghaṭṭetāraṃ. ^b^rosako^eb^ti ghaṭṭako. ^b^kammavivaṭṭenā^eb^ti kammapariṇāmena, tassa vilumpanakammassa vipākadānena. ^b^so vilutto viluppatī^eb^ti so vilumpako vilumpiyati. pañcamaṃ.

[03] 127^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^upasaṅkamī^eb^ti mallikāya deviyā gabbhavuṭṭhānakāle sūtigharaṃ paṭijaggāpetvā ārakkhaṃ datvā upasaṅkami. ^b^anattamano ahosī^eb^ti, ``duggatakulassa me dhītu mahantaṃ issariyaṃ dinnaṃ, sace puttaṃ alabhissa, mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ adhigamissa, tato dāni parihīnā''ti anattamano ahosi. ^b^seyyā^eb^ti dandhapaññasmā elamūgaputtato ekaccā itthīyeva seyyā. ^b^posā^eb^ti posehi. ^b^janādhipā^eb^ti janādhibhuṃ rājānaṃ ālapati. ^b^sassudevā^eb^ti sassusasuradevatā. ^b^disampatī^eb^ti disājeṭṭhakā. ^b^tādisā subhagiyā^eb^ti tādisāya subhariyāya. chaṭṭhaṃ.

[03] 128^b^.^eb^ sattame ^a^V1.0137^ea^ ^b^samadhiggayhā^eb^ti samadhiggaṇhitvā, ādiyitvāti attho. ^b^appamādo^eb^ti kārāpakāppamādo. ^b^samodhāna^eb^nti samavadhānaṃ upakkhepaṃ. ^b^evameva kho^eb^ti hatthipadaṃ viya hi kārāpakāppamādo, sesapadajātāni viya avasesā catubhūmakā kusaladhammā. te hatthipade sesapadāni viya ^a^M1.0143^ea^ ^a^P1.0156^ea^ appamāde samodhānaṃ gacchanti, appamādassa anto parivattanti. yathā ca hatthipadaṃ sesapadānaṃ aggaṃ seṭṭhaṃ, evaṃ appamādo sesadhammānanti dasseti. mahaggatalokuttaradhammānampi hesa paṭilābhakaṭṭhena lokiyopi samāno aggova hoti.

[03] ^b^appamādaṃ pasaṃsantī^eb^ti ``etāni āyuādīni patthayantena appamādova kātabbo''ti appamādameva pasaṃsanti. yasmā vā puññakiriyāsu paṇḍitā appamādaṃ pasaṃsanti, tasmā āyuādīni patthayantena appamādova kātabboti attho. ^b^atthābhisamayā^eb^ti atthapaṭilābhā. sattamaṃ.

[03] 129^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^so ca kho kalyāṇamittassā^eb^ti so cāyaṃ dhammo kalyāṇamittasseva svākkhāto nāma hoti, na pāpamittassāti. kiñcāpi hi dhammo sabbesampi svākkhātova, kalyāṇamittassa pana sussūsantassa saddahantassa atthaṃ pūreti bhesajjaṃ viya vaḷañjantassa na itarassāti. tenetaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^dhammo^eb^ti cettha desanādhammo veditabbo.

[03] ^b^upaḍḍhamida^eb^nti thero kira rahogato cintesi -- ``ayaṃ samaṇadhammo nāma ovādake anusāsake kalyāṇamitte sati paccattapurisakāre ṭhitassa sampajjati, upaḍḍhaṃ kalyāṇamittato hoti, upaḍḍhaṃ paccattapurisakārato''ti. athassa etadahosi -- ``ahaṃ padesañāṇe ṭhito nippadesaṃ cintetuṃ na sakkomi, satthāraṃ pucchitvā nikkaṅkho bhavissāmī''ti. tasmā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā evamāha. ^b^brahmacariyassā^eb^ti ariyamaggassa. ^b^yadidaṃ kalyāṇamittatā^eb^ti yā esā kalyāṇamittatā nāma, sā upaḍḍhaṃ, tato upaḍḍhaṃ āgacchatīti attho. iti therena ``upaḍḍhupaḍḍhā sammādiṭṭhiādayo kalyāṇamittato āgacchanti, upaḍḍhupaḍḍhā paccattapurisakārato''ti vuttaṃ. kiñcāpi ^a^V1.0138^ea^ therassa ayaṃ manoratho, yathā pana bahūhi silāthambhe ussāpite, ``ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ asukena ussāpitaṃ, ettakaṃ asukenā''ti vinibbhogo natthi, yathā ca mātāpitaro nissāya uppannesu puttesu ``ettakaṃ mātito ^a^P1.0157^ea^ nibbattaṃ, ettakaṃ pitito''ti vinibbhogo natthi, evaṃ idhāpi avinibbhogadhammo hesa, ``ettakaṃ sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ ^a^M1.0144^ea^ kalyāṇamittato nibbattaṃ, ettakaṃ paccattapurisakārato''ti na sakkā laddhuṃ, kalyāṇamittatāya pana upaḍḍhaguṇo labbhatīti therassa ajjhāsayena ^b^upaḍḍhaṃ^eb^ nāma jātaṃ, sakalaguṇo paṭilabbhatīti bhagavato ajjhāsayena ^b^sakalaṃ^eb^ nāma jātaṃ. ^b^kalyāṇamittatā^eb^ti cetaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭilābhaṅgaṃ nāmāti gahitaṃ. atthato kalyāṇamittaṃ nissāya laddhā sīlasamādhivipassanāvasena cattāro khandhā. saṅkhārakkhandhotipi vadantiyeva.

[03] ^b^mā hevaṃ, ānandā^eb^ti, ānanda, mā evaṃ abhaṇi, bahussuto tvaṃ sekhapaṭisambhidappatto aṭṭha vare gahetvā maṃ upaṭṭhahasi, catūhi acchariyabbhutadhammehi samannāgato, tādisassa evaṃ kathetuṃ na vaṭṭati. ^b^sakalameva hidaṃ, ānanda, brahmacariyaṃ, yadidaṃ kalyāṇamittatā^eb^ti idaṃ bhagavā -- ``cattāro maggā cattāri phalāni tisso vijjā cha abhiññā sabbaṃ kalyāṇamittamūlakameva hotī''ti sandhāyāha. idāni vacībhedeneva kāraṇaṃ dassento ^b^kalyāṇamittasseta^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^pāṭikaṅkha^eb^nti pāṭikaṅkhitabbaṃ icchitabbaṃ, avassaṃbhāvīti attho.

[01] ^b^idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ sāsane. ^b^sammādiṭṭhiṃ bhāvetī^eb^tiādīsu aṭṭhannaṃ ādipadānaṃyeva tāva ayaṃ saṅkhepavaṇṇanā -- sammā dassanalakkhaṇā sammādiṭṭhi. sammā abhiniropanalakkhaṇo sammāsaṅkappo. sammā pariggahaṇalakkhaṇā sammāvācā. sammā samuṭṭhāpanalakkhaṇo sammākammanto. sammā vodāpanalakkhaṇā sammāājīvo. sammā paggahalakkhaṇo sammāvāyāmo. sammā upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇā sammāsati. sammā samādhānalakkhaṇo sammāsamādhi.

[03] tesu ekekassa tīṇi kiccāni honti. seyyāthidaṃ -- sammādiṭṭhi tāva aññehipi attano paccanīkakilesehi saddhiṃ micchādiṭṭhiṃ pajahati, nirodhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti, sampayuttadhamme ca passati tappaṭicchādakamohavidhamanavasena asammohato. sammāsaṅkappādayopi tatheva micchāsaṅkappādīni ca pajahanti, nirodhañca ārammaṇaṃ karonti. visesato panettha sammādiṭṭhi sahajātadhamme sammā dasseti ^a^P1.0158^ea^. sammāsaṅkappo sahajātadhamme abhiniropeti, sammāvācā sammā pariggaṇhāti, sammākammanto sammā ^a^M1.0145^ea^ samuṭṭhāpeti, sammāājīvo sammā vodāpeti ^a^V1.0139^ea^, sammāvāyāmo sammā paggaṇhāti, sammāsati sammā upaṭṭhāpeti, sammāsamādhi sammā dahati.

[03] apicesā sammādiṭṭhi nāma pubbabhāge nānākhaṇā nānārammaṇā hoti, maggakāle ekakkhaṇā ekārammaṇā. kiccato pana sammādiṭṭhi dukkhe ñāṇantiādīni cattāri nāmāni labhati. sammāsaṅkappādayopi pubbabhāge nānākhaṇā nānārammaṇā honti, maggakāle ekakkhaṇā ekārammaṇā. tesu sammāsaṅkappo kiccato nekkhammasaṅkappotiādīni tīṇi nāmāni labhati. sammāvācādayo tayo viratiyopi honti cetanāyopi, maggakkhaṇe pana viratiyova. sammāvāyāmo sammāsatīti idampi dvayaṃ kiccato sammappadhānasatipaṭṭhānavasena cattāri nāmāni labhati. sammāsamādhi pana pubbabhāgepi maggakkhaṇepi sammāsamādhiyeva.

[03] evaṃ tāva ``sammādiṭṭhi''ntiādinā nayena vuttānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ ādipadānaṃyeva atthavaṇṇanaṃ ñatvā idāni ^b^bhāveti vivekanissita^eb^ntiādīsu evaṃ ñātabbo. ^b^bhāvetī^eb^ti vaḍḍheti, attano cittasantāne punappunaṃ janeti, abhinibbattetīti attho. ^b^vivekanissita^eb^nti vivekaṃ nissitaṃ, viveke vā nissitanti vivekanissitaṃ. ^b^viveko^eb^ti vivittatā. vivittatā cāyaṃ tadaṅgaviveko, vikkhambhana-samuccheda-paṭippassaddhi-nissaraṇavivekoti pañcavidho. evametasmiṃ pañcavidhe viveke. ^b^vivekanissita^eb^nti tadaṅgavivekanissitaṃ samucchedavivekanissitaṃ nissaraṇavivekanissitañca sammādiṭṭhiṃ bhāvetīti ayamattho veditabbo. tathā hi ayaṃ ariyamaggabhāvanānuyutto yogī vipassanākkhaṇe kiccato tadaṅgavivekanissitaṃ, ajjhāsayato nissaraṇavivekanissitaṃ, maggakāle pana kiccato samucchedavivekanissitaṃ, ārammaṇato nissaraṇavivekanissitaṃ sammādiṭṭhiṃ bhāveti. esa nayo ^b^virāganissitā^eb^dīsu. vivekatthā eva hi virāgādayo ^a^P1.0159^ea^.

[03] kevalañcettha vossaggo duvidho pariccāgavossaggo ca pakkhandanavossaggo cāti. tattha ^b^pariccāgavossaggo^eb^ti vipassanākkhaṇe ca tadaṅgavasena, maggakkhaṇe ca samucchedavasena kilesappahānaṃ. ^b^pakkhandanavossaggo^eb^ti vipassanākkhaṇe tanninnabhāvena, maggakkhaṇe pana ārammaṇakaraṇena nibbānapakkhandanaṃ, tadubhayampi imasmiṃ lokiyalokuttaramissake ^a^V1.0140^ea^ atthavaṇṇanānaye ^a^M1.0146^ea^ vaṭṭati. tathā hi ayaṃ sammādiṭṭhi yathāvuttena pakārena kilese ca pariccajati, nibbānañca pakkhandati.

[03] ^b^vossaggapariṇāmi^eb^nti iminā pana sakalena vacanena vossaggatthaṃ pariṇamantaṃ pariṇatañca, paripaccantaṃ paripakkañcāti idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti. ayañhi ariyamaggabhāvanānuyutto bhikkhu yathā sammādiṭṭhi kilesapariccāgavossaggatthaṃ nibbānapakkhandanavossaggatthañca paripaccati, yathā ca paripakkā hoti, tathā naṃ bhāvetīti. esa nayo sesamaggaṅgesu.

[03] ^b^āgammā^eb^ti ārabbha sandhāya paṭicca. ^b^jātidhammā^eb^ti jātisabhāvā jātipakatikā. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā sakalo ariyamaggopi kalyāṇamittaṃ nissāya labbhati, tasmā. ^b^handā^eb^ti vavassaggatthe nipāto. ^b^appamādaṃ pasaṃsantī^eb^ti appamādaṃ vaṇṇayanti, tasmā appamādo kātabbo. ^b^atthābhisamayā^eb^ti atthapaṭilābhā. aṭṭhamaṃ.

[03] 130^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^divā divassā^eb^ti divasassa divā, majjhanhikasamayeti attho. ^b^sāpateyya^eb^nti dhanaṃ. ^b^ko pana vādo rūpiyassā^eb^ti suvaṇṇarajatatambalohakāḷalohaphālakacchapakādibhedassa ghanakatassa ceva paribhogabhājanādibhedassa ca rūpiyabhaṇḍassa pana ko vādo? ``ettakaṃ nāmā''ti kā paricchedakathāti attho. ^b^kaṇājaka^eb^nti sakuṇḍakabhattaṃ. ^b^bilaṅgadutiya^eb^nti kañjikadutiyaṃ. ^b^sāṇa^eb^nti sāṇavākamayaṃ ^a^P1.0160^ea^. ^b^tipakkhavasana^eb^nti tīṇi khaṇḍāni dvīsu ṭhānesu sibbitvā katanivāsanaṃ.

[03] ^b^asappuriso^eb^ti lāmakapuriso. ^b^uddhaggika^eb^ntiādīsu uparūparibhūmīsu phaladānavasena uddhaṃ aggamassāti ^b^uddhaggikā^eb^. saggassa hitā tatrupapattijananatoti ^b^sovaggikā^eb^. nibbattaṭṭhānesu sukho vipāko assāti ^b^sukhavipākā^eb^. suṭṭhu aggānaṃ dibbavaṇṇādīnaṃ visesānaṃ nibbattanato ^b^saggasaṃvattanikā^eb^. evarūpaṃ dakkhiṇadānaṃ na patiṭṭhāpetīti.

[03] ^b^sātodakā^eb^ti madhurodakā. ^b^settodakā^eb^ti vīcīnaṃ bhinnaṭṭhāne udakassa setatāya setodakā. ^b^supatitthā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0141^ea^ sundaratitthā. ^b^taṃ jano^eb^ti ^a^M1.0147^ea^ yena udakena sātodakā, taṃ udakaṃ jano bhājanāni pūretvā neva hareyya. ^b^na yathāpaccayaṃ vā kareyyā^eb^ti, yaṃ yaṃ udakena udakakiccaṃ kātabbaṃ, taṃ taṃ na kareyya. ^b^tadapeyyamāna^eb^nti taṃ apeyyamānaṃ. ^b^kiccakaro ca hotī^eb^ti attanā kattabbakiccakaro ceva kusalakiccakaro ca, bhuñjati ca, kammante ca payojeti, dānañca detīti attho. navamaṃ.

[03] 131^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^piṇḍapātena paṭipādesī^eb^ti piṇḍapātena saddhiṃ saṃyojesi, piṇḍapātaṃ adāsīti attho. ^b^pakkāmī^eb^ti kenacideva rājupaṭṭhānādinā kiccena gato. ^b^pacchā vippaṭisārī ahosī^eb^ti so kira aññesupi divasesu taṃ paccekasambuddhaṃ passati, dātuṃ panassa cittaṃ na uppajjati. tasmiṃ pana divase ayaṃ padumavatideviyā tatiyaputto taggarasikhī paccekabuddho gandhamādanapabbate phalasamāpattisukhena vītināmetvā pubbaṇhasamaye vuṭṭhāya anotattadahe mukhaṃ dhovitvā manosilātale nivāsetvā kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā pattacīvaramādāya abhiññāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā iddhiyā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā nagaradvāre oruyha cīvaraṃ pārupitvā pattamādāya nagaravāsīnaṃ gharadvāresu sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ ṭhapento viya pāsādikehi abhikkantādīhi anupubbena seṭṭhino gharadvāraṃ sampatto. taṃdivasañca ^a^P1.0161^ea^ seṭṭhi pātova uṭṭhāya paṇītabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā, gharadvārakoṭṭhake āsanaṃ paññāpetvā, dantantarāni sodhento nisinno hoti. so paccekabuddhaṃ disvā, taṃdivasaṃ pāto bhutvā nisinnattā dānacittaṃ uppādetvā, bhariyaṃ pakkosāpetvā, ``imassa samaṇassa piṇḍapātaṃ dehī''ti vatvā pakkāmi.

[03] seṭṭhibhariyā cintesi -- ``mayā ettakena kālena imassa `dethā'ti vacanaṃ na sutapubbaṃ, dāpentopi ca ajja na yassa vā tassa vā dāpeti, vītarāgadosamohassa vantakilesassa ohitabhārassa paccekabuddhassa dāpeti, yaṃ vā taṃ vā adatvā paṇītaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ dassāmī''ti, gharā nikkhamma paccekabuddhaṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā pattaṃ ādāya antonivesane paññattāsane nisīdāpetvā suparisuddhehi sālitaṇḍulehi bhattaṃ sampādetvā tadanurūpaṃ khādanīyaṃ byañjanaṃ supeyyañca sallakkhetvā pattaṃ pūretvā bahi gandhehi samalaṅkaritvā paccekabuddhassa hatthesu ^a^M1.0148^ea^ patiṭṭhapetvā vandi. paccekabuddho -- ``aññesampi paccekabuddhānaṃ saṅgahaṃ karissāmī''ti ^a^V1.0142^ea^ aparibhuñjitvāva anumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi. sopi kho seṭṭhi bāhirato āgacchanto paccekabuddhaṃ disvā mayaṃ ``tumhākaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ dethā''ti vatvā pakkantā, api vo laddhoti? āma, seṭṭhi laddhoti. ``passāmī''ti gīvaṃ ukkhipitvā olokesi. athassa piṇḍapātagandho uṭṭhahitvā nāsāpuṭaṃ pahari. so cittaṃ saṃyametuṃ asakkonto pacchā vippaṭisārī āhosīti.

[03] ^b^varameta^eb^ntiādi vippaṭisārassa uppannākāradassanaṃ. ^b^bhātu ca pana ekaputtakaṃ sāpateyyassa kāraṇā jīvitā voropesī^eb^ti tadā kirassa avibhatteyeva kuṭumbe mātāpitaro ca jeṭṭhabhātā ca kālamakaṃsu. so bhātujāyāya saddhiṃyeva saṃvāsaṃ kappesi. bhātu panassa eko putto hoti, taṃ vīthiyā kīḷantaṃ manussā vadanti -- ``ayaṃ dāso ayaṃ dāsī idaṃ yānaṃ idaṃ dhanaṃ tava santaka''nti. so tesaṃ kathaṃ gahetvā -- ``ayaṃ dāso mayhaṃ santaka''ntiādīni katheti.

[03] athassa cūḷapitā cintesi -- ``ayaṃ dārako idāneva evaṃ kathesi, mahallakakāle kuṭumbaṃ majjhe bhindāpeyya, idānevassa kattabbaṃ karissāmī''ti ekadivasaṃ vāsiṃ ādāya -- ``ehi putta, araññaṃ gacchāmā''ti taṃ araññaṃ netvā viravantaṃ viravantaṃ māretvā āvāṭe ^a^P1.0162^ea^ pakkhipitvā paṃsunā paṭicchādesi. idaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^sattakkhattu^eb^nti sattavāre. pubbapacchimacetanāvasena cettha attho veditabbo. ekapiṇḍapātadānasmiñhi ekāva cetanā dve paṭisandhiyo na deti, pubbapacchimacetanāhi panesa sattakkhattuṃ sagge, sattakkhattuṃ seṭṭhikule nibbatto. ^b^purāṇa^eb^nti paccekasambuddhassa dinnapiṇḍapātacetanākammaṃ.

[03] ^b^pariggaha^eb^nti pariggahitavatthu. ^b^anujīvino^eb^ti ekaṃ mahākulaṃ nissāya paṇṇāsampi saṭṭhipi kulāni jīvanti, te manusse sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^sabbaṃ nādāya gantabba^eb^nti sabbametaṃ na ādiyitvā gantabbaṃ. ^b^sabbaṃ nikkhippagāmina^eb^nti sabbametaṃ nikkhippasabhāvaṃ, pariccajitabbasabhāvamevāti attho. dasamaṃ.
[06] dutiyo vaggo.

[03] 132^b^.^eb^ tatiyavaggassa ^a^V1.0143^ea^ ^a^M1.0149^ea^ paṭhame ``nīce kule paccājāto''tiādikena tamena yuttoti ^b^tamo^eb^. kāyaduccaritādīhi puna nirayatamūpagamanato ^b^tamaparāyaṇo^eb^. iti ubhayenapi khandhatamova kathito hoti. ``ucce kule paccājāto''tiādikena jotinā yuttato ^b^joti,^eb^ ālokībhūtoti vuttaṃ hoti. kāyasucaritādīhi puna saggūpapattijotibhāvūpagamanato ^b^jotiparāyaṇo^eb^. iminā nayena itarepi dve veditabbā.

[03] ^b^venakule^eb^ti vilīvakārakule. ^b^nesādakule^eb^ti migaluddakādīnaṃ kule. ^b^rathakārakule^eb^ti cammakārakule. ^b^pukkusakule^eb^ti pupphachaḍḍakakule. ^b^kasiravuttike^eb^ti dukkhavuttike. ^b^dubbaṇṇo^eb^ti paṃsupisācako viya jhāmakhāṇuvaṇṇo. ^b^duddasiko^eb^ti vijātamātuyāpi amanāpadassano ^a^P1.0163^ea^. ^b^okoṭimako^eb^ti lakuṇḍako. ^b^kāṇo^eb^ti ekakkhikāṇo vā ubhayakkhikāṇo vā. ^b^kuṇī^eb^ti ekahatthakuṇī vā ubhayahatthakuṇī vā. ^b^khañjo^eb^ti ekapādakhañjo vā ubhayapādakhañjo vā. ^b^pakkhahato^eb^ti hatapakkho pīṭhasappī. ^b^padīpeyyassā^eb^ti telakapallakādino padīpaupakaraṇassa. ^b^evaṃ kho, mahārājā^eb^ti ettha eko puggalo bahiddhā ālokaṃ adisvā mātukucchismiṃyeva kālaṃ katvā apāyesu nibbattanto sakalaṃ kappampi saṃsarati, sopi tamotamaparāyaṇova. so pana kuhakapuggalo bhaveyya. kuhakassa hi evarūpā nibbatti hotīti vuttaṃ.

[03] ettha ca ``nīce kule paccājāto hoti caṇḍālakule vā''tiādīhi āgamanavipatti ceva pubbuppannapaccayavipatti ca dassitā. ^b^dalidde^eb^tiādīhi pavattapaccayavipatti. ^b^kasiravuttike^eb^tiādīhi ājīvupāyavipatti. ^b^dubbaṇṇo^eb^tiādīhi ^a^M1.0150^ea^ attabhāvavipatti. ^b^bavhābādho^eb^tiādīhi dukkhakāraṇasamāyogo. ^b^na lābhī^eb^tiādīhi sukhakāraṇavipatti ceva upabhogavipatti ca. ^b^kāyena duccarita^eb^ntiādīhi tamaparāyaṇabhāvassa kāraṇasamāyogo. ^b^kāyassa bhedā^eb^tiādīhi samparāyikatamūpagamo. sukkapakkho vuttapaṭipakkhanayena veditabbo.

[03] ^b^akkosatī^eb^ti ^a^V1.0144^ea^ dasahi akkosavatthūhi akkosati. ^b^paribhāsatī^eb^ti, ``kasmā tiṭṭhatha? kiṃ tumhehi amhākaṃ kasikammādīni katānī''tiādīhi? paribhavavacanehi paribhāsati. ^b^rosako^eb^ti ghaṭṭako. ^b^abyaggamanaso^eb^ti ekaggacitto. paṭhamaṃ.

[03] 133^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^jiṇṇā^eb^ti jarājiṇṇā. ^b^vuḍḍhā^eb^ti vayovuḍḍhā. ^b^mahallikā^eb^ti jātimahallikā. ^b^addhagatā^eb^ti addhaṃ cirakālaṃ atikkantā. ^b^vayoanuppattā^eb^ti pacchimavayaṃ sampattā. ^b^piyā manāpā^eb^ti rañño kira mātari matāya ayyikā mātuṭṭhāne ṭhatvā paṭijaggi, tenassa ayyikāya balavapemaṃ uppajji. tasmā evamāha. ^b^hatthiratanenā^eb^ti ^a^P1.0164^ea^ satasahassagghanako hatthī satasahassagghanakena alaṅkārena alaṅkato hatthiratanaṃ nāma. ^b^assaratanepi^eb^ eseva nayo. ^b^gāmavaro^eb^pi satasahassuṭṭhānakagāmova. ^b^sabbāni tāni bhedanadhammānī^eb^ti tesu hi kiñci kariyamānameva bhijjati, kiñci katapariyositaṃ cakkato anapanītameva, kiñci apanetvā bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapitamattaṃ, kiñci tato paraṃ, evameva sattesupi koci paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā marati, koci mūḷhagabbhāya mātari mātukucchito anikkhantova, koci nikkhantamatto, koci tato paranti. tasmā evamāha. dutiyaṃ.
[03] 134^b^.^eb^ tatiye sabbaṃ uttānameva. tatiyaṃ.

[03] 135^b^.^eb^ catutthassa aṭṭhuppattiko nikkhepo. bhagavato kira paṭhamabodhiyaṃ mahālābhasakkāro udapādi bhikkhusaṅghassa ca. titthiyā hatalābhasakkārā hutvā kulesu evaṃ kanthentā vicaranti -- ``samaṇo gotamo ^a^M1.0151^ea^ evamāha, `mayhameva dānaṃ dātabbaṃ, na aññesaṃ dānaṃ dātabbaṃ. mayhameva sāvakānaṃ dānaṃ dātabbaṃ, na aññesaṃ sāvakānaṃ dānaṃ dātabbaṃ. mayhameva dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ, na aññesaṃ dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ. mayhameva sāvakānaṃ dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ, na aññesaṃ sāvakānaṃ dinnaṃ mahapphala'nti. yuttaṃ nu kho sayampi bhikkhācāranissitena paresaṃ bhikkhācāranissitānaṃ catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ antarāyaṃ kātuṃ, ayuttaṃ karoti ananucchavika''nti. sā ^a^V1.0145^ea^ kathā pattharamānā rājakulaṃ sampattā. rājā sutvā cintesi -- ``aṭṭhānametaṃ yaṃ tathāgato paresaṃ lābhantarāyaṃ kareyya. ete tathāgatassa alābhāya ayasāya parisakkanti. sacāhaṃ idheva ṭhatvā `mā evaṃ avocuttha, na satthā evaṃ kathetī'ti vadeyyaṃ, evaṃ sā kathā nijjhattiṃ na gaccheyya, imassa mahājanassa sannipatitakāleyeva naṃ nijjhāpessāmī''ti ekaṃ chaṇadivasaṃ āgamento tuṇhī ahosi.

[03] aparena ^a^P1.0165^ea^ samayena mahāchaṇe sampatte ``ayaṃ imassa kālo''ti nagare bheriṃ carāpesi -- ``saddhā vā assaddhā vā sammādiṭṭhikā vā micchādiṭṭhikā vā geharakkhake dārake vā mātugāme vā ṭhapetvā avasesā ye vihāraṃ nāgacchanti, paññāsaṃ daṇḍo''ti. sayampi pātova nhatvā katapātarāso sabbābharaṇapaṭimaṇḍito mahatā balakāyena saddhiṃ vihāraṃ agamāsi. gacchanto ca cintesi -- ``bhagavā tumhe kira evaṃ vadatha `mayhameva dānaṃ dātabbaṃ...pe0... na aññesaṃ sāvakānaṃ dinnaṃ mahapphala'nti evaṃ pucchituṃ ayuttaṃ, pañhameva pucchissāmi, pañhaṃ kathento ca me bhagavā avasāne titthiyānaṃ vādaṃ bhañjissatī''ti. so pañhaṃ pucchanto ^b^kattha nu kho, bhante, dānaṃ dātabba^eb^nti āha. ^b^yatthā^eb^ti yasmiṃ puggale cittaṃ pasīdati, tasmiṃ dātabbaṃ, tassa vā dātabbanti attho.

[03] evaṃ vutte rājā yehi manussehi titthiyānaṃ vacanaṃ ārocitaṃ, te olokesi. te raññā olokitamattāva maṅkubhūtā adhomukhā pādaṅguṭṭhakena bhūmiṃ lekhamānā aṭṭhaṃsu. rājā -- ``ekapadeneva, bhante, hatā titthiyā''ti mahājanaṃ sāvento mahāsaddena abhāsi. evañca pana bhāsitvā -- ``bhagavā cittaṃ nāma nigaṇṭhācelakaparibbājakādīsu yattha katthaci pasīdati ^a^M1.0152^ea^, kattha pana, bhante, dinnaṃ mahapphala''nti pucchi. ^b^aññaṃ kho eta^eb^nti, ``mahārāja, aññaṃ tayā paṭhamaṃ pucchitaṃ, aññaṃ pacchā, sallakkhehi etaṃ, pañhākathanaṃ pana mayhaṃ bhāro''ti vatvā ^b^sīlavato kho^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^idha tyassā^eb^ti idha te assa. ^b^samupabyūḷho^eb^ti rāsibhūto. ^b^asikkhito^eb^ti dhanusippe asikkhito. ^b^akatahattho^eb^ti muṭṭhibandhādivasena asampāditahattho. ^b^akatayoggo^eb^ti tiṇapuñjamattikāpuñjādīsu akataparicayo. ^b^akatūpāsano^eb^ti rājarājamahāmattānaṃ adassitasarakkhepo. ^b^chambhī^eb^ti pavedhitakāyo.

[03] ^b^kāmacchando pahīno^eb^tiādīsu arahattamaggena kāmacchando pahīno hoti, anāgāmimaggena byāpādo ^a^V1.0146^ea^, arahattamaggeneva thinamiddhaṃ, tathā uddhaccaṃ, tatiyeneva kukkuccaṃ, paṭhamamaggena vicikicchā pahīnā hoti. ^b^asekkhena^eb^ ^a^P1.0166^ea^ ^b^sīlakkhandhenā^eb^ti asekkhassa sīlakkhandho asekkho sīlakkhandho nāma. esa nayo sabbattha. ettha ca purimehi catūhi padehi lokiyalokuttarasīlasamādhipaññāvimuttiyo kathitā. vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ hoti, taṃ lokiyameva.

[03] ^b^issatta^eb^nti ususippaṃ. ^b^balavīriya^eb^nti ettha balaṃ nāma vāyodhātu, ^b^vīriyaṃ^eb^ kāyikacetasikavīriyameva. ^b^bhare^eb^ti bhareyya. ^b^nāsūraṃ jātipaccayā^eb^ti, ``ayaṃ jātisampanno''ti evaṃ jātikāraṇā asūraṃ na bhareyya.

[03] ^b^khantisoracca^eb^nti ettha ^b^khantī^eb^ti adhivāsanakhanti, ^b^soracca^eb^nti arahattaṃ. ^b^dhammā^eb^ti ete dve dhammā. ^b^assame^eb^ti āvasathe. ^b^vivane^eb^ti araññaṭṭhāne, nirudake araññe caturassapokkharaṇiādīni kārayeti attho. ^b^dugge^eb^ti visamaṭṭhāne. ^b^saṅkamanānī^eb^ti paṇṇāsahatthasaṭṭhihatthāni samokiṇṇaparisuddhavālikāni saṅkamanāni kareyya.

[03] idāni etesu araññasenāsanesu vasantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhācāravattaṃ ācikkhanto ^b^annaṃ pāna^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha^b^ senāsanānī^eb^ti mañcapīṭhādīni. ^b^vippasannenā^eb^ti khīṇāsavassa dentopi sakaṅkhena kilesamalinena cittena adatvā vippasanneneva cittena dadeyya. ^b^thanaya^eb^nti gajjanto. ^b^satakkakū^eb^ti satasikharo, anekakūṭoti attho. ^b^abhisaṅkhaccā^eb^ti abhisaṅkharitvā samodhānetvā rāsiṃ katvā.

[03] ^b^āmodamāno^eb^ti ^a^M1.0153^ea^ tuṭṭhamānaso hutvā. ^b^pakiretī^eb^ti dānagge vicirati, pakiranto viya vā dānaṃ deti. ^b^puññadhārā^eb^ti anekadānacetanāmayā puññadhārā. ^b^dātāraṃ abhivassatī^eb^ti yathā ākāse samuṭṭhitameghato nikkhantā udakadhārā pathaviṃ sinehayantī tementī kiledayantī abhivassati, evameva ayampi dāyakassa abbhantare uppannā puññadhārā tameva dātāraṃ anto sineheti pūreti abhisandeti. tena vuttaṃ ``dātāraṃ abhivassatī''ti. catutthaṃ.

[03] 136^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^a^V1.0147^ea^ ^b^muddhāvasittāna^eb^nti khattiyābhisekena muddhani avasittānaṃ katābhisekānaṃ. ^b^kāmagedhapariyuṭṭhitāna^eb^nti kāmesu gedhena pariyuṭṭhitānaṃ abhibhūtānaṃ. ^b^janapadatthāvariyappattāna^eb^nti ^a^P1.0167^ea^ janapade thirabhāvappattānaṃ. ^b^rājakaraṇīyānī^eb^ti rājakammāni rājūhi kattabbakiccāni. ^b^tesu khvāha^eb^nti tesu ahaṃ. ^b^usukkamāpanno^eb^ti byāpāraṃ āpanno. esa kira rājā divasassa tikkhattuṃ bhagavato upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati, antarāgamanāni bahūnipi honti. tassa nibaddhaṃ gacchato balakāyo mahāpi hoti appopi. athekadivasaṃ pañcasatā corā cintayiṃsu -- ``ayaṃ rājā avelāya appena balena samaṇassa gotamassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati, antarāmagge naṃ gahetvā rajjaṃ gaṇhissāmā''ti. te andhavane nilīyiṃsu. rājāno ca nāma mahāpuññā honti. atha tesaṃyeva abbhantarato eko puriso nikkhamitvā rañño ārocesi. rājā mahantaṃ balakāyaṃ ādāya andhavanaṃ parivāretvā te sabbe gahetvā andhavanato yāva nagaradvārā maggassa ubhosu passesu yathā aññamaññaṃ cakkhunā cakkhuṃ upanibandhitvā olokenti, evaṃ āsannāni sūlāni ropāpetvā sūlesu uttāsesi. idaṃ sandhāya evamāha.

[03] atha satthā cintesi -- ``sacāhaṃ vakkhāmi, `mahārāja, mādise nāma sammāsambuddhe dhuravihāre vasante tayā evarūpaṃ dāruṇaṃ kammaṃ kataṃ, ayuttaṃ te kata'nti, athāyaṃ rājā maṅku hutvā santhambhituṃ na sakkuṇeyya, pariyāyena dhammaṃ kathentasseva me sallakkhessatī''ti dhammadesanaṃ ārabhanto ^a^M1.0154^ea^ ^b^taṃ kiṃ maññasī^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^saddhāyiko^eb^ti saddhātabbo, yassa tvaṃ vacanaṃ saddahasīti attho. ^b^paccayiko^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ, yassa vacanaṃ pattiyāyasīti attho. ^b^abbhasama^eb^nti ākāsasamaṃ. ^b^nippothento āgacchatī^eb^ti pathavitalato yāva akaniṭṭhabrahmalokā sabbe satte saṇhakaraṇīyaṃ tiṇacuṇṇaṃ viya karonto pisanto āgacchati.

[03] ^b^aññatra dhammacariyāyā^eb^ti ṭhapetvā dhammacariyaṃ aññaṃ kātabbaṃ natthi, dasakusalakammapathasaṅkhātā dhammacariyāva kattabbā, bhanteti -- ^b^samacariyā^eb^dīni tasseva vevacanāni. ^b^ārocemī^eb^ti ācikkhāmi. ^b^paṭivedayāmī^eb^ti jānāpemi. ^b^adhivattatī^eb^ti ^a^P1.0168^ea^ ajjhottharati. ^b^hatthiyuddhānī^eb^ti nāḷāgirisadise hemakappane nāge abhiruyha yujjhitabbayuddhāni. ^b^gatī^eb^ti nipphatti. ^b^visayo^eb^ti okāso, samatthabhāvo vā. na hi sakkā tehi jarāmaraṇaṃ paṭibāhituṃ ^a^V1.0148^ea^. ^b^mantino mahāmattā^eb^ti mantasampannā mahosadhavidhurapaṇḍitādisadisā mahāamaccā. ^b^bhūmigata^eb^nti mahālohakumbhiyo pūretvā bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapitaṃ. ^b^vehāsaṭṭha^eb^nti cammapasibbake pūretvā tulāsaṅghāṭādīsu laggetvā ceva niyyuhādīsu ca pūretvā ṭhapitaṃ. ^b^upalāpetu^eb^nti aññamaññaṃ bhindituṃ. yathā dve janā ekena maggena na gacchanti evaṃ kātuṃ.

[03] ^b^nabhaṃ āhaccā^eb^ti ākāsaṃ pūretvā. ^b^evaṃ jarā ca maccu cā^eb^ti idha dveyeva pabbatā gahitā, rājovāde pana ``jarā āgacchati sabbayobbanaṃ vilumpamānā''ti evaṃ jarā maraṇaṃ byādhi vipattīti cattāropete āgatāva. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā hatthiyuddhādīhi jarāmaraṇaṃ jinituṃ na sakkā, tasmā. ^b^saddhaṃ nivesaye^eb^ti saddhaṃ niveseyya, patiṭṭhāpeyyāti. pañcamaṃ.
[06] tatiyo vaggo.
[06] iti sāratthappakāsiniyā
[03] saṃyuttanikāya-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] kosalasaṃyuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 137^b^.^eb^ mārasaṃyuttassa ^a^V1.0149^ea^ ^a^P1.0169^ea^ ^a^M1.0155^ea^ paṭhame ^b^uruvelāyaṃ viharatī^eb^ti paṭividdhasabbaññutaññāṇo uruvelagāmaṃ upanissāya viharati. ^b^paṭhamābhisambuddho^eb^ti abhisambuddho hutvā paṭhamaṃ antosattāhasmiṃyeva. ^b^dukkarakārikāyā^eb^ti chabbassāni katāya dukkarakārikāya. ^b^māro pāpimā^eb^ti attano visayaṃ atikkamituṃ paṭipanne satte māretīti ^b^māro^eb^. pāpe niyojeti, sayaṃ vā pāpe niyuttoti ^b^pāpimā^eb^. aññānipissa kaṇho, adhipati, vasavattī, antako, namuci, pamattabandhūtiādīni bahūni nāmāni, idha pana nāmadvayameva gahitaṃ. ^b^upasaṅkamī^eb^ti -- ``ayaṃ samaṇo gotamo `muttosmī'ti maññati, amuttabhāvamassa kathessāmī''ti cintetvā upasaṅkami.

[03] ^b^tapokammā apakkammā^eb^ti tapokammato apakkamitvā. ^b^aparaddho^eb^ti ``dūre tvaṃ suddhimaggā''ti vadati. ^b^amaraṃ tapa^eb^nti amaratapaṃ amarabhāvatthāya kataṃ lūkhatapaṃ, attakilamathānuyogo. ^b^sabbānatthāvahaṃ hotī^eb^ti, ``sabbaṃ tapaṃ mayhaṃ atthāvahaṃ na bhavatī''ti ñatvā. ^b^phiyārittaṃva dhammanī^eb^ti araññe thale phiyārittaṃ viya. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- yathā araññe thale nāvaṃ ṭhapetvā bhaṇḍassa pūretvā mahājanā abhirūhitvā phiyārittaṃ gahetvā saṃkaḍḍheyyuṃ ceva uppīleyyuṃ ca, so mahājanassa vāyāmo ekaṅguladvaṅgulamattampi nāvāya gamanaṃ asādhento niratthako bhaveyya ^a^P1.0170^ea^ na anatthāvaho, evameva ahaṃ `sabbaṃ amaraṃ tapaṃ anatthāvahaṃ hotī'ti ñatvā vissajjesinti.

[03] idāni ^a^M1.0156^ea^ taṃ amaraṃ tapaṃ pahāya yena maggena buddho jāto, taṃ dassento ^b^sīla^eb^ntiādimāha ^a^V1.0150^ea^. tattha ^b^sīla^eb^nti vacanena sammāvācākammantājīvā gahitā, ^b^samādhinā^eb^ sammāvāyāmasatisamādhayo, ^b^paññāya^eb^ sammādiṭṭhisaṅkappā. ^b^maggaṃ bodhāya bhāvaya^eb^nti imaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikameva ariyamaggaṃ bodhatthāya bhāvayanto. ettha ca ^b^bodhāyā^eb^ti maggatthāya. yathā hi yāgutthāya yāgumeva pacanti, pūvatthāya pūvameva pacanti, na aññaṃ kiñci karonti, evaṃ maggameva maggatthāya bhāveti. tenāha ``maggaṃ bodhāya bhāvaya''nti. ^b^paramaṃ suddhi^eb^nti arahattaṃ. ^b^nihato^eb^ti tvaṃ mayā nihato parājito. paṭhamaṃ.

[03] 138^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^rattandhakāratimisāya^eb^nti rattiṃ andhabhāvakārake mahātame caturaṅge tamasi. ^b^abbhokāse nisinno hotī^eb^ti gandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ pāsāṇaphalake mahācīvaraṃ sīse ṭhapetvā padhānaṃ pariggaṇhamāno nisinno hoti.

[03] nanu ca tathāgatassa abhāvito vā maggo, appahīnā vā kilesā, appaṭividdhaṃ vā akuppaṃ, asacchikato vā nirodho natthi, kasmā evamakāsīti? anāgate kulaputtānaṃ aṅkusatthaṃ. ``anāgate hi kulaputtā mayā gatamaggaṃ āvajjitvā abbhokāsavāsaṃ vasitabbaṃ maññamānā padhānakammaṃ karissantī''ti sampassamāno satthā evamakāsi. ^b^mahā^eb^ti mahanto. ^b^ariṭṭhako^eb^ti kāḷako. ^b^maṇī^eb^ti pāsāṇo. ^b^evamassa sīsaṃ hotī^eb^ti evarūpaṃ tassa kāḷavaṇṇaṃ kūṭāgārappamāṇaṃ mahāpāsāṇasadisaṃ sīsaṃ hoti.

[03] ^b^subhāsubha^eb^nti dīghamaddhānaṃ saṃsaranto sundarāsundaraṃ vaṇṇaṃ katvā āgatosīti vadati. atha vā ^b^saṃsara^eb^nti saṃsaranto āgacchanto. ^b^dīghamaddhāna^eb^nti vasavattiṭṭhānato yāva uruvelāya dīghamaggaṃ, pure bodhāya vā chabbassāni ^a^P1.0171^ea^ dukkarakārikasamayasaṅkhātaṃ dīghakālaṃ. ^b^vaṇṇaṃ katvā subhāsubha^eb^nti sundarañca asundarañca nānappakāraṃ vaṇṇaṃ katvā anekavāraṃ mama santikaṃ āgatosīti attho. so kira vaṇṇo nāma natthi, yena ^a^M1.0157^ea^ vaṇṇena māro vibhiṃsakatthāya bhagavato santikaṃ na āgatapubbo. tena taṃ bhagavā evamāha. ^b^alaṃ te tenā^eb^ti alaṃ tuyhaṃ etena māravibhiṃsākāradassanabyāpārena. dutiyaṃ.

[03] 139^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^a^V1.0151^ea^ ^b^susaṃvutā^eb^ti supihitā. ^b^na te māravasānugā^eb^ti, māra, te tuyhaṃ vasānugā na honti. ^b^na te mārassa baddhagū^eb^ti te tuyhaṃ mārassa baddhacarā sissā antevāsikā na honti. tatiyaṃ.

[03] 140^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^yoniso manasikārā^eb^ti upāyamanasikārena. ^b^yoniso sammappadhānā^eb^ti upāyavīriyena kāraṇavīriyena. ^b^vimuttī^eb^ti arahattaphalavimutti. ^b^ajjhabhāsī^eb^ti ``ayaṃ attanā vīriyaṃ katvā arahattaṃ patvāpi na tussati, idāni aññesampi `pāpuṇāthā'ti ussāhaṃ karoti, paṭibāhessāmi na''nti cintetvā abhāsi.

[03] ^b^mārapāsenā^eb^ti kilesapāsena. ^b^ye dibbā ye ca mānusā^eb^ti ye dibbā kāmaguṇasaṅkhātā mānusā kāmaguṇasaṅkhātā ca mārapāsā nāma atthi, sabbehi tehi tvaṃ baddhoti vadati. ^b^mārabandhanabaddho^eb^ti mārabandhanena baddho, mārabandhane vā baddho. ^b^na me samaṇa mokkhasī^eb^ti samaṇa tvaṃ mama visayato na muccissasi. catutthaṃ.

[03] 141^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^muttāha^eb^nti mutto ahaṃ. purimaṃ suttaṃ antovasse vuttaṃ, idaṃ pana pavāretvā vuṭṭhavassakāle. ^b^cārika^eb^nti anupubbagamanacārikaṃ. (pavāretvā) divase divase yojanaparamaṃ ^a^P1.0172^ea^ gacchantā carathāti vadati. ^b^mā ekena dve^eb^ti ekamaggena dve janā mā agamittha. evañhi gatesu ekasmiṃ dhammaṃ desente, ekena tuṇhībhūtena ṭhātabbaṃ hoti. tasmā evamāha.

[03] ^b^ādikalyāṇa^eb^nti ādimhi kalyāṇaṃ sundaraṃ bhaddakaṃ. tathā majjhapariyosānesu. ādimajjhapariyosānañca nāmetaṃ sāsanassa ca desanāya ca ^a^M1.0158^ea^ vasena duvidhaṃ. tattha sāsanassa sīlaṃ ādi, samathavipassanāmaggā majjhaṃ, phalanibbānāni pariyosānaṃ. sīlasamādhayo vā ādi ^a^V1.0152^ea^, vipassanāmaggā majjhaṃ, phalanibbānāni pariyosānaṃ. sīlasamādhivipassanā vā ādi, maggo majjhaṃ, phalanibbānāni pariyosānaṃ. desanāya pana catuppadikāya gāthāya tāva paṭhamapādo ādi, dutiyatatiyā majjhaṃ, catuttho pariyosānaṃ. pañcapadachappadānaṃ paṭhamapādo ādi, avasānapādo pariyosānaṃ, avasesā majjhaṃ. ekānusandhikasuttassa nidānaṃ ādi, ``idamavocā''ti pariyosānaṃ, sesaṃ majjhaṃ. anekānusandhikassa majjhe bahūpi anusandhi majjhameva, nidānaṃ ādi, ``idamavocā''ti pariyosānaṃ.

[03] ^b^sāttha^eb^nti sātthakaṃ katvā desetha. ^b^sabyañjana^eb^nti byañjanehi ceva padehi ca paripūraṃ katvā desetha. ^b^kevalaparipuṇṇa^eb^nti sakalaparipuṇṇaṃ. ^b^parisuddha^eb^nti nirupakkilesaṃ. ^b^brahmacariya^eb^nti sikkhattayasaṅgahaṃ sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ. ^b^pakāsethā^eb^ti āvikarotha.

[03] ^b^apparajakkhajātikā^eb^ti paññācakkhumhi appakilesarajasabhāvā, dukūlasāṇiyā paṭicchannā viya catuppadikagāthāpariyosāne arahattaṃ pattuṃ samatthā santīti attho. ^b^assavanatā^eb^ti assavanatāya. ^b^parihāyantī^eb^ti alābhaparihāniyā dhammato parihāyanti. ^b^senānigamo^eb^ti paṭhamakappikānaṃ senāya niviṭṭhokāse patiṭṭhitagāmo, sujātāya vā pitu senānī nāma nigamo. ^b^tenupasaṅkamissāmī^eb^ti nāhaṃ tumhe uyyojetvā pariveṇādīni kāretvā upaṭṭhākādīhi paricariyamāno ^a^P1.0173^ea^ viharissāmi, tiṇṇaṃ pana jaṭilānaṃ aḍḍhuḍḍhāni pāṭihāriyasahassāni dassetvā dhammameva desetuṃ upasaṅkamissāmīti. ^b^tenupasaṅkamī^eb^ti, ``ayaṃ samaṇo gotamo mahāyuddhaṃ vicārento viya, `mā ekena dve agamittha, dhammaṃ desethā'ti saṭṭhi jane uyyojeti, imasmiṃ pana ekasmimpi dhammaṃ desente mayhaṃ cittassādaṃ natthi, evaṃ bahūsu desentesu kuto bhavissati, paṭibāhāmi na''nti cintetvā upasaṅkami. pañcamaṃ.

[03] 142^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^soṇḍikākilañja^eb^nti surākārakānaṃ piṭṭhapattharaṇakakilañjaṃ. ^b^kosalikā kaṃsapātī^eb^ti kosalarañño rathacakkappamāṇā paribhogapāti ^a^M1.0159^ea^. ^b^gaḷagaḷāyante^eb^ti gajjante. ^b^kammāragaggariyā^eb^ti kammāruddhanapaṇāḷiyā. ^b^dhamamānāyā^eb^ti bhastavātena pūriyamānāya. ^b^iti viditvā^eb^ti -- ``samaṇo gotamo padhānamanuyutto sukhena nisinno, ghaṭṭayissāmi na''nti vuttappakāraṃ ^a^V1.0153^ea^ attabhāvaṃ māpetvā niyāmabhūmiyaṃ ito cito ca sañcarantaṃ vijjulatālokena disvā, ``ko nu kho eso satto''ti? āvajjento, ``māro aya''nti evaṃ viditvā.

[03] ^b^suññagehānī^eb^ti suññāgārāni. ^b^seyyā^eb^ti seyyatthāya. ṭhassāmi caṅkamissāmi nisīdissāmi nipajjissāmīti etadatthāya yo suññāgārāni sevatīti attho. ^b^so muni attasaññato^eb^ti so buddhamuni hatthapādakukkuccābhāvena saṃyatattabhāvo. ^b^vossajja careyya tattha so^eb^ti so tasmiṃ attabhāve ālayaṃ nikantiṃ vossajjitvā pahāya careyya. ^b^patirūpaṃ hi tathāvidhassa ta^eb^nti tādisassa taṃsaṇṭhitassa buddhamunino taṃ attabhāve nikantiṃ vossajjitvā caraṇaṃ nāma patirūpaṃ yuttaṃ anucchavikaṃ.

[03] ^b^carakā^eb^ti sīhabyagghādikā sañcaraṇasattā. ^b^bheravā^eb^ti saviññāṇakāviññāṇakabheravā. tattha saviññāṇakā sīhabyagghādayo, aviññāṇakā rattibhāge khāṇuvammikādayo. tepi hi tasmiṃ kāle yakkhā viya upaṭṭhahanti, rajjuvalliyādīni sabbāni sappā viya upaṭṭhahanti. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tesu bheravesu suññāgāragato ^a^P1.0174^ea^ buddhamuni lomacalanamattakampi na karoti.

[03] idāni aṭṭhānaparikappaṃ dassento ^b^nabhaṃ phaleyyā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^phaleyyā^eb^ti kākapadaṃ viya hīrahīraso phaleyya. ^b^caleyyā^eb^ti pokkharapatte vātāhato udakabindu viya caleyya. ^b^sallampi ce urasi pakappayeyyu^eb^nti tikhiṇasattisallaṃ cepi urasmiṃ cāreyeyyuṃ. ^b^upadhīsū^eb^ti khandhūpadhīsu. ^b^tāṇaṃ na karontī^eb^ti tikhiṇe salle urasmiṃ cāriyamāne bhayena gumbantarakandarādīni pavisantā tāṇaṃ karonti nāma. buddhā pana samucchinnasabbabhayā evarūpaṃ tāṇaṃ nāma na karonti. chaṭṭhaṃ.

[03] 143^b^.^eb^ sattame ^a^M1.0160^ea^ ^b^pāde pakkhāletvā^eb^ti utugāhāpanatthaṃ dhovitvā. buddhānaṃ pana sarīre rajojallaṃ na upalimpati, udakampi pokkharapatte pakkhittaṃ viya vivaṭṭitvā gacchati. apica kho dhotapādake gehe pāde dhovitvā pavisanaṃ pabbajitānaṃ vattaṃ. tattha buddhānaṃ vattabhedo nāma natthi, vattasīse pana ṭhatvā dhovanti. sace hi tathāgato neva nhāyeyya, na pāde dhoveyya, ``nāyaṃ ^a^V1.0154^ea^ manusso''ti vadeyyuṃ. tasmā manussakiriyaṃ amuñcanto dhovati. ^b^sato sampajāno^eb^ti soppapariggāhakena satisampajaññena samannāgato. ^b^upasaṅkamī^eb^ti samaṇo gotamo sabbarattiṃ abbhokāse caṅkamitvā gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā niddāyati, ativiya sukhasayito bhavissati, ghaṭṭayissāmi nanti cintetvā upasaṅkami.

[01] ^b^kiṃ soppasī^eb^ti kiṃ supasi, kiṃ soppaṃ nāmidaṃ tavāti vadati. ^b^kiṃ nu soppasī^eb^ti kasmā nu supasi? ^b^dubbhago viyā^eb^ti mato viya, visaññī viya ca. ^b^suññamagāra^eb^nti suññaṃ me gharaṃ laddhanti soppasīti vadati. ^b^sūriye uggate^eb^ti sūriyamhi uṭṭhite. idāni hi aññe bhikkhū sammajjanti ^a^P1.0175^ea^, pānīyaṃ upaṭṭhapenti, bhikkhācāragamanasajjā bhavanti, tvaṃ kasmā soppasiyeva.

[03] ^b^jālinī^eb^ti tayo bhave ajjhottharitvā ṭhitena ``ajjhattikassupādāya aṭṭhārasataṇhāvicaritānī''tiādinā (vibha0 842) tena tena attano koṭṭhāsabhūtena jālena jālinī. ^b^visattikā^eb^ti rūpādīsu tattha tattha visattatāya visamūlatāya visaparibhogatāya ca visattikā. ^b^kuhiñci netave^eb^ti katthaci netuṃ. ^b^sabbūpadhi parikkhayā^eb^ti sabbesaṃ khandhakilesābhisaṅkhārakāmaguṇabhedānaṃ upadhīnaṃ parikkhayā. ^b^kiṃ tavettha, mārā^eb^ti, māra, tuyhaṃ kiṃ ettha? kasmā tvaṃ uṇhayāguyaṃ nilīyituṃ asakkontī khuddakamakkhikā viya antanteneva ujjhāyanto āhiṇḍasīti. sattamaṃ.
[03] 144^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhamaṃ devatāsaṃyutte vuttatthameva. aṭṭhamaṃ.

[03] 145^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^M1.0161^ea^ ^b^appaṃ vā bhiyyo^eb^ti bhiyyo jīvanto aparaṃ vassasataṃ jīvituṃ na sakkoti, paṇṇāsaṃ vā saṭṭhi vā vassāni jīvati. ^b^ajjhabhāsī^eb^ti samaṇo gotamo ``manussānaṃ appamāyū''ti katheti, dīghabhāvamassa kathessāmīti paccanīkasātatāya abhibhavitvā abhāsi.

[03] ^b^na^eb^ ^a^V1.0155^ea^ ^b^naṃ hīḷe^eb^ti taṃ āyuṃ ``appakamida''nti na hīḷeyya. ^b^khīramatto vā^eb^ti yathā daharo kumāro uttānaseyyako khīraṃ pivitvā dukūlacumbaṭake nipanno asaññī viya niddāyati, kassaci āyuṃ appaṃ vā dīghaṃ vāti na cinteti, evaṃ sappuriso. ^b^careyyādittasīso vā^eb^ti āyuṃ parittanti ñatvā pajjalitasīso viya careyya. navamaṃ.
[03] 146^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^nemīva rathakubbara^eb^nti yathā divasaṃ gacchantassa rathassa cakkanemi kubbaraṃ anupariyāyati na vijahati, evaṃ āyu anupariyāyatīti. dasamaṃ.
[06] paṭhamo vaggo.

[03] 147^b^.^eb^ dutiyavaggassa ^a^P1.0176^ea^ paṭhame ^b^nisinno^eb^ti pubbe vuttanayeneva padhānaṃ pariggaṇhanto nisinno. māropissa sukhanisinnabhāvaṃ ñatvā ghaṭṭayissāmīti upasaṅkamanto. ^b^padālesī^eb^ti pabbatapiṭṭhe ṭhatvā pavijjhi. pāsāṇā nirantarā aññamaññaṃ abhihanantā patanti. ^b^kevala^eb^nti sakalaṃ. ^b^sabba^eb^nti tasseva vevacanaṃ. paṭhamaṃ.

[03] 148^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^vicakkhukammāyā^eb^ti parisāya paññācakkhuṃ vināsetukamyatāya. buddhānaṃ panesa paññācakkhuṃ vināsetuṃ na sakkoti, parisāya bheravārammaṇaṃ ^a^M1.0162^ea^ sāvento vā dassento vā sakkoti. ^b^vijitāvī nu maññasī^eb^ti kiṃ nu tvaṃ ``vijitavijayo aha''nti maññasi? mā evaṃ maññi, natthi te jayo. ^b^parisāsū^eb^ti, aṭṭhasu parisāsu. ^b^balappattā^eb^ti dasabalappattā. dutiyaṃ.

[03] 149^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^a^V1.0156^ea^ ^b^mandiyā nū^eb^ti mandabhāvena momūhabhāvena. ^b^udāhu kāveyyamatto^eb^ti udāhu yathā kavi kabbaṃ cintento tena kabbakaraṇena matto sayati, evaṃ sayasi. ^b^sampacurā^eb^ti bahavo. ^b^kimidaṃ soppase vā^eb^ti kasmā idaṃ soppaṃ soppasiyeva? ^b^atthaṃ sameccā^eb^ti atthaṃ samāgantvā pāpuṇitvā. mayhaṃ hi asaṅgaho nāma saṅgahavipanno vā attho natthi. ^b^salla^eb^nti tikhiṇaṃ sattisallaṃ. ^b^jaggaṃ na saṅke^eb^ti yathā ekacco sīhapathādīsu jagganto saṅkati, tathā ahaṃ jaggantopi na saṅkāmi. ^b^napi bhemi sottu^eb^nti yathā ekacco sīhapathādīsuyeva supituṃ bhāyati, evaṃ ahaṃ supitumpi na bhāyāmi. ^b^nānutapanti māma^eb^nti yathā ācariyassa vā antevāsikassa vā aphāsuke jāte uddesaparipucchāya ^a^P1.0177^ea^ ṭhitattā antevāsiṃ rattindivā atikkamantā anutapanti, evaṃ maṃ nānutapanti. na hi mayhaṃ kiñci apariniṭṭhitakammaṃ nāma atthi. tenevāha ^b^hāniṃ na passāmi kuhiñci loke^eb^ti. tatiyaṃ.

[03] 150^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^anurodhavirodhesū^eb^ti rāgapaṭighesu. ^b^mā sajjittho tadācara^eb^nti evaṃ dhammakathaṃ ācaranto mā laggi. dhammakathaṃ kathentassa hi ekacce sādhukāraṃ dadanti, tesu rāgo uppajjati. ekacce asakkaccaṃ suṇanti, tesu paṭigho uppajjati. iti dhammakathiko anurodhavirodhesu sajjati nāma. tvaṃ evaṃ mā sajjitthoti vadati. ^b^yadaññamanusāsatī^eb^ti yaṃ aññaṃ anusāsati, taṃ. sambuddho hitānukampī hitena anupakampati. yasmā ca hitānukampī ^a^M1.0163^ea^, tasmā anurodhavirodhehi vippamutto tathāgatoti. catutthaṃ.
[03] 151^b^.^eb^ pañcame ākāse carantepi bandhatīti ^b^antalikkhacaro. pāso^eb^ti rāgapāso. ^b^mānaso^eb^ti manasampayutto. pañcamaṃ.

[03] 152^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^a^V1.0157^ea^ ^b^pañcannaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ upādāyā^eb^ti pañca upādānakkhandhe ādiyitvā, sabhāvasāmaññalakkhaṇavasena nānappakārato vibhajitvā dassento. ^b^sandassetī^eb^ti khandhānaṃ sabhāvalakkhaṇādīni dasseti. ^b^samādapetī^eb^ti gaṇhāpeti. ^b^samuttejetī^eb^ti samādānamhi ussāhaṃ janeti. ^b^sampahaṃsetī^eb^ti paṭividdhaguṇena vodāpeti jotāpeti. ^b^aṭṭhiṃ katvā^eb^ti atthikaṃ katvā, ``ayaṃ no adhigantabbo attho''ti evaṃ sallakkhetvā tāya desanāya atthikā hutvā. ^b^manasi katvā^eb^ti citte ṭhapetvā. ^b^sabbacetaso samannāharitvā^eb^ti sabbena ^a^P1.0178^ea^ tena kammakārakacittena samannāharitvā. ^b^ohitasotā^eb^ti ṭhapitāsotā. ^b^abbhokāse nikkhittā^eb^ti otāpanatthāya ṭhapitā.

[03] ^b^rūpaṃ vedayitaṃ saññā^eb^nti, ete rūpādayo tayo khandhā. ^b^yañca saṅkhata^eb^nti iminā saṅkhārakkhandho gahito. ^b^evaṃ tattha virajjatī^eb^ti ``eso ahaṃ na homi, etaṃ mayhaṃ na hotī''ti passanto evaṃ tesu khandhesu virajjati. ^b^khematta^eb^nti khemībhūtaṃ attabhāvaṃ. iminā phalakkhaṇaṃ dasseti. ^b^anvesa^eb^nti bhavayonigatiṭhitisattāvāsasaṅkhātesu sabbaṭṭhānesu pariyesamānā. ^b^nājjhagā^eb^ti na passīti. chaṭṭhaṃ.

[03] 153^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^phassāyatanāna^eb^nti sañjātisamosaraṇaṭṭhena chadvārikassa phassassa āyatanānaṃ. ^b^bhayabheravaṃ sadda^eb^nti meghadundubhiasanipātasaddasadisaṃ bhayajanakaṃ saddaṃ. ^b^pathavī maññe undrīyatī^eb^ti ayaṃ mahāpathavī paṭapaṭasaddaṃ ^a^M1.0164^ea^ kurumānā viya ahosi. ^b^ettha loko vimucchito^eb^ti etesu chasu ārammaṇesu loko adhimucchito. ^b^māradheyya^eb^nti mārassa ṭhānabhūtaṃ tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ. sattamaṃ.

[03] 154^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^pāhunakāni bhavantī^eb^ti tathārūpe nakkhatte tattha tattha pesetabbāni pāhunakāni bhavanti, āgantukapaṇṇākāradānāni vā. sayaṃcaraṇadivase samavayajātigottā kumārakā ^a^V1.0158^ea^ tato tato sannipatanti. kumārikāyopi attano attano vibhavānurūpena alaṅkatā tahaṃ tahaṃ vicaranti. tatra kumārikāyopi yathārucikānaṃ kumārakānaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ pesenti, kumārakāpi kumārikānaṃ aññasmiṃ asati antamaso mālāguḷenapi parikkhipanti. ^b^anvāviṭṭhā^eb^ti anu āviṭṭhā. taṃdivasaṃ kira pañcasatā ^a^P1.0179^ea^ kumārikāyo uyyānakīḷaṃ gacchantiyo paṭipathe satthāraṃ disvā chaṇapūvaṃ dadeyyuṃ. satthā tāsaṃ dānānumodanatthaṃ pakiṇṇakadhammadesanaṃ deseyya, desanāpariyosāne sabbāpi sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhaheyyuṃ. māro tāsaṃ sampattiyā antarāyaṃ karissāmīti anvāvisi. pāḷiyaṃ pana ^b^mā samaṇo gotamo piṇḍamalatthā^eb^ti ettakaṃyeva vuttanti.

[03] kiṃ pana satthā mārāvaṭṭanaṃ ajānitvā paviṭṭhoti? āma ajānitvā. kasmā? anāvajjanatāya. buddhānañhi -- ``asukaṭṭhāne bhattaṃ labhissāma, na labhissāmā''ti āvajjanaṃ na ananucchavikaṃ. paviṭṭho pana manussānaṃ upacārabhedaṃ disvā, ``kiṃ ida''nti? āvajjento ñatvā, ``āmisatthaṃ mārāvaṭṭanaṃ bhindituṃ ananucchavika''nti abhinditvāva nikkhanto.

[03] ^b^upasaṅkamī^eb^ti amittavijayena viya tuṭṭho sakalagāme kaṭacchumattampi bhattaṃ alabhitvā gāmato nikkhamantaṃ bhagavantaṃ gāmiyamanussavesena upasaṅkami. ^b^tathāhaṃ karissāmī^eb^ti idaṃ so musā bhāsati. evaṃ kirassa ahosi -- ``mayā evaṃ vutte puna pavisissati, atha naṃ gāmadārakā `sakalagāme caritvā kaṭacchubhikkhampi alabhitvā gāmato nikkhamma puna paviṭṭhosī'tiādīni ^a^M1.0165^ea^ vatvā uppaṇḍessantī''ti. bhagavā pana -- ``sacāyaṃ maṃ evaṃ viheṭhessati muddhamasseva sattadhā phalissatī''ti tasmiṃ anukampāya apavisitvā gāthādvayamāha.

[03] tattha ^b^pasavī^eb^ti janesi nipphādesi. ^b^āsajjā^eb^ti āsādetvā ghaṭṭetvā. ^b^na me pāpaṃ vipaccatī^eb^ti mama pāpaṃ na paccati. ^b^nipphalaṃ eta^eb^nti kiṃ nu tvaṃ evaṃ maññasi? mā evaṃ maññi, atthi tayā katassa pāpassa phalanti dīpeti. ^b^kiñcana^eb^nti maddituṃ samatthaṃ rāgakiñcanādi kilesajātaṃ. ^b^ābhassarā yathā^eb^ti yathā ābhassarā devā sappītikajjhānena yāpentā pītibhakkhā nāma honti, evaṃ bhavissāmāti. aṭṭhamaṃ.

[03] 155^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^V1.0159^ea^ ^a^P1.0180^ea^ ^b^nibbānapaṭisaṃyuttāyā^eb^ti nibbānaṃ apadisitvā pavattāya. ^b^haṭahaṭakeso^eb^ti purimakese pacchato, pacchimakese purato vāmapassakese dakkhiṇato, dakkhiṇapassakese vāmato pharitvā pharitvā vippakiṇṇakeso. ^b^mama cakkhusamphassaviññāṇāyatana^eb^nti cakkhuviññāṇena sampayutto cakkhusamphassopi viññāṇāyatanampi mamevāti. ettha ca cakkhusamphassena viññāṇasampayuttakā dhammā gahitā, viññāṇāyatanena sabbānipi cakkhudvāre uppannāni āvajjanādiviññāṇāni. sotadvārādīsupi eseva nayo. manodvāre pana ^b^mano^eb^ti sāvajjanakaṃ bhavaṅgacittaṃ. ^b^dhammā^eb^ti ārammaṇadhammā. ^b^manosamphasso^eb^ti sāvajjanena bhavaṅgena sampayuttaphasso. ^b^viññāṇāyatana^eb^nti javanacittaṃ tadārammaṇampi vaṭṭati.
[03] ^b^taveva pāpima, cakkhū^eb^ti yaṃ loke timirakācādīhi upaddutaṃ anekarogāyatanaṃ upakkavipakkaṃ antamaso kāṇacakkhupi, sabbaṃ taṃ taveva bhavatu. rūpādīsupi eseva nayo.

[03] ^b^yaṃ vadantī^eb^ti yaṃ bhaṇḍakaṃ ``mama ida''nti vadanti. ^b^ye vadanti mamanti cā^eb^ti ye ca puggalā ``mama''nti vadanti. ^b^ettha ce te mano atthī^eb^ti etesu ca ṭhānesu yadi cittaṃ atthi. ^b^na me samaṇa mokkhasī^eb^ti samaṇa mayhaṃ visayato na muccissasi. ^b^yaṃ vadantī^eb^ti yaṃ bhaṇḍakaṃ vadanti, na taṃ mayhaṃ. ^b^ye vadantī^eb^ti yepi puggalā evaṃ vadanti, na te ahaṃ. ^b^na me maggampi dakkhasī^eb^ti bhavayonigatiādīsu mayhaṃ gatamaggampi na passasi. navamaṃ.

[03] 156^b^.^eb^ dasame ^a^M1.0166^ea^ ^b^ahanaṃ aghātaya^eb^nti ahanantena aghātayantena. ^b^ajinaṃ ajāpaya^eb^nti parassa dhanajāniṃ akarontena akārāpentena. ^b^asocaṃ asocāpaya^eb^nti asocantena asocāpayantena. iti bhagavā adhammikarājūnaṃ rajje vijite daṇḍakarapīḷite manusse disvā kāruññavasena evaṃ cintesi. ^b^upasaṅkamī^eb^ti ^a^P1.0181^ea^ ``samaṇo gotamo `sakkā nu kho rajjaṃ kāretu'nti cintesi, rajjaṃ kāretukāmo bhavissati, rajjañca nāmetaṃ pamādaṭṭhānaṃ, rajjaṃ kārente sakkā otāraṃ labhituṃ, gacchāmi ussāhamassa janessāmī''ti cintetvā upasaṅkami. ^b^iddhipādā^eb^ti ijjhanakakoṭṭhāsā ^a^V1.0160^ea^. ^b^bhāvitā^eb^ti vaḍḍhitā. ^b^bahulīkatā^eb^ti punappunaṃ katā. ^b^yānīkatā^eb^ti yuttayānaṃ viya katā. ^b^vatthukatā^eb^ti patiṭṭhaṭṭhenavatthukatā. ^b^anuṭṭhitā^eb^ti avijahitā niccānubaddhā. ^b^paricitā^eb^ti sātaccakiriyāya suparicitā katā issāsassa avirādhitavedhihattho viya. ^b^susamāraddhā^eb^ti suṭṭhu samāraddhā paripuṇṇabhāvanā. ^b^adhimucceyyā^eb^ti cinteyya.

[03] ^b^pabbatassā^eb^ti pabbato bhaveyya. ^b^dvittāvā^eb^ti tiṭṭhatu eko pabbato, dvikkhattumpi tāva mahanto suvaṇṇapabbato ekassa nālaṃ, na pariyattoti attho. ^b^iti vidvā samañcare^eb^ti evaṃ jānanto samaṃ careyya. ^b^yatonidāna^eb^nti dukkhaṃ nāma pañcakāmaguṇanidānaṃ, taṃ yatonidānaṃ hoti, evaṃ yo adakkhi. ^b^kathaṃ nameyyā^eb^ti so jantu tesu dukkhassa nidānabhūtesu kāmesu kena kāraṇena nameyya. ^b^upadhiṃ viditvā^eb^ti kāmaguṇaupadhiṃ ``saṅgo eso, lagganameta''nti evaṃ viditvā. ^b^tasseva jantu vinayāya sikkhe^eb^ti tasseva upadhissa vinayāya sikkheyya. dasamaṃ.
[06] dutiyo vaggo.

[03] 157^b^.^eb^ tatiyavaggassa paṭhame ^b^jaṭaṇḍuvenā^eb^ti jaṭācumbaṭakena. ^b^ajinakkhipanivattho^eb^ti sakhuraṃ ajinacammaṃ ekaṃ nivattho ekaṃ pāruto. ^b^udumbaradaṇḍa^eb^nti ^a^M1.0167^ea^ appicchabhāvappakāsanatthaṃ īsakaṃ vaṅkaṃ udumbaradaṇḍaṃ gahetvā. ^b^etadavocā^eb^ti loke brāhmaṇassa vacanaṃ nāma sussūsanti, brāhmaṇesupi pabbajitassa, pabbajitesupi mahallakassāti mahallakabrāhmaṇassa pabbajitavesaṃ gahetvā padhānabhūmiyaṃ kammaṃ karonte te bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā hatthaṃ ukkhipitvā etaṃ ``daharā bhavanto''tiādivacanaṃ ^a^P1.0182^ea^ avoca. ^b^okampetvā^eb^ti hanukena uraṃ paharanto adhonataṃ katvā. ^b^jivhaṃ nillāletvā^eb^ti kabaramahājivhaṃ nīharitvā uddhamadho ubhayapassesu ca lāletvā. ^b^tivisākha^eb^nti tisākhaṃ. ^b^nalāṭika^eb^nti bhakuṭiṃ, nalāṭe uṭṭhitaṃ valittayanti attho. ^b^pakkāmī^eb^ti tumhe jānantānaṃ ^a^V1.0161^ea^ vacanaṃ akatvā attanova tele paccissathāti vatvā ekaṃ maggaṃ gahetvā gato. paṭhamaṃ.

[03] 158^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^lābhā vata me, suladdhaṃ vata me^eb^ti evarūpassa satthu ceva dhammassa ca sabrahmacārīnañca laddhattā mayhaṃ lābhā mayhaṃ suladdhanti. so kirāyasmā pacchā mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ sammasitvā ``arahattaṃ gahessāmī''ti pāsādikaṃ tāva kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā buddhadhammasaṅghaguṇe āvajjetvā cittakallataṃ uppādetvā cittaṃ hāsetvā tosetvā nisinno. tenassa evamahosi. ^b^upasaṅkamī^eb^ti ``ayaṃ samiddhi bhikkhu pāsādikaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā nisinnasadiso, yāva mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā arahattaṃ na gaṇhāti, tāvassa antarāyaṃ karissāmī''ti upasaṅkami. ^b^gaccha tva^eb^nti satthā sakalajambudīpaṃ olokento ``tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne tassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ sappāyaṃ bhavissatī''ti addasa, tasmā evamāha. ^b^satipaññā ca me buddhā^eb^ti mayā sati ca paññā ca ñātā. ^b^karassu rūpānī^eb^ti bahūnipi vibhiṃsakārahāni rūpāni karassu. ^b^neva maṃ byādhayissasī^eb^ti maṃ neva vedhayissasi na kampassesi. dutiyaṃ.

[03] 159^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^a^M1.0168^ea^ ^b^isigilipasse^eb^ti isigilissa nāma pabbatassa passe. ^b^kāḷasilāya^eb^nti kāḷavaṇṇāya silāyaṃ. ^b^sāmayikaṃ cetovimutti^eb^nti ^a^P1.0183^ea^ appitappitakkhaṇe paccanīkadhammehi vimuccati, ārammaṇe ca adhimuccatīti lokiyasamāpatti sāmayikā cetovimutti nāma. ^b^phusī^eb^ti paṭilabhi. ^b^parihāyī^eb^ti kasmā yāva chaṭṭhaṃ parihāyi? sābādhattā. therassa kira vātapittasemhavasena anusāyiko ābādho atthi, tena samādhissa sappāye upakārakadhamme pūretuṃ na sakkoti, appitappitāya samāpattiyā parihāyati.

[03] ^b^yaṃnūnāhaṃ satthaṃ āhareyya^eb^nti so kira cintesi, yasmā parihīnajjhānassa kālaṅkaroto anibaddhā gati hoti, aparihīnajjhānassa nibaddhā gati hoti, brahmaloke nibbattati, tasmā satthaṃ āharitukāmo ahosi. ^b^upasaṅkamī^eb^ti -- ``ayaṃ samaṇo satthaṃ āharitukāmo, satthāharaṇañca ^a^V1.0162^ea^ nāmetaṃ kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhassa hoti. yo evaṃ kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkho hoti, so mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ sammasitvā arahattampi gahetuṃ samattho hoti, mayā pana paṭibāhitopi esa na oramissati, satthārā paṭibāhito oramissatī''ti therassa atthakāmo viya hutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.

[03] ^b^jalā^eb^ti jalamānā. ^b^pāde vandāmi cakkhumā^eb^ti pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumā tava pāde vandāmi. ^b^jutindharā^eb^ti ānubhāvadharā. ^b^appattamānaso^eb^ti appattārahatto. ^b^sekho^eb^ti sīlādīni sikkhamāno sakaraṇīyo. ^b^jane sutā^eb^ti jane vissutā. ^b^satthaṃ āharitaṃ hotī^eb^ti thero kira ``kiṃ mayhaṃ iminā jīvitenā''ti? uttāno nipajjitvā satthena galanāḷiṃ chindi, dukkhā vedanā uppajjiṃsu. thero vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvā taṃyeva vedanaṃ pariggahetvā satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ sammasanto arahattaṃ patvā samasīsī hutvā parinibbāyi. ^b^samasīsī^eb^ nāma tividho hoti iriyāpathasamasīsī, rogasamasīsī, jīvitasamasīsīti.

[03] tattha ^a^M1.0169^ea^ yo ṭhānādīsu iriyāpathesu aññataraṃ adhiṭṭhāya -- ``imaṃ akopetvāva arahattaṃ pāpuṇissāmī''ti vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapeti, athassa arahattappatti ca iriyāpathakopanañca ekappahāreneva hoti. ayaṃ ^b^iriyāpathasamasīsī^eb^ nāma. yo pana cakkhurogādīsu aññatarasmiṃ ^a^P1.0184^ea^ sati -- ``ito anuṭṭhitova arahattaṃ pāpuṇissāmī''ti vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapeti, athassa arahattappatti ca rogato vuṭṭhānañca ekappahāreneva hoti. ayaṃ ^b^rogasamasīsī^eb^ nāma. keci pana tasmiṃyeva iriyāpathe tasmiñca roge parinibbānavasenettha samasīsitaṃ paññāpenti. yassa pana āsavakkhayo ca jīvitakkhayo ca ekappahāreneva hoti. ayaṃ ^b^jīvitasamasīsī^eb^ nāma. vuttampi cetaṃ -- ``yassa puggalassa apubbaṃ acarimaṃ āsavapariyādānañca hoti jīvitapariyādānañca, ayaṃ vuccati puggalo samasīsī''ti (pu0 pa0 16).

[03] ettha ca pavattisīsaṃ kilesasīsanti dve sīsāni. tattha ^b^pavattisīsaṃ^eb^ nāma jīvitindriyaṃ, ^b^kilesasīsaṃ^eb^ nāma avijjā. tesu jīvitindriyaṃ cuticittaṃ khepeti, avijjā maggacittaṃ. dvinnaṃ cittānaṃ ekato uppādo natthi. maggānantaraṃ pana phalaṃ, phalānantaraṃ bhavaṅgaṃ, bhavaṅgato vuṭṭhāya paccavekkhaṇaṃ, taṃ paripuṇṇaṃ vā hoti aparipuṇṇaṃ vā. tikhiṇena asinā sīse chijjantepi ^a^V1.0163^ea^ hi eko vā dve vā paccavekkhaṇavārā avassaṃ uppajjantiyeva, cittānaṃ pana lahuparivattitāya āsavakkhayo ca jīvitapariyādānañca ekakkhaṇe viya paññāyati.
[03] ^b^samūlaṃ taṇhamabbuyhā^eb^ti avijjāmūlena samūlakaṃ taṇhaṃ arahattamaggena uppāṭetvā. ^b^parinibbuto^eb^ti anupādisesanibbānena parinibbuto.

[03] ^b^vivattakkhandha^eb^nti parivattakkhandhaṃ. ^b^semāna^eb^nti uttānaṃ hutvā sayitaṃ hoti. thero pana kiñcāpi uttānako sayito, tathāpissa dakkhiṇena passena paricitasayanattā sīsaṃ dakkhiṇatova parivattitvā ṭhitaṃ. ^b^dhūmāyitatta^eb^nti dhūmāyitabhāvaṃ. tasmiṃ hi khaṇe dhūmavalāhakā viya timiravalāhakā viya ca uṭṭhahiṃsu. ^b^viññāṇaṃ samanvesatī^eb^ti paṭisandhicittaṃ pariyesati. ^b^appatiṭṭhitenā^eb^ti paṭisandhiviññāṇena appatiṭṭhitena, appatiṭṭhitakāraṇāti attho. ^b^beluvapaṇḍuvīṇa^eb^nti beluvapakkaṃ viya paṇḍuvaṇṇaṃ suvaṇṇamahāvīṇaṃ. ^b^ādāyā^eb^ti kacche ṭhapetvā. ^b^upasaṅkamī^eb^ti ^a^P1.0185^ea^ ``godhikattherassa nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ na ^a^M1.0170^ea^ jānāmi, samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ pucchitvā nikkaṅkho bhavissāmī''ti khuddakadārakavaṇṇī hutvā upasaṅkami. ^b^nādhigacchāmī^eb^ti na passāmi. ^b^sokaparetassā^eb^ti sokena phuṭṭhassa. ^b^abhassathā^eb^ti pādapiṭṭhiyaṃ patitā. tatiyaṃ.

[03] 160^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^satta vassānī^eb^ti pure bodhiyā chabbassāni, bodhito pacchā ekaṃ vassaṃ. ^b^otārāpekkho^eb^ti ``sace samaṇassa gotamassa kāyadvārādīsu kiñcideva ananucchavikaṃ passāmi, codessāmi na''nti evaṃ vivaraṃ apekkhamāno. ^b^alabhamāno^eb^ti rathareṇumattampi avakkhalitaṃ apassanto. tenāha --
[21] ``satta vassāni bhagavantaṃ, anubandhiṃ padāpadaṃ.
[22] otāraṃ nādhigacchissaṃ, sambuddhassa satīmato''ti.. (su0 ni0 448).
[03] ^b^upasaṅkamī^eb^ti ``ajja samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ atigahetvā gamissāmī''ti upasaṅkami.

[03] ^b^jhāyasī^eb^ti ^a^V1.0164^ea^ jhāyanto avajjhāyanto nisinnosīti vadati. ^b^vittaṃ nu jīno^eb^ti sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā jitosi nu. ^b^āguṃ nu gāmasmi^eb^nti, kiṃ nu antogāme pamāṇātikkantaṃ pāpakammaṃ akāsi, yena aññesaṃ mukhaṃ oloketuṃ avisahanto araññe vicarasi? ^b^sakkhi^eb^nti mittabhāvaṃ.

[03] ^b^palikhāyā^eb^ti khaṇitvā. ^b^bhavalobhajappa^eb^nti bhavalobhasaṅkhātaṃ taṇhaṃ. ^b^anāsavo jhāyāmī^eb^ti nittaṇho hutvā dvīhi jhānehi jhāyāmi. ^b^pamattabandhū^eb^ti māraṃ ālapati. so hi yekeci loke pamattā, tesaṃ bandhu.

[03] ^b^sace maggaṃ anubuddha^eb^nti yadi tayā maggo anubuddho. ^b^apehī^eb^ti apayāhi. ^b^amaccudheyya^eb^nti ^a^P1.0186^ea^ maccuno anokāsabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ. ^b^pāragāmino^eb^ti yepi pāraṃ gatā, tepi pāragāmino. yepi pāraṃ gacchissanti, yepi pāraṃ gantukāmā, tepi pāragāmino.

[03] ^b^visūkāyikānī^eb^ti ^a^M1.0171^ea^ māravisūkāni. ^b^visevitānī^eb^ti viruddhasevitāni, ``appamāyu manussānaṃ, accayanti ahorattā''ti vutte. ``dīghamāyu manussānaṃ, nāccayanti ahorattā''tiādīni paṭilomakāraṇāni. ^b^vipphanditānī^eb^ti, tamhi tamhi kāle hatthirājavaṇṇasappavaṇṇādidassanāni. ^b^nibbejanīyā^eb^ti ukkaṇṭhanīyā.

[03] ^b^anupariyagā^eb^tiādīsu kiñcāpi atītavacanaṃ kataṃ, attho pana vikappavasena veditabbo. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- yathā medavaṇṇaṃ pāsāṇaṃ vāyaso disvā -- ``api nāmettha muduṃ vindeyyāma, api assādo siyā''ti anuparigaccheyya, atha so tattha assādaṃ alabhitvāva vāyaso etto apakkameyya, tato pāsāṇā apagaccheyya, evaṃ mayampi so kāko viya selaṃ gotamaṃ āsajja assādaṃ vā santhavaṃ vā alabhantā gotamā nibbinditvā apagacchāma. catutthaṃ.

[03] 161^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^abhāsitvā^eb^ti ettha a-kāro nipātamattaṃ, bhāsitvāti attho. abhāsayitvātipi ^a^V1.0165^ea^ pāṭho. ^b^upasaṅkamiṃsū^eb^ti ``gopālakadārakaṃ viya daṇḍakena bhūmiṃ lekhaṃ datvā ativiya dummano hutvā nisinno. `kinnu kho kāraṇa'nti? pucchitvā, jānissāmā''ti upasaṅkamiṃsu.

[03] ^b^socasī^eb^ti cintesi. ^b^āraññamiva kuñjara^eb^nti yathā araññato pesitagaṇikārahatthiniyo āraññakaṃ kuñjaraṃ itthikuttadassanena palobhetvā bandhitvā ānayanti, evaṃ ānayissāma. ^b^māradheyya^eb^nti tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ.

[03] ^b^upasaṅkamiṃsū^eb^ti -- ``tumhe thokaṃ adhivāsetha, mayaṃ taṃ ^a^P1.0187^ea^ ānessāmā''ti pitaraṃ samassāsetvā upasaṅkamiṃsu. ^b^uccāvacā^eb^ti nānāvidhā. ^b^ekasataṃ ekasata^eb^nti ekekaṃ sataṃ sataṃ katvā. ^b^kumārivaṇṇasata^eb^nti iminā nayena kumāriattabhāvānaṃ sataṃ.

[03] ^b^atthassa^eb^ ^a^M1.0172^ea^ ^b^pattiṃ hadayassa santi^eb^nti, dvīhipi padehi arahattameva kathesi. ^b^sena^eb^nti kilesasenaṃ. sā hi piyarūpasātarūpā nāma. ^b^ekāhaṃ jhāya^eb^nti eko ahaṃ jhāyanto. ^b^sukhamanubodhi^eb^nti arahattasukhaṃ anubujjhiṃ. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ senaṃ jinitvā ahaṃ eko jhāyanto ``atthassa pattiṃ hadayassa santi''nti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ arahattasukhaṃ anubujjhiṃ. tasmā janena mittasanthavaṃ na karomi, teneva ca me kāraṇena kenaci saddhiṃ sakkhī na sampajjatīti.

[03] ^b^kathaṃvihārībahulo^eb^ti katamena vihārena bahulaṃ viharanto. ^b^aladdhā^eb^ti alabhitvā. ^b^yo^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- katamena jhānena bahulaṃ jhāyantaṃ taṃ puggalaṃ kāmasaññā alabhitvāva paribāhirā hontīti.

[03] ^b^passaddhakāyo^eb^ti catutthajjhānena assāsapassāsakāyassa passaddhattā passaddhakāyo. ^b^suvimuttacitto^eb^ti arahattaphalavimuttiyā suṭṭhu vimuttacitto. ^b^asaṅkharāno^eb^ti tayo kammābhisaṅkhāre anabhisaṅkharonto. ^b^anoko^eb^ti anālayo. ^b^aññāya dhamma^eb^nti catusaccadhammaṃ jānitvā. ^b^avitakkajhāyī^eb^ti avitakkena catutthajjhānena jhāyanto. ^b^na kuppatī^eb^tiādīsu dosena na kuppati, rāgena na sarati, mohena na thīno. imesu tīsu mūlakilesesu gahitesu diyaḍḍhakilesasahassaṃ ^a^V1.0166^ea^ gahitameva hoti. paṭhamapadena vā byāpādanīvaraṇaṃ gahitaṃ, dutiyena kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ, tatiyena thinaṃ ādiṃ katvā sesanīvaraṇāni. iti iminā nīvaraṇappahānena khīṇāsavaṃ dasseti.

[03] ^b^pañcoghatiṇṇo^eb^ti pañcadvārikaṃ kilesoghaṃ tiṇṇo. ^b^chaṭṭha^eb^nti manodvārikampi chaṭṭhaṃ kilesoghaṃ atari. pañcoghaggahaṇena vā pañcorambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni ^a^P1.0188^ea^, chaṭṭhaggahaṇena pañcuddhambhāgiyāni veditabbāni. ^b^gaṇasaṅghacārī^eb^ti gaṇe ca saṅghe ca caratīti satthā gaṇasaṅghacārī nāma. ^b^addhā carissantī^eb^ti aññepi saddhā bahujanā ekaṃsena carissanti. ^b^aya^eb^nti ayaṃ satthā. ^b^anoko^eb^ti anālayo.
[03] ^b^acchejja^eb^ ^a^M1.0173^ea^ ^b^nessatī^eb^ti acchinditvā nayissati, maccurājassa hatthato acchinditvā nibbānapāraṃ nayissatīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^nayamānāna^eb^nti nayamānesu.

[03] ^b^selaṃva sirasūhacca, pātāle gādhamesathā^eb^ti mahantaṃ kūṭāgārappamāṇaṃ silaṃ sīse ṭhapetvā pātāle patiṭṭhagavesanaṃ viya. ^b^khāṇuṃva urasāsajjā^eb^ti urasi khāṇuṃ paharitvā viya. ^b^apethā^eb^ti apagacchatha. imasmiṃ ṭhāne saṅgītikārā ``idamavocā''ti desanaṃ niṭṭhapetvā ^b^daddallamānā^eb^ti gāthaṃ āhaṃsu. tattha ^b^daddallamānā^eb^ti ativiya jalamānā sobhamānā. ^b^āgañchu^eb^nti āgatā. ^b^panudī^eb^ti nīhari. ^b^tūlaṃ bhaṭṭhaṃva māluto^eb^ti yathā phalato bhaṭṭhaṃ simbalitūlaṃ vā poṭakitūlaṃ vā vāto panudati nīharati, evaṃ panudīti. pañcamaṃ.
[06] tatiyo vaggo.
[06] iti sāratthappakāsiniyā
[03] saṃyuttanikāya-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] mārasaṃyuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 162^b^.^eb^ bhikkhunīsaṃyuttassa ^a^V1.0167^ea^ ^a^P1.0189^ea^ ^a^M1.0174^ea^ paṭhame ^b^āḷavikā^eb^ti āḷaviyaṃ jātā āḷavinagaratoyeva ca nikkhamma pabbajitā. ^b^andhavana^eb^nti kassapasammāsambuddhassa cetiye navakammatthāya dhanaṃ samādapetvā āgacchantassa yasodharassa nāma dhammabhāṇakassa ariyapuggalassa akkhīni uppāṭetvā tattheva akkhibhedappattehi pañcahi corasatehi nivutthattā tato paṭṭhāya ``andhavana''nti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ vanaṃ. taṃ kira sāvatthito dakkhiṇapasse gāvutamatte hoti rājārakkhāya guttaṃ. tattha pavivekakāmā bhikkhū ca bhikkhuniyo ca gacchanti. tasmā ayampi kāyavivekatthinī yena taṃ vanaṃ, tenupasaṅkami. ^b^nissaraṇa^eb^nti nibbānaṃ. ^b^paññāyā^eb^ti paccavekkhaṇañāṇena. ^b^na tvaṃ jānāsi taṃ pada^eb^nti tvaṃ etaṃ nibbānapadaṃ vā nibbānagāmimaggapadaṃ vā na jānāsi. ^b^sattisūlūpamā^eb^ti vinivijjhanatthena sattisūlasadisā. ^b^khandhāsaṃ adhikuṭṭanā^eb^ti khandhā tesaṃ adhikuṭṭanabhaṇḍikā. paṭhamaṃ.

[03] 163^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^ṭhāna^eb^nti arahattaṃ. ^b^durabhisambhava^eb^nti duppasahaṃ. ^b^dvaṅgulapaññāyā^eb^ti parittapaññāya. yasmā vā dvīhi aṅgulehi kappāsavaṭṭiṃ gahetvā suttaṃ kantanti, tasmā ^a^P1.0190^ea^ itthī ``dvaṅgulapaññā''ti vuccati. ^b^ñāṇamhi vattamānamhī^eb^ti phalasamāpattiñāṇe pavattamāne. ^b^dhammaṃ vipassato^eb^ti catusaccadhammaṃ vipassantassa, pubbabhāge vā vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtaṃ khandhapañcakameva. ^b^kiñci vā pana aññasmī^eb^ti aññaṃ vā kiñci ``ahaṃ asmī''ti taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena yassa siyā. dutiyaṃ.

[03] 164^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^a^V1.0168^ea^ ^b^kisāgotamī^eb^ti appamaṃsalohitatāya kisā, gotamīti panassā nāmaṃ. pubbe kira sāvatthiyaṃ ekasmiṃ kule asītikoṭidhanaṃ sabbaṃ aṅgārāva jātaṃ. kuṭumbiko aṅgārajātāni anīharitvā ^a^M1.0175^ea^ -- ``avassaṃ koci puññavā bhavissati, tassa puññena puna pākatikaṃ bhavissatī''ti suvaṇṇahiraññassa cāṭiyo pūretvā āpaṇe ṭhapetvā samīpe nisīdi. athekā duggatakulassa dhītā -- ``aḍḍhamāsakaṃ gahetvā dārusākaṃ āharissāmī''ti vīthiṃ gatā taṃ disvā kuṭumbikaṃ āha -- ``āpaṇe tāva dhanaṃ ettakaṃ, gehe kittakaṃ bhavissatī''ti. kiṃ disvā amma evaṃ kathesīti? imaṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇanti. so ``puññavatī esā bhavissatī''ti tassā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pucchitvā āpaṇe bhaṇḍaṃ paṭisāmetvā tassā mātāpitaro upasaṅkamitvā evamāha -- ``amhākaṃ gehe vayappatto dārako atthi, tassetaṃ dārikaṃ dethā''ti. kiṃ sāmi duggatehi saddhiṃ keḷiṃ karosīti? mittasanthavo nāma duggatehipi saddhiṃ hoti, detha naṃ, kuṭumbasāminī bhavissatīti naṃ gahetvā gharaṃ ānesi. sā saṃvāsamanvāya puttaṃ vijātā. putto padasā āhiṇḍanakāle kālamakāsi. sā duggatakule uppajjitvā mahākulaṃ gantvāpi ``puttavināsaṃ pattāmhī''ti uppannabalavasokā puttassa sarīrakiccaṃ vāretvā taṃ matakaḷevaraṃ ādāya nagare vippalapantī carati.

[03] ekadivasaṃ mahatiyā buddhavīthiyā dasabalassa ^a^P1.0191^ea^ santikaṃ gantvā -- ``puttassa me arogabhāvatthāya bhesajjaṃ detha bhagavā''ti āha. gaccha sāvatthiṃ āhiṇḍitvā yasmiṃ gehe matapubbo natthi, tato siddhatthakaṃ āhara, puttassa te bhesajjaṃ bhavissatīti. sā nagaraṃ pavisitvā dhuragehato paṭṭhāya bhagavatā vuttanayena gantvā siddhatthakaṃ yācantī ghare ghare, ``kuto tvaṃ evarūpaṃ gharaṃ passissasī''ti vuttā katipayāni gehāni āhiṇḍitvā -- ``sabbesampi kirāyaṃ dhammatā, na mayhaṃ puttassevā''ti sālāyaṃ chavaṃ chaḍḍetvā pabbajjaṃ yāci. satthā ``imaṃ pabbājetū''ti bhikkhuniupassayaṃ pesesi. sā khuraggeyeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. imaṃ theriṃ sandhāya ``atha kho kisāgotamī''ti vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^ekamāsī^eb^ti ekā āsi. ^b^rudammukhī^eb^ti rudamānamukhī viya. ^b^accantaṃ mataputtāmhī^eb^ti ettha ^a^V1.0169^ea^ antaṃ atītaṃ accantaṃ, bhāvanapuṃsakametaṃ. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- yathā puttamaraṇaṃ antaṃ atītaṃ hoti, evaṃ mataputtā ahaṃ, idāni mama puna puttamaraṇaṃ nāma natthi. ^b^purisā etadantikā^eb^ti purisāpi me etadantikāva ^a^M1.0176^ea^. yo me puttamaraṇassa anto, purisānampi me esevanto, abhabbā ahaṃ idāni purisaṃ gavesitunti. ^b^sabbattha vihatā nandī^eb^ti sabbesu khandhāyatanadhātubhavayonigatiṭhitinivāsesu mama taṇhānandī vihatā. ^b^tamokkhandho^eb^ti avijjākkhandho. ^b^padālito^eb^ti ñāṇena bhinno. tatiyaṃ.

[03] 165^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^pañcaṅgikenā^eb^ti ātataṃ vitataṃ ātatavitataṃ ghanaṃ susiranti evaṃ pañcaṅgasamannāgatena. ^b^niyyātayāmi tuyhevā^eb^ti sabbe tuyhaṃyeva demi. ^b^nāhaṃ tenatthikā^eb^ti nāhaṃ tena atthikā. ^b^pūtikāyenā^eb^ti suvaṇṇavaṇṇopi kāyo niccaṃ uggharitapaggharitaṭṭhena pūtikāyova, tasmā evamāha. ^b^bhindanenā^eb^ti bhijjanasabhāvena. ^b^pabhaṅgunā^eb^ti cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ āpajjanadhammena. ^b^aṭṭīyāmī^eb^ti aṭṭā pīḷitā homi. ^b^harāyāmī^eb^ti lajjāmi. ^b^santā samāpattī^eb^ti ^a^P1.0192^ea^ aṭṭhavidhā lokiyasamāpatti ārammaṇasantatāya aṅgasantatāya ca santāti vuttā. ^b^sabbatthā^eb^ti sabbesu rūpārūpabhavesu, tesaṃ dvinnaṃ bhavānaṃ gahitattā gahite kāmabhave aṭṭhasu ca samāpattīsūti etesu sabbesu ṭhānesu mayhaṃ avijjātamo vihatoti vadati. catutthaṃ.

[03] 166^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^supupphitagga^eb^nti aggato paṭṭhāya suṭṭhu pupphitaṃ sālarukkhaṃ. ^b^na catthi te dutiyā vaṇṇadhātū^eb^ti tava vaṇṇadhātusadisā dutiyā vaṇṇadhātu natthi, tayā sadisā aññā bhikkhunī natthīti vadati. ^b^idhāgatā tādisikā bhaveyyu^eb^nti yathā tvaṃ idhāgatā kiñci santhavaṃ vā sinehaṃ vā na labhasi, evamevaṃ tepi tayāva sadisā bhaveyyuṃ. ^b^pakhumantarikāya^eb^nti dvinnaṃ akkhīnaṃ majjhe nāsavaṃsepi tiṭṭhantiṃ maṃ na passasi. ^b^vasībhūtamhī^eb^ti vasībhūtā asmi. pañcamaṃ.

[03] 167^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^a^V1.0170^ea^ ^b^ko nu taṃ idamādapayī^eb^ti ko nu mandabuddhi bālo taṃ evaṃ gāhāpesi? ^b^pariklesa^eb^nti aññampi nānappakāraṃ upaddavaṃ. idāni yaṃ māro āha ^a^M1.0177^ea^ -- ``ko nu taṃ idamādapayī''ti, taṃ maddantī -- ``na maṃ andhabālo ādapesi, loke pana aggapuggalo satthā dhammaṃ desesī''ti dassetuṃ, ^b^buddho^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^sacce nivesayī^eb^ti paramatthasacce nibbāne nivesesi. ^b^nirodhaṃ appajānantā^eb^ti nirodhasaccaṃ ajānantā. chaṭṭhaṃ.

[03] 168^b^.^eb^ sattame ^a^P1.0193^ea^ ^b^enti māravasaṃ punā^eb^ti punappunaṃ maraṇamārakilesamāradevaputtamārānaṃ vasaṃ āgacchanti. ^b^padhūpito^eb^ti santāpito. ^b^agati yattha mārassā^eb^ti yattha tuyhaṃ mārassa agati. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ nibbāne. sattamaṃ.

[03] 169^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^samaṇī viya dissasī^eb^ti samaṇisadisā dissasi. ^b^kimiva carasi momūhā^eb^ti kiṃ kāraṇā momūhā viya carasi? ^b^ito bahiddhā^eb^ti imamhā sāsanā bahi. pāsaṃ ḍentīti ^b^pāsaṇḍā,^eb^ sattānaṃ cittesu diṭṭhipāsaṃ khipantīti attho. sāsanaṃ pana pāse moceti, tasmā pāsaṇḍoti na vuccati, ito bahiddhāyeva pāsaṇḍā honti. ^b^pasīdantī^eb^ti saṃsīdanti lagganti.

[03] idāni ``kaṃ nu uddissa muṇḍāsī''ti pañhaṃ kathentī ^b^atthi sakyakule jāto^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^sabbābhibhū^eb^ti sabbāni khandhāyatanadhātubhavayonigatiādīni abhibhavitvā ṭhito. maraṇamārādayo nudi nīharīti ^b^māranudo. sabbatthamaparājito^eb^ti sabbesu rāgādīsu vā mārayuddhe vā ajito. ^b^sabbattha mutto^eb^ti sabbesu khandhādīsu mutto. ^b^asito^eb^ti taṇhādiṭṭhinissayena ^a^V1.0171^ea^ anissito. ^b^sabbakammakkhayaṃ patto^eb^ti sabbakammakkhayasaṅkhātaṃ arahattaṃ patto. ^b^upadhisaṅkhaye^eb^ti upadhisaṅkhayasaṅkhāte nibbāne ārammaṇato vimutto. aṭṭhamaṃ.

[03] 170^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^kenidaṃ pakata^eb^nti kena idaṃ kataṃ. ^b^bimba^eb^nti attabhāvaṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^agha^eb^nti dukkhapatiṭṭhānattā attabhāvameva vadati. ^b^hetubhaṅgā^eb^ti hetunirodhena paccayavekallena. navamaṃ.

[03] 171^b^.^eb^ dasame ^a^M1.0178^ea^ ^a^P1.0194^ea^ ^b^nayidha sattupalabbhatī^eb^ti imasmiṃ suddhasaṅkhārapuñje paramatthato satto nāma na upalabbhati. ^b^khandhesu santesū^eb^ti pañcasu khandhesu vijjamānesu tena tenākārena vavatthitesu. ^b^sammutī^eb^ti sattoti samaññāmattameva hoti. ^b^dukkha^eb^nti pañcakkhandhadukkhaṃ. ^b^nāññatra dukkhā^eb^ti ṭhapetvā dukkhaṃ añño neva sambhoti na nirujjhatīti. dasamaṃ.
[06] iti sāratthappakāsiniyā
[03] saṃyuttanikāya-aṭṭhakathāya
